40018010	“Mlakímɔ banuvɔ sisami ba ya si bénu kididɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si ba baxwɛdzɛ ba ɛ, balɛ Mɔka ni lifunu ne yɛ aŋu mɛ lipoe kakaa.
40018011	Lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, kiba aba si yibu banama gi bɛlila ɛ.
40018012	Mlegyo le edi si, iʋesi alafa tole ilɛ ní onyime ɔtɔ awla a, lɛ lɛ mɛ tole ɛlila ɛ. Kɔ ɔ́trayurɔ iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le ní siwa sɛ ɔtaklɔ xe iipɛ lɔ klɔ gi ɛlila na a?
40018013	Kikaka elu i, xegi amɔ lɔ ɛ, onyimee aamɔ isami glegle ní lɔ su sani iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le gi ílila su i.
40018014	Nite ke línu mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne kupɛpɛ si banuvɔ sisami ba ya mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔlila a.
40018015	“Xe wonemi abitɛ liboe zimizi amani wɔ su i, wɔ tètè tipɔni yɛ tɔ bu le kubasɛ yɛ ní mlɔ tiaʋa kusi. Xe enu kutu i, tɔ mleku likpɔ.
40018016	Pɔ̀ xegi ónu kutu i, gbani ɔnɔ tole, tiaʋa pɔni isu ya ‘tɔ ɔʋatrɔ oze ní wɔ awla ní liboe kakaa gi mlaapani su u ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya liboe le libasɛ kinɛ ɛ.’
40018017	Lɛ xegi ɔ́zɛ ba liboe le e, zɛ kɔ wɔ liboe le plɛ ní ɔsɔli ha lɔ aŋu mɛ. Niteme si, xegi ónu kutu ki ɔhalɔ kyɛ ɛ, kɔ yɛ kudeo kí yɛ tɔ oze ɔki wɔ ŋwisi ɔbubitɛ loo ɔtumonu kinɛ ɛ.
40018018	“Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ pɔ́ si: xe mletsi kude ɛki kiditɔ ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biatsi kɛ onu ní lifunu ne, lɛ xe mlɛki kude ní kiditɔ su ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biaki kɛ kude ní lifunu ne.
40018019	“Lɛ mɛ ɛɛpani ipɔnɔ si, xegi mlɔ mɛ banɔ tiaʋa mlaakpɛ mlɔ begyodi ʋa likpɔ ní kidɔ kakaa su ní kesea aʋa xe mleʋi ke e, mɔka ní lifunu ne aabitɛ kɛ ɔki mlɔ.
40018020	Lɛ niklɔ gi banɔ tiaʋa loo tiata biakpɛ likpɔ ní mɛ linyi ne me e, malɛ ní ba kusi.”
40018021	Lɛ Petro aba Yesu klɔ xe eʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, tasɛ mɛ ɔhanɛ ɔʋaziŋa aabitɛ liboe zimizi mani mɛ su xe maakɔ kyɛ yɛ na a? Tegloele na a?”
40018022	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Owo, mápani si tegloele pɔ̀ avitegloele ede tegloele,
40018023	lɛ ese linu si lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite e: ɔʋaŋa ɔtɔ eze e; lɛ liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, atrɔ si yɛ aga kibɔɛ eboe la mɛ ni yɛ banɔsumu ba.
40018024	Kiliɛ gi ekpese ko e, lɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba bɛgbani ba mɛ tole gi adɔ liʋɛ kibɔ ʋidi itɔ ní yɛ ɔʋaŋaɛ su amanɔ ní yɛ aŋu na mɛ ɛ.
40018025	Pɔ̀ gi kibɔ kíze ní ɔnɔsumu ye awla xe akɔ tsa liʋɛ nɛ gi adɔ onu i, lɛ ɔʋaŋaɛ asi si badà yɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ dzidzi kinɛ ɛ, yɛ nì yedze, yɛ bebi ba kɔpɔni kidɔ kakaa elu gi kiliɛ yɛ awla ɛ, tɔ bakɔ atsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi adɔ ɛ.
40018026	Lɛ ɔnɔsumu ye adɔ́ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa aki ɔʋaŋaɛ si “Maki wɔ litukpo, plɛ litɔ kese ki mɛ; tɔ maatsa liʋɛ kakaa gi madɔ ní wɔ su i!’
40018027	Yɛ liboe le liga ɔʋaŋaɛ asigaga, nite si akɔ liʋɛɛ nɛ gi adɔ ní yɛ su i, akɔ lɛ akyɛ yɛ, lɛ ayurɔ yɛ ɛ.
40018028	“Pɔ̀ gi onyimee asɛ ní ɔʋaŋaɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ, atsani yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu dzedze ɔtɔ gi adɔ kibɔ liʋɛ sisami itɔ ko ní yɛ su i. Asɔli yɛ ka, lɛ evu yɛ ole lo apɔ ɛ. Lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Tsa liʋɛ nɛ gi wɔdɔ mɛ su ɔki mɛ ɛ!’
40018029	Lɛ yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu ye adɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa, xe aki yɛ litukpo si i, ‘Plɛ litɔ kese ki mɛ ɛ; maatsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi madɔ ɛ!’
40018030	“Pɔ̀ ɔ́zɛ lɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ. Boŋu i, aki bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ɔki yɛ pɔ́ ɛ.
40018031	Agi banɔsumu dzedze ba bɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛtrɛ la ʋa nite e, limi ba aʋa koŋ. Nite si bɛtrɛ ní ɔʋaŋaɛ klɔ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ liboe kakaa gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
40018032	Liki si ɔʋaŋaɛ axwa ɔnɔsumu ye amani yɛ klɔ. Lɛ atɛni yɛ si, ‘Wɔ ɔnɔsumu litukpo me gagla onete wonu. Makɔ wɔ aʋɛ na petee akyɛ wɔ lɛ ese linu si wɔki mɛ litukpo si mikɔ la kyɛ wɔ,
40018033	wo gyeni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ asigaga kudi ŋwisi kiliɛ gi medi wɔ kyɛ asigaga la kinɛ ɛ?’
40018034	Nite si ɔʋaŋaɛ amɔ kusuyeʋi nyani nyani, lɛ aki bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba tɔ bawa yɛ nyɔnyɔɛ kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aatsa liʋɛ kakaa gi adɔ ɛ.”
40018035	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Nite ɖii mɔka ní lifunu ne aabitɛ mlɔ mɛ kakaa liɛ gi ɔ́kɔ kyɛ yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔʋaziŋa dɔnɔ ní yɛ ɔna mɛ ɛ.”
40019001	Agi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, asɛ ní Galilea lɛ atrɛ ní Yudea kesea ní Yordan onipe lo kede e.
40019002	Anɔkpi ʋidi eku ni yɛ kude, lɛ ayɔ ni ba ní niklɔ ɛ,
40019003	Farisianɛatɔ bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ bɛpɛ si bɛɛpunu yɛ ni kuʋíʋi si, “Dani blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si wɔagbe wodze ní kude kakaa onu gi wɔpɛ na a?”
40019004	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kikla mlákla ní Aya liboe le me si ní okpese klɔ ɛ, Aya ebu ba onyime ni ɔdzɛ na a?
40019005	Lɛ Aya apani si, ‘lɛ loso onyime aayurɔ yɛka ni yene tɔ yɛ nì yedze biakpɛ likpɔ ɔ, lɛ ba tiaʋa biadzi kisugya tile na a.’
40019006	Lɛ loso bénu banɔ tiaʋa tɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ kisugya tile. “nite si kidiliɛ gi Aya akpɛ likpɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ki lɛ kɛ mɛ ɛ.”
40019007	Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “ege lɛ loso, Mose aki kude si onyime ɔki yedze kegbegbeplekpa tɔ ɔkpɛ yɛ kude na a?”
40019008	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mose aki mlɔ kude si mlegbe mlɔ bedze ba lɛ ese linu si mlɔ batu ba mɛ bali i gagla. Pɔ̀ lize nite ní kelea okpese klɔ ɔ.
40019009	Abla ɖii, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xe onyime ɔtɔ egbe yedze ni kude dzedze onu gi aní enyimeboe alɔ ɛ, xe agbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, kɔ onyimee liɛ klɔ alɔ ádzɛboe e.”
40019010	Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsi yɛ si, “Xegi nite kudzɛgbanɔɔ kulɛ ni ɔdzɛ ni onyime kusi i, kɔlɔ ɔ liapɛ ɔsã nɔ xegi wɔ́gbani ɔdzɛ ɛ.”
40019011	Lɛ Yesu azɛ liboe le si, “Ani ɔnɔ kakaa yɛ aanu liboe lɛ ya ese e, pɔ̀ banama gi Aya aki kesenunu i, ba linɛ.
40019012	Mlenu lɛ ese si, eboe glegle alɛ gi la loso onyime ɔ́tratani ɔdzɛ kugbanɔ ɔ: benyimeatɔ ɛ, bɛpɔ ba si bawɔ ɔdzɛ mɔgbanɔ ɔ; batɔ ɛ banɔ bɛbitɛ ba nite; lɛ benyimeatɔ fɛ bágbani badzɛ kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa loso o. Ɔniliɛ gi aatani lɛ ese kunu i tɔ ɔzɛ lɛ.”
40019013	Banɔatɔ bɛgbani banuvɔ ba ɛ mani Yesu klɔ tɔ ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa ni tɔ ɔxwa Aya ní ba litukpo, pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtɛni banɔaklɔ ɔ.
40019014	Pɔ̀ Yesu egbe liboe aki ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔ klɔ; mlakítsi kude aki ba, lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, ba elu kanɛ kenu u.”
40019015	Lɛ atrɔ awla ní ba aʋa a, lɛ asɛ.
40019016	Lipoetɔ kede e, onyime ɔtɔ ɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛɛ, kidɔ gbã woli lu lilɛ si mibitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã moblo le e?”
40019017	Lɛ ebú le onu si, Ege lɛ loso wɔeʋi me liboe ní kidɔ gbã su u? Koŋu i, ɔnɔ tole ko ɔlɛ gi yɛ apɛ ɛ. Ga ní isã nɛ aʋa xe wɔpɛ si wutiku ní ligbã́ moblo le me e.”
40019018	Lɛ onyimee eʋi si, “Isã woli lɛ klɔ ɔ?” Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukílɔ enyimeboe ni ádzɛboe; wukízuru; wukísɛ asia akpɛ ɔnɔ awla a;
40019019	Bù wɔka ni wone; tɔ dimɛni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ lɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.”
40019020	Lɛ onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, “Maga ní isãɛ nɛ klɔ pɔ́ aʋa. Ege kigɔ dzɛ gi linu si mibitɛ ɛ?”
40019021	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Xe wɔpɛ si wuflɔ ɛki ligbã moblo le e, trɛ tɔ zɛɛda wɔ bidɔ mɛ petee atɔ kɔ kibɔɛ kí bepiplinete ba. Liaki si exo aaze ní wɔ awla ní lifunu ne; Atɔ wɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, ga kuni mɛ kude.”
40019022	Agi onyimemi ye enu liboe le e, asɛ ní asigaga mɛ, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu u.
40019023	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, liaze gagla ki bexonete ba si beti eku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.
40019024	Meedzini le epani si: liaze gagla ki oxonete si oti oku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ sani si kposɔɛ ɔga trɔ̀ni yɛ liwu le me odo.”
40019025	Agi badɔkpasi ba benu liboe le e, ba inugu itse mɔmɔmɔ, lɛ beʋi si, “Kɔ abla ɛ, nyaŋwɛ koŋ aamɔ kububu i?”
40019026	Lɛ Yesu edu aŋu na ní ba aʋa a, lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔnɔ gbagbe ɔ́tratani ɔnɔnɔ kubu u, pɔ̀ Aya kɔ ɛ, kidɔ kakaa kiatani kɛ mɛ kuba ki yɛ ɛ.”
40019027	Lɛ Petro ebu le edo si, “Dike, ɔka! kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa, lɛ kwikuni wɔ kude e. Ege kwiamɔ obu ní lɛ mɛ ɛ?”
40019028	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si, xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaze ní yɛ likusigbo le aʋa ní isami mɛ ní kele vuvu ya mɛ gi Aya aabitɛ ɛ, kɔ́ mlɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba gi mlalɛ ni mɛ kude e, mlɔ fɛ mlaze ní ekusigbo aʋa, gi mlaaŋa kukusi ní Israel akpɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa la aʋa a.
40019029	Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi ayurɔ kupe loo, beneminyime, loo benemidzɛ, loo ɔka, loo one, loo bebi, loo inyɔɔ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso e, aamɔ bɛ elu ede alafa kɔ sanɔ, lɛ Aya aaki ɔniɛ ligbã mobloe le e.
40019030	Pɔ̀ banɔ glegle gi benu batɔpu i, biaze bagɔgɔ, lɛ banɔ glegle gi benu bagɔgɔ abla ɛ, biadzi batɔpu u.
40020001	Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite e. Livlɛ ɛtɔ lɛ onyime ɔtɔ edo atrɛ gi azɛɛkɔ apaa benete tɔ bawa axwɛ aki yɛ ni yɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ
40020002	Adimɛ si yɛ atsa liwe le apaa yɛ kibɔɛ aki ba; lɛ atsisi ba ní yɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ.
40020003	Edzi atrɛ ní ablɔ yɛ mɛ ní ɔnyrɔ ɔgɔtole me, lɛ azɛɛmɔ benyimeatɔ gi balɛɛ kididɔ mɔbitɛ ɛ.
40020004	Lɛ loso e, asi ba si, ‘Mlɔ fɛ mlazɛwa axwɛ na ní mɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, atɔ maatsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi ligyeno e ɛki mlɔ ɔ.’
40020005	Lɛ bɛtrɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Nite ke atsisi banɔatɔ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, ní inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa ani inyɔ tita mɛ dzɛ.
40020006	Agi inyɔ titsu iha kusa ɛ, edzì atrɛ ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa dzɛ lɛ azɛɛtsani benyime dzedzeatɔ gi balɛɛ ni niklɔ ɔ, lɛ eʋi ba si, ‘Ege lɛ loso mleezizi liwe zizi nɛ kidiidɔ mɔbitɛ na a?’
40020007	Lɛ bebu isu ya onu si, ‘Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ki blɔ lixwɛxwɛ ɛ.’ Lɛ asi ba si, ‘Lipɛ, nite kɔ mlɔ fɛ mlazɛwa axwɛ na ni mɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ.’
40020008	“Agi ɔlagɔ lɔ inyɔ tiglo isã ɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ, onetee asi yɛ axwɛ na aʋa odidi ye si, ‘Xwa baxwɛwa ba tɔ tsa ba aʋɛ na kí ba. Kpese ní baxwɛwa gɔgɔ ba aʋa zɛkɔna ni baxwɛwa tɔpu ba aʋa a.
40020009	Benyime ba klɔ gi bɛtrɛ ní axwɛ na mɛ, ní inyɔ titsu le me e, bɛtsa liwe le liʋɛ nɛ ɛki ba mɛ ɔkakaa.
40020010	Lɛ gi lina banɔ tɔpu ba aʋa ɛ, begyo edi si ba liʋɛ nɛ liakeme ɔsanɔ; pɔ̀ ba fɛ ɛ, liwe tile liʋɛ ko bɛtsa ɛki ba mɛ ɔkakaa.
40020011	Agi bɛzi ba kibɔɛ ɛ, beku kutɛ mɛ.
40020012	Ba liboe le linu si, ‘Benyime ba ya gi bɛba kudegba ɛ, ɔnyɔsasa tole ko bɛwa axwɛ na a; lɛ blɔ kɔ ɔ kwize kuweo me e, wa axwɛ na liwe zizi nɛ petee. Pɔ̀ liʋɛ lide tile ko wɔtsa aki blɔ petee!”
40020013	Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onete ebu le onu ki ba mɛ tole si, ‘Ta kutu, ɔʋiaa. Mába wɔ kura. Wɔtutɔ, wɔdimɛ si, wɔawa liwe tile axwɛ ɛ ki liwe le liʋɛ nɛ.
40020014	Lɛ loso e, zi wɔ liʋɛ nɛ tɔ sɛ. Mɛ mapɛ si miki ɔxwɛwa gɔgɔɛ nite gi maki wɔ ɔ.
40020015	Aloo mámɔ kude gi maabitɛ kidiliɛ gi mapɛ ni mɛ ɔtutɔ mɛ kibɔɛ na a? Kɔ ege lɛ loso wɔzã kimbi ní mɛ lipomepɛpɛ lɛ su i?’ ”
40020016	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Lɛ loso e, banɔ gɔgɔ ba biadzi batɔpu ba, lɛ banɔ tɔpu ba biadzi banɔ gɔgɔ ɔ.”
40020017	Agi Yesu azeemu atrɛ ní Yerusalem i, ebu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka ní kudeo aʋa, lɛ apani aki ba ɛ.
40020018	Asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwimu itrɛ ní Yerusalem. Niklɔ biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukpɛ awla ɔki kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba. Biatsa kutsépia ɔki yɛ.
40020019	Kɔ bɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ́ awla ɛki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ. Ba kyɛ ɛ, biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa kɔ bekusi ye e; gɔgɔ ɛ, kɔ beku ye ní ose lo su i. Pɔ̀ liwe tanɛ we le aʋa ɛ, Aya aayɔ ni yɛ ɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ.”
40020020	Lɛ Zebedeo yedze aba Yesu klɔ ni yɛ bebinyime tiaʋa ba ɛ. Edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea akí yɛ, lɛ eʋi si ɔpɛ lipo me ɔki yɛ ɛ.
40020021	Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege wɔɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki wɔ ɔ?” Lɛ ebu le onu si, “Kaplɛ ki mɛ si, mɛ bebínyime tiaʋa ba ya ɛ, biaze ni wɔ kaŋaa ni wɔ kabaa mɛ xegi woku wɔ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
40020022	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu aki bebinyime ba si, “Mléte kidiliɛ gi mleeʋi i, mlaatani ɔzia nɔ lidɔtu ilɛ gi matratu i, kutu na?” Bebu le onu si, “Ee, kwiatanɔ.”
40020023	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaatani mɛ lidɔtu le kutu baa; Pɔ̀ kigagla kíma ní mɛ awla si mikyá ɔniliɛ gi yɛ aaze ní mɛ kaŋaa loo kabaa mɛ ɛ. Banɔaklɔ gi Mɔka abla izekɔɛ lɛ klɔ akɔ ɛ, ba ko biatani niklɔ kuze e.”
40020024	Agi badɔkpasi liɔfɔ gɔgɔ ba benu liboe le e, bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi ní beneminyime tiaʋa ba su.
40020025	Lɛ loso Yesu axwa badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlete si banama gi bizɛ ŋa banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma aʋa ɛ, bizɛɛŋa kuka ní ba aʋa, lɛ ba onu bezeze ba ɛ, bɛmɔ kigagla ní ba aʋa a.
40020026	Pɔ̀ líma si lize ní mlɔ kusi nite e. Lɛ loso xe mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔnɔ ʋidi i, lilɛ si oze ɔnɔsumu ɔki mlɔ bagɔgɔ ba;
40020027	Lɛ xe mlɔmɛ tole apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu i, lilɛ si oze ŋwisi ɔnɔ dzidzi kí mlɔ bagɔgɔ ba a.
40020028	Lilɛ si mlabitɛ nite lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ɔ́ba si besumu ye e, boŋu i, aba si tɔ yisumu atɔ yikɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛkɔ ɛki banɔ glegle ba ligbã kuzɛɛzɛ.”
40020029	Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛ sɛ ní Yerixo e linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize ni Yesu kude.
40020030	Lɛ benyime tiaʋa gi beze kuŋupo e, beze ní kudeo su, lɛ gi benu si Yesu azɛɛza ɛ, bekpese ozí kukpɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye, di blɔ asigaga.”
40020031	Linɔkpi le litɛni ba lɛ lisi ba si bagɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀, bɛkpɛ ozi gaglaa ɛsanɔ dzɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye e! Dí blɔ asigaga!”
40020032	Yesu alɛɛ, lɛ axwa ba xe eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki mlɔ ɔ?”
40020033	Bebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, kwipɛ si kí tɔ kumɔ!”
40020034	Yesu edi ba asigaga lɛ agbɔni ba bimbi ʋe e; kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, ba bimbi ʋe bidra, lɛ bekuni Yesu kude e.
40021001	Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beetipɔni Yerusalem i, bɛba ɛna Betfage ní olif ye ise le ketokpaa su. Niklɔ Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa ní ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ.
40021002	Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní ɔmaa nɔ klɔ gi ɔlɛ mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Xegi mleku ko e, mlaamɔ tedzi ɔtɔ gi bɛkpɛ ní ogbe no me nì Yebi ye. Mleble ʋa tɔ mlagbani ʋa amani mɛ.
40021003	Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ eʋi mlo liboetɔ ɛ, mlasi yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã ʋa a,’ nite si aayurɔ ba ɔki mlɔ kyɔŋ.”
40021004	Liba lɛ mɛ nite atɔ Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ yɛ eboe la aba la mɛ si:
40021005	“Mlasi Yerusalem ɔma ʋidi no me bezeze ba si, Mledi, mlɔ okusi ye atrába ní mlɔ klɔ! Epleni isu ya, lɛ ɔtini ní tedzi ni yebi ye aʋa.”
40021006	Nite si badɔkpasi tiaʋa ba bɛzɛ bitɛ kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba ɛ:
40021007	Begbani tedzi ye ni yebi ye manɔ, bɛkɔ ba bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛtrɔ ní ba aʋa lɛ Yesu emu atrɔ ɛ.
40021008	Banɔ glegle ni linɔkpi le me bebu ba bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛplɛ ní kudeo me, lɛ banɔatɔ fɛ bɛtsà kuwlakpasa ɛplɛ ní kudeo me ɛki yɛ tɔ ɔga ɛ.
40021009	Anɔkpi ala gi eze ní Yesu ɔtɔ nɔ ni yɛ kedea bekpese ɔsaye kukpɛ si, “Hosana ki Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye! Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ linyine me! Biakpɔ Aya ní Lifunu ne ɔgyɔgyɔ klɔ ke!”
40021010	Agi Yesu eti eku Yerusalem i, ɔma nɔ pɔ́ ɛkpa ge. Lɛ banima beʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ ya lee e?”
40021011	Lɛ linɔkpi le libu le onu si, “Yɛ onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ Yesu gi ádɔ ní Nazaret ní Galilea a.”
40021012	Yesu etiku ní Yerusalem Kasɔlipea mɛ lɛ akpikpini banama petee gi bɛɛda bidɔ mɛ ní banama gi beedzi bidɔ mɛ ni níklɔ ɛ. Ekyi banama gi bɛɛyaʋi bibɔ ʋɛ ba ikplɔ nɛ ewe e, lɛ etutru banama gi bɛɛda akpakpo la ba egbo la eʋe e.
40021013	Lɛ asi ba si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ni Aya yɛ liboe le me sì Aya apani sì, ‘Mɛ Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, biaxwa lɛ si, ligba gi biazesumu me ní lɛ mɛ ɛ. ‘Pɔ̀ mlɛ kɔ lɛ ɛbitɛ okpokɔ ki beze ba!”
40021014	Kuŋupoo ni banama gi báʋitani kuga ɛ, bɛba yɛ klɔ ní Kasɔlipea mɛ, lɛ ayɔ ni ba ɛ.
40021015	Kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi gi bɛmɔ enugutseboe ala gi azɛɛbitɛ ɛ, ni banuvɔ ba gi bɛzɛkpɛ ozi ní Kasɔlipea mɛ si, “Hosana kí Dawid yɛ lipo me Obi ye e!”
40021016	Lɛ loso beʋi Yesu si, “Dani woenu eboa la gi banuvɔ ba ya bɛɛpani i?” Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ee menu.” “Mlaʋíkla Aya liboe le oʋídi si, ‘Mlɛ basɛ banuvɔ ba nì bebi ba sì biaki kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ liɔ gi kwiflɔ na a?’ ”
40021017	Lɛ Yesu asɛ ní banima su ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ xe edo ní Yerusalem atrɛ ní Betania ɔma nɔ mɛ, niklɔ azɛɛfɛ.
40021018	Agi Yesu edziitrɛ Yerusalem keletitia livlɛ lɛ ɛ, kuʋe kwizeeku ye.
40021019	Amɔ ogbose ní kedèpɛa lɛ atrɛ ní lɔ su i, pɔ ɔ́mɔ lisebi tɔ́tɔ ni lɔ mɛ sani awlakpa tsali. Lɛ asi ose lo si, “Wɔtrayo esebi liwewe tɔ ɔ!” Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e ogbose lo etse.
40021020	Agi badɔkpasi ba bɛmɔ te e, ba inugu etse. Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kitɛ lize xe ogbose lo etse kpla te na a?”
40021021	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Matrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si, xe mlɛziŋa a xe mlɛ́keɖi i, mlaatani kidiliɛ gi mabitɛ aki ogbose lo e, kubitɛ. Aní lɛ tete, pɔ̀ mlaatani ketokpa lia ya kyɛ kusɛ si, ‘Kpaʋi tɔ zɛɛŋwia isu ya akpɛ ní axu la mɛ,’ lɛ lia ba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
40021022	Xegi mlɛziŋa ɛ, kidɔ kakaaɛ liɛ gi mlaʋi i xe mlɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlamɔ kɛ.”
40021023	Yesu edzi aba Yerusalem Kasɔlipea mɛ; lɛ gi azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, kusɔliɔ baka ba ni banɔ tsitsi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kigagla woli wɔmɔ xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kudeo?”
40021024	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Maʋi mlo liboe tile ko, lɛ xe mlebu le onu i kí mɛ ɛ, maasi mlɔ kigaglaɛ liɛ klɔ gi kilɛ mɛ awla xe mɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.
40021025	Nifɔ Yohanes yɛ kigaglɛ ki dɔ gi kɛ azɛɛkɔ akpɛ kuni yo aki banima: Aya klɔ loo banima klɔ na?” Lɛ bekpese eboe la kuŋwlɛ ní ba atsali kusi si, “Liboe woli lɛ kwiapani i? Xe kwibu le onu si, ‘Dɔni Aya kɔ ɛ,’ aaʋi blo si, ‘Kɔ ege lɛ loso mlázi Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ?’
40021026	Pɔ̀ xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni banɔ kɔ ɛ,’ kwise lifune kidiliɛ gi banima biabitɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba petee bɛzi lɛ si Yohanes onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ.”
40021027	Lɛ loso e, bebu le onu ki Yesu si, “Kúte.” Lɛ asi ba si, “Lɛ kɔ mɛ fɛ, mátrasi mlɔ, kigaglaɛ liɛ gi mɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.
40021028	Yesu ebu abee si, “Abla ɛ kitɛ mlegyo edi ni liboe lɛ ya su u? Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bebinyime tiaʋa beze ni yɛ awla a. Adzɛ otsitsi ye klɔ lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Mobi ye, trɛ tɔ zɛɛwa axwɛ na ní wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ omono.’
40021029	Ebu le onu si, ‘Mápɛ si miwa axwɛ,’ pɔ̀ lɛ kede e, ekyi yɛ kugyodi yo lɛ atrɛ ɛ.
40021030	Lɛ yɛka atrɛ ní obinyime ʋlaɛ klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ nite me liboe le ké. Ebu le onu si, ‘yoo, mɔka maadzɛ,’ pɔ̀ ɔ́dzɛ ɛ.
40021031	Ba tiaʋa ɛ, bamɛ owoli abitɛ ní yɛka kupɛpɛɔ aʋa na a?” Bebú le onu si, “Obinyime tsitsi ye.” Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba, mɛsi mlɔ si: babɔgyɔ ba ni bawawadze ba betu ɔtɔ ɛki mlɔ lɛ beti eku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.
40021032	Lɛ ese linu si gi Yohanes kuni yo okpɛkpɛɛ aba mlɔ klɔ xe azaabasɛ mlɔ kude gbã gi mlaga ɛ, mlázi yɛ aʋa ŋa; pɔ babɔgyɔ ba ni bawawadze ba bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa. Lɛ gi mlɛmɔ nite fɛ ɛ, mlékyi mlɔ begyodi ʋa xe mlazi yɛ aʋa ŋa a.
40021033	Yesu apani si, “Mlata kutu tɔ mlenu abee dzedze. Kese onete ɔtɔ eze, lɛ awà wain ɔnyrɔ ɔ, akpɛ kuka aklà ni lɔ̀, lɛ etu lizokpo akí wain yɛ kukakà ɛ, lɛ awa ɔnyrɔ nɔ bepepe ba ligba gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ ɛ. Lɛ ahayi wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akí ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba, lɛ atrɛ ní kude me e.
40021034	Agi lipoe le lina kí wain yɛ kugugu yɔ ɛ, akpɛ yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba atsisi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ atɔ bazɛ yɛ ɔgyɔ lɔ amani yɛ.
40021035	Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bevu yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba a, bekusi tole, beye ɔtɔ, lɛ bɛsa ɔtɔ fɛ akla na ɛ.
40021036	Onyimee edzi akpɛ yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dzedze batɔ gi bɛsrɛ sani batɔpu ba, lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛ bitɛ ba nite me ke.
40021037	Gɔgɔɛ, atsisi yebinyime ní baklɔ. Maka lɛ aʋa si, ‘biakpɛ kubùbù yo ní mobi ye su.’
40021038	Pɔ̀ gi ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛmɔ obinyime e, bɛpani ni bahanuglɔ ba kusi sì, ‘Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee Yebi ye iliɛ ya, yɛ atráŋa ɔnyrɔ nɔ. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye, atɔ kuzi yɛ ɔŋa klɔ!’
40021039	Nite si bɛ ʋã yɛ gbli, bu ye dono ní wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ beye ye e.
40021040	Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Abla xe wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aba ɛ, ege aabitɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ bepepe ba na a?”
40021041	Lɛ bebu le onu si, Lɛ mɛ lidra si aaye benyime zimizi ba klɔ ʋa, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aki ɔnyrɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze, gi bakɔ biakɔ yɛ ɔgyɔ lɔ mani yɛ xe wain yɛ ligúpoe le lina ɛ.”
40021042	Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaʋíkla e ʋidi ní Aya yɛ liboe le me si, ‘Likla ɛnɛ klɔ gi beglitrɔ ba begbe si líma ní liboeboe me e, lɛ lidzi likla veve le koŋ ní la petee kusi. Ɔkaɛ yɛ abitɛ lɛ nite; linu liboe gi litu blo kugyɔ ɔ!’
40021043	“Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ biazɛ ka ní mlɔ awla kɔ kí banama gi biayo esebi gbã na ɛ.”
40021044	“Ɔniliɛ gi aagleʋe dɔ ní likla ɛlɛ ya aʋa ɛ, avini kukpe kukpe. Pɔ̀ xe likla ɛ lɛ ya lia wɔli dɔ ɔnutɔ aʋa ɛ, liahɔ yɛ pliplipli.”
40021045	Agi Kusɔliɔ baka ʋidi ba ni Farisianɛ ma benu Yesu yɛ abee liɛ ɛ, betè si ba su azeegu kunugu yo,
40021046	lɛ loso bɛ pɛ si beevu ye. Pɔ̀ bezese linɔkpi le, gi lizi lɛ si Yesu onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ.
40022001	Yesu egu kunugu yo aki ba dzɛ ní abee ʋa mɛ si,
40022002	Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi nite gi okusi ɔtɔ eze e xe azɛɛgbani ɔdzɛ aki yebinyime e. Lɛ edu ɔdɔŋakplɔ aki banima a.
40022003	Akpɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba sì bazɛ si banɔxwaxwa ba tɔ baba kudzɛgbanɔɔ ɔdɔŋa klɔ, pɔ̀ bádimɛ ní lɛ aʋa a.
40022004	Lɛ loso akpɛ banɔsumu dzedze nì ole kí banɔxwaxwa ba si: ‘Mɛ ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ ni kidɔ kakaa kiflɔ; meyé mɛ egumenyime na nì ádzɛ la gi eku kumu yɔ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ kakaa kina a, mlaga ba ní kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le me.’
40022005	Pɔ̀ banɔxwaxwa ba báfuɛ ɛ, ba axwɛ na ɔza ko bezee di: batɔ bɛtrɛ ní ba inyrɔ nɛ mɛ, batɔ kyɛ bɛtrɛ ní ba axwɛ na mɛ,
40022006	lɛ banɔ gɔgɔ ba bevu yɛ banɔsumu ba, bebu kinie ɛki ba lɛ beye ba ɛ.
40022007	Isu iyeʋi okusi ye nyani nyani; niteme si akpɛ yɛ baguta ba lɛ beze ye banɔye ba klɔ ɔ xe bɛkani ba ɔma nɔ ɛ.
40022008	Lɛ axwa yɛ banɔsumu ba lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mɛ obi ye kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le lina, pɔ̀ banama gi maxwa ɛ bégyeno aki lɛ ɛ.
40022009	Le loso e, mlatsanì ɔma nɔ bede ʋa tɔ mlaxwa banima kisrɛsrɛ liɛ ko gi mlamɔ ɛ amani kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le me.
40022010	Niteme si banɔsumu ba bɛtrɛ ɔma nɔ enè na mɛ ni bede ʋa aʋa, lɛ bɛkpɛ banama gi bɛmɔ ɛ likpɔ, bagbã̀ ni banyaninyani pɔ́, niteme si, kudzɛgbanɔɔ kepea keyi ni banɔxwaxwa ba.
40022011	Pɔ̀ gi Okusi ye etiku tɔ yidi bababa ba ɛ, amɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔ́kpɛ kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwu le e.
40022012	Okusi ye eʋi ye si, ‘ɔʋia, kitɛ lize xe woti oku ní ya gi wɔ́kpɛ kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwu na a?’ Pɔ̀ onyimee óbu le onu u.
40022013	Lɛ okusi ye asi yɛ banɔsumu ba si, ‘Mlanya yɛ ikli ni iwla, tɔ mlakɔ yɛ aŋwia kpɛ oŋwe no ní litumu ne me. Niklɔ kubemi ni ene kutàtà kwiaze.’ ”
40022014	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Bɛxwa banɔ glegle pɔ̀ basisamiatɔ ko bebú ba mɛ ɛ.”
40022015	Lipoe tɔ kede, Farisianɛ ma bɛsɛ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ kunyanya tɔ bɛkɔ ɛ punu Yesu i vu gani beʋiʋi me.
40022016	Lɛ bɛkpɛ ba badɔkpasi ba ni banɔatɔ gi bɛdɔ Herodes yɛ likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ mɛ ní Yesu klɔ ɔ, lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite sì wónu ɔsia nɛ ɛ. Lɛ wɔ kudɔbasɛ yɔ kuli ní Aya yɛ kudeo aʋa ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ, wɔʋíkpɛ isu kunugu ní ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ begyodi ba su u, lɛ ese linu si wɔkɔ litɔtɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki ba ozekɔ
40022017	Si blɔ, kitɛ wogyodi? Liyɔ kedu ní blɔ ɔsã nɔ su si kutsa ɔgyɔ ɔki Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ loo kukí tsa na a?”
40022018	Pɔ̀ gi Yesu kɔɔ, ete ba batrɔtrɔ nyani nyani ʋa loso e, apani si, “Mlɔ banɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ ba! Ege lɛ loso mlɛpɛ si mlefeke me edi i?
40022019	Mlabasɛ mɛ kibɔ ɛ liɛ klɔ gi bizɛ kɔ ɛtsa ɔgyɔ lɔ ɛ!” Agi bɛkɔ kibɔɛ mani yɛ ɛ,
40022020	eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ aŋu mɛ ni linyi bɛ ya a?”
40022021	Bebu le onu si, “Kaisaro binɛ.” Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Nite kɔ ɛ, mlakɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Kaisaro kiniɛ akí Kaisaro, tɔ mlakɔ Aya kiniɛ akí Aya.”
40022022	Agi benu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, litu ba kugyɔ, lɛ bɛyurɔ yɛ xe bɛsɛ ɛ.
40022023	Ní liwe lɛ klɔ ke aʋa ɛ, Zadukianɛ batɔ gi bizedo si bekpo ʋa batrádzi ligbã́ tɔ ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ nì kuʋíʋi sì
40022024	“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose asi blɔ sì xe onyime ɔtɔ agbani ɔdzɛ pɔ̀ bápɔ bebi xe etse e, lilɛ si yɛ oneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi aki yɛ ɔtrɛtrɛɛ.
40022025	Abla ɛ, beneminyime tiegloele beze ní blɔ kusi. Otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ bebi xe etse e, lɛ ayurɔ yedze aki yeneminyime e.
40022026	Nite ke liba lɛ mɛ ɛki yeneminyime ʋla ɛ ní ɔtanɛ aʋa a, riɖiɖi kɔzɛna ogloele aʋa, ba tiegloele ba petee bɛgbani ɔdzɛɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́pɔ obi xe etse e.
40022027	Gɔgɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛɛ kyɛ etse.
40022028	Abla ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi bekpo ʋa biayɔ ɛ, ní banɔ tiegloele ba kusi bamɛ owoli yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze? Gi ba pɔ́ bɛgbani yɛ edi na a?”
40022029	Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mlɛ ta kese koŋ! Lɛ ese linu si mléte Aya yɛ liboe le loo Aya yɛ kigagla ɛ.
40022030	Lɛ ese linu si xe bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ xe bedzi ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba kinɛ ní lifunu ne lɛ batrá gbani badzɛ loo zeni benyime.
40022031	Ableke ní bekpo ʋa kuyɔyɔɔ su i, mlaʋíkla ʋídi liboe lɛ gi Aya asi mlɔ na a? Apani si,
40022032	‘Mɛ menu Aya akí Abraham, Aya akí Isak, ni Aya akí Yakob.’ Yɛ onu Aya akí banɔ gbagbe ba, aní kí bekpo ʋa.”
40022033	Agi linɔkpi le linu liboe le e, ba inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su.
40022034	Agi Farisianɛ ma benu si Yesu amwa ene na akpɛ Zadukianɛ ma onu i, bɛ kpɛ likpɔ,
40022035	lɛ ba mɛ tole, ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ekeni edi si yipunu yɛ ni kuʋiʋi.
40022036	Eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Ɔsã woli ɛsa kedzi kuzɛ na a?”
40022037	Yesu ebu le onu si, ‘Lɔ wɔka Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ pɔ́, ni wɔ esobo la petee, ani wɔ begyodi ʋa pɔ́.’
40022038	Lɔ ya onu ɔtɔpu nɔ gi ɛsa kedzi kuzɛ ní isã nɛ kusi i.
40022039	Ɔʋla lɔ gi eyi lo o lɔ onu si: ‘Lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ ɔtutɔ wɔ isu ya.’
40022040	Mose yɛ Isã nɛ pɔ́ nì Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ bɛ like ne lɛ ya.”
40022041	Agi Farisianɛatɔ bɛkpɛ likpɔ ɛ, Yesu eʋi ba si,
40022042	“Kitɛ mlebu ní Kristo su u? Nyaŋwɛ Yebi onu u?” Bebu le onu si, “Dawid yɛ lipo me obi onu.”
40022043	Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔlɔ ege lɛ loso Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛki si Dawid ɔxwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ’? Lɛ ese linu si Dawid apani si,
40022044	“Ɔka Aya asi mɛ Ɔkaɛ si: ‘Ze niya ní mɛ kaŋa mɛ kɔkpɛ ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi makɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kukpɛ ní wɔ kukliseo.’
40022045	Xe nite Dawid axwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ’, kɔ kitɛ mɛ Kristo aaze Dawid yɛ lipo me obi i?”
40022046	Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani le onu kubu kí Yesu u, lɛ dɔnɔ liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa kɔtsinɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani yɛ liboeboe kuʋi tɔ ɔ.
40023001	Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu apani aki anɔkpi la ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba si,
40023002	“Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma ba bɛki kigaglɛ tɔ bebu Mose isã nɛ ese.
40023003	Lɛ loso e, lilɛ si mlabitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi biasi mlɔ si mlabitɛ ɛ aʋa, tɔ mlezeni liboe kakaa gi biasi mlɔ si mlabitɛ kude e; pɔ̀ mlakikpasi ba kiboebitɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si baʋíga ní ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ aʋa a.
40023004	Ba isã nɛ ese kubùbù yo kuzɛɛkɔ si banima baʋítani lɛ aʋa kuga a, gi bilɛ ko ŋwisi adɔtu nyipu u gi bɛtrɔ ba kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ bápɛ si bɛkpɛ ɔwla tɔ béfeke loo tɔ bɛpɔni ba tɔ betu la a.
40023005	“Bizɛbitɛ liboe kakaa tɔ banima bamɔ ba. Mledi igɛmi nɛ gi bɛŋwlimi Aya liboe le ni lɛ aʋa a gi bizɛkɔ ɛ nya ba kutu yo, ni ba iwla lɛ, tɔ mlevu aŋu ní kiliɛ gi bikeme su i! Able mlevu aŋu dzɛ tɔ mledi kiliɛ gi ba igɛmi nɛ idze ní ba ewu la su i!
40023006	Bɛdimɛ ni izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní bidɔ mɛ iŋaklɔ nì egbo gbã na ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ;
40023007	Bízɛpɛ si ba pani ba nì kubùbù ní ene na mɛ nì tɔ baxwa ba si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ.’ Líma si baxwa mlɔ si.
40023008	“ ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ’ lɛ ese linu si mlɔ pɔ́ ɛ, benemi ko mlenu lɛ ɔdɔbasɛ tole ko ɔlɛ ní mlɔ awla.
40023009	Lɛ mlakíxwa ɔnɔnɔ ní kesea aʋa ya si, ‘Ɔka a’, lɛ ese linu si Ɔka tole ko ɔlɛ ní mlɔ awla ní lifunu ne.
40023010	Lɛ loso mlakíki si baxwa mlɔ si, ‘Ɔnɔgbanɔ’, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ ɔnɔgbanɔ tolee ko onu Kristo ye.
40023011	Lilɛ si, ɔnɔ ʋidi ye ní mlɔ kusi i, yɛ oze mlɔ ɔnɔsumu ye.
40023012	Ɔniliɛ gi aabitɛ isu ya ɔnɔ ʋidi i, Aya aaple ni ye lɛ ɔniliɛ gi aaple ni isu ya ɛ, Aya aamu ni ye.
40023013	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlɛda lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa opupo lo ekpɛ banima lɛ mlɔ ɔtutɔ pɔ̀ mlaʋíti iku u, lɛ mlaʋíki si banama gi beekeni idi i kyɛ, si beti eku u!
40023014	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba. Mlɛtrɛ ní batrɛtrɛ ba bedze ba klɔ si mlɛɛpɔni ba, pɔ̀ kɔ ɛ, mlemeni ba kɔ mlɛzi ba kudɔkpa ɛ. Kɔ lɛ kede kɔ mlalɛ ni banima aŋu na mɛ, kɔ mlɛɛxwa Aya lipoe gblamadza tɔ mlɛkɔ emeni ba. Mlɔ kutuhehe o kɔ kwianyani sanɔ.
40023015	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlɛdzi kaale ni kaʋa tɔ mleekyi ɔnɔ, pɔ̀ xe mlemɔ ɔnɔ ɛki Aya ɛ, kɔ mlɛbitɛ yɛ ɔnɔ zimizi gi aasɔ̀ ni kifumoni ye me sani mlɔ tutɔ lɔ ɛ!
40023016	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ kuŋupoo, gi mlɛɛgbani banima ɛ! Mlɛɛbasɛ si, ‘Xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, kitamu yɛ kínya yɛ; pɔ̀ xe aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ sika ɛ, kɔlɔ kitamu yɛ kinya yɛ.’
40023017	Kuŋupo ni baga! Liwoli lisa ɛveve e, sika yɛ loo Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ gi lɛ liki si sika yɛ su adra na a?
40023018	Mlɛɛbasɛ dzɛ si, ‘Xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ɛ, ɔsã nɔ óvu ye e; pɔ̀ xe aka kitamu ni bidɔ kɔkɔ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ aʋa ɛ, kitamu yɛ kivu ye.’
40023019	Kitɛ mlɔ bimbi ʋe bini te! Biwoli bísaɛ veve e, bidɔkɔkɔ ʋɛ loo ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ gi lɔ ɛki bidɔkɔkɔ ʋɛ su bidra na a?
40023020	Niteme si, xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu nì ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ɛ, aka kitamu ni ɔsuʋɔ lɔ ni kidɔ kakaa gi bɛki ní lɔ aʋa ɛ;
40023021	lɛ xe aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, aka kitamu yɛ ni lɛ ni Aya, gi yɛ yɛ̀ ozekɔ ɛ;
40023022	lɛ xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni lifunu ne e, aka kitamu ni Aya yɛ likusigbo le ni Aya gi yɛ odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ.
40023023	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ! Mlɛzɛɛki Aya oni me bikpɛdɔ flafla dɔni mlɔ inyɔ nɛ mɛ bɛ kapɛ liɔfɔa, pɔ̀ mlɛyurɔ Ɔsã nɔ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ bɛ likenè ŋwisi, eboe me kutsatsa gbã, asigagadidi ni kuʋaziŋa. Mlabitɛ ní la ya aʋa pɔ̀ mlakiyurɔ agɔgɔ la a.
40023024	Kuŋupo banɔgbanɔ ba! Mlɛyurɔ eboe nyipu nyipu na lɛ mleeti eboe fiteete la xunyɔ ɛ!
40023025	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mleplo mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kuzi yo kedea, pɔ̀ kɔmɛ kwiyi ni bidɔ bɛ klɔ gi mlɛzɛ ni kigagla ni kuŋazi i.
40023026	Wɔ Farisiɔnɛ! kaŋupo! Plo kepliʋia ni kezia mɛ gbã, kɔ ka kedea kyɛ kɛdra ɛ!
40023027	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlalɛ ŋwisi idrɔ lɛ gi bedzà akalo ekɔ kinɛ, gi iipedi ní oge no o pɔ̀ ni kimɛ mɛ kɔ ɛ, iyí ni bekpo ba axwa ni bidɔ fumufumu.
40023028	Niteme ké, ní oge no e, mlɛŋwi kí ɔnɔ kakaa sì mlɛpɛ̀, pɔ̀ ní kimɛ mɛ ɛ, mleyi ni aŋu mɛ kiboebitɛ ni etukpo me gagla.
40023029	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba, Mlɛwa Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba idrɔ lɛ, lɛ mlɛlulɔ banɔ gbã ba idrɔ lɛ kyɛ ɛ;
40023030	Lɛ mlɛsi isu ya si, atɛsi kwize blɔ baka ba lipoe le e, nya kúkpɛ inugu ni Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba kuyeye me.
40023031	Nite si mlɛzi lɛ si mlɔ mlenu besoebi ba aki banama gi bá beye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba a!
40023032	Kɔlɔ mlatrɛ ní lɛ aʋa, tɔ mlagù eboa la gi mlɔ bakatsitsi ba bekpese e!
40023033	Mlɔ bagblaga ʋa ni bagblaga bebi ʋa! Kitɛ mlegyo edi si mlaase ní lipɔ bubu le gi liakpɛ mlɔ ní kifumoni ye me na a?
40023034	Lɛ loso e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si mɛɛtsisi mlɔ Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ni beboete ba ani badɔbasɛ ba; mlɛtraye bátɔ, ku batɔ ni ise su, mlafiaʋi batɔ biseʋi ni Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ, lɛ mlakpikpini batɔ dɔni ɔma mɛ kɔtsinɔ ɔma mɛ ɛ.
40023035	Gani lɛ mɛ ɛ, kutuhehe kí banɔgbã̀ ba gi mleye e, kwiaba mlɔ aʋa, dɔni Abel dradra yɛ aʋa kɔzɛna ni Zakaria Baraxya yebinyime gi mleye ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ ni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ kusi i aʋa.
40023036	Mɛɛsi mlɔ ní lɛ mɛ si: sugba ɛ, kutuhehe kí kunɔye uliɔ pɔ́ kwiba mlɔ abla bebi ba pɔ́ aʋa a!
40023037	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Wɔ gi wòye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba, xe wɔ̀sa Aya yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba gi atsisi wɔ ɛ, akla na! Tasɛ mapɛ si mikpɛ wɔ bebi ba likpɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkukɔne lɔ izeewe lɔ bebi ʋa ni siwlasasa sɛ, pɔ̀ wɔ́ki mɛ kude e!
40023038	Dike, Aya edo ní mlɔ lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ loso e lilɛɛ ki mlɔ pluplu.
40023039	Dɔnɔ abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, mɛsi mlɔ si, mlatrámɔ mɛ tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi mlaapani si, ‘Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e.’ ”
40024001	Gi Yesu edo ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ xe azaasɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beti i pɔni yɛ si tɔ odi ligba lɛ
40024002	Lɛ asi ba si, “Ee, pɔ̀ mlɛɛmɔ agba la ya petee e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, sugba ɛ, akla ana petee biatsra la, lɛ litɔtɔ lítrawɔ ní litɔtɔ aʋa a.”
40024003	Lɛ kede agi Yesu odi ni olif ye ise le lito le aʋa ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beti apɔni yɛ, lɛ beʋi ye si “Si blɔ lipoe lɛ gi eboa la petee aaba la mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kidiliɛ gi kiabu wɔ kubabaa ni kelea lidu le kubasɛ ɛ.”
40024004	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ, tɔ mlakíki ɔnɔnɔ omeni mlo.
40024005	Banɔ glegle biaba ní mɛ linyi ne me si, ba benu Kristo ye gi biameni banɔ glegle e.
40024006	Mlaanu bigu ʋɛ ni agutaboe la onu ní idzage ne, pɔ̀ mledi lɛ aʋa si lifu likíku mlo, eboa la elu aaba la mɛ, pɔ̀ kelea lidupoe le liʋína a.
40024007	Kese kiayɔ kedu ní kese su, lɛ kukusi kwiata kigũ ni kukusi, kuʋɛ kwiadɔ lɛ kese kiahwa ni ikɔ glegle e.
40024008	Bɛya elue biaze ŋwisi kuyeʋiyeʋi ní kubipɔ mɛ.
40024009	Lɛ biabu mlo kɔ si tɔ behe kutu aki mlɔ nì tɔ beye mlo, lɛ kelea pɔ kiatrɔ mlɔ ahwafi kɔkpɛ mɛ loso o.
40024010	Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle biayurɔ ba kuziŋaa. Lɛ biatrɔ ba ahanuglɔ ba ahwafi, biabu ba ahanuglɔ ba kukɔ.
40024011	Niteme si asia na beboedoplɛ ba biaŋwi gi biameni banɔ glegle e.
40024012	Ɔkpɛ gi kuzimizi yo kwiasrɛ onu i, banɔ glegle ba kunɔdimɛnɔɔ onu kwiayɔ.
40024013	Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aalɛ kɔzɛna ni lɛ ɔgù klɔ ɛ, Aya aabu ye.
40024014	Lɛ Liboe Gbã nɛ ní Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa gi kɛtraba su i, biapani lɛ klanɔ ní kelea mɛ petee gi liaki kudeonu si ɔnɔ kakaa aanu le e, xe ableke kelea kia gu u.
40024015	Lɛ loso e, “Mletramɔ, ‘Litugu ne ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ’ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi oboedoplɛɛ Daniel apani i. Litralɛɛ ní ɔdradra klɔ.” ɔdɔkla yɛ ovu aŋu tɔ onu liboe lɛ ya ese.
40024016	“Kɔlɔ ɛ, banama gi bali ní Yudea kesea mɛ ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ.
40024017	Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔkizizi lipoe si yiple eku kepea mɛ tɔ yizɛɛkɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ.
40024018	Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔkidzi itrɛ kepea si yatrɛɛkɔ yɛ ewu la a.
40024019	Liaze gagla ɛki bamɛdzɛ ba nì bebi ne ba ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ!
40024020	Mleʋi Aya tɔ mlɔ kuseseo kukídɔ ní kublɔ lipoe le loo ní isu mɛ liyɔwe le aʋa!
40024021	Lɛ ese linu si kupepeo ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, kwianyani sani kuliɔ gi kwiba edi i dɔni kelea mɛ okpese klɔ kɔna ni omono e. Lɛ kɔ elu kutrába liwewe tɔ ɔ.
40024022	Pɔ̀ Aya atí ní ewe la aʋa kooko; xe ɔ́bitɛ nite e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́traze ligbã. Kɔkpɛ yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba, loso e Aya atráti ní ewe la aʋa.
40024023	“Niteme si, xe ɔnutɔ asi wɔ si, ‘Di, imɔ Kristo ye ní ya!’ loo imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ ɛ!’ wukízɛ yɛ aʋa ŋa a.
40024024	Nite si basia nɛ ba gi biaba ní mɛ linyi ne me si ba benu Kristo ye ni banama gi biayɔ ɔlɛɛ si benu beboedoplɛ; xe biabitɛ enugutseboe ni eboe gi banɔ bámɔedii tɔ bɛkɔ emeni Aya yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba, xe liasɔnɔ ɛ.
40024025	Mlata kutu! Masi mlɔ xe ableke lipoe le liana a.
40024026	“Lɛ loso e, xe banima biasi mlɔ si, ‘Dike, aŋwi ní ɔyaya klɔ ɛ’ mlakídzɛ niklɔ; loo xe bɛpani si, ‘Dike, ɔkpasi ligba ɛ lɛ ya mɛ ɛ!’ mlakízi lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa.
40024027	Lɛ ese linu si, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, aaba ŋwisi dzeni kifububu dɔni kewetu ya gi kizɛŋwi ni keweku ya kinɛ ɛ.
40024028	“Niklɔ gi bidɔ tsetse ʋe bifini i, niklɔ opéte ʋa bizɛkpɛ likpɔ.
40024029	“Kyɔŋ ní baxixa ba klɔ ʋa kede e, liwo le liamɔni kuyi lɛ kanɔa mɛ kialɔsi, ɔdzidzi yɛ kyɛ ɔ́trakle tɔɔ, aŋwi na aawɔli, lɛ Aya aasugu kidɔ kakaa ni lifunu ne.
40024030	Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kubaba gyesi ye aaŋwi ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ; lɛ banima pɔ́ ní kesea aʋa biabemi gi bɛmɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi atrába ní lifunu ne aplɛ la mɛ ni kigagla ani kusudra glegle.
40024031	Nite si aatsisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ni kakuklui ole gagla ni kelea mɛ akɔtɔ tene la pɔ́ aʋa, lɛ biaxogo yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba dɔni kelea mɛ kapɛ tiele tsini ka kapɛ ʋla.
40024032	Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Mlaki tɔ ogbose lo ɔbasɛ mlɔ bidɔ, xe lɔ aya la alɛ wɔwɔ, xe ose lo ɛɛtuma ɛ, kɔlɔ mlete si kedzenilea keti pɔnɔ.
40024033	Niteme ke xe mlɛɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, mlete si lipoe le lina, lɛ lina kevunu ya a.
40024034	Mlaplɛ aŋu si eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ, xe ableke banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ biatse.
40024035	Lifunu ne nì kesea biaza, pɔ̀ me eboe la atráza liwewe e.
40024036	“Ɔnɔnɔ ote, liwe le loo ɔnyɔsasa nɔ, Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne loo Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ béte e, Ɔka Aya tete ko ete.
40024037	Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kubaba ɛ, kwiaze ko ŋwisi nite gi lize ní Noa lipoe le me e.
40024038	Kpɛ ɔtɔ kí kuni yiyio e, banima bɛzɛŋa, lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ kyɛ, benyime nì badzɛ bɛzɛgbani baglɔ ʋa, kɔzɛna nani liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa gi Noa emu eku ní onitsahu lo me e.
40024039	Pɔ̀ bamɔ liboe lɛ gi lizɛba egyesi kɔzɛna nani lipoe lɛ gi kuni yiyio kwiba ɛgba ba ɛsɛ nɔ ɛ. Nite ké litraze xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba a.
40024040	Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, benyime tiaʋa biazɛwa axwɛ ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ, biasɛ ni tole, lɛ ɔʋla ɛ, biayurɔ yɛ ɛ.
40024041	Lɛ badzɛ tiaʋa biaze ní lihɔkla nɛ aʋa a; biasɛ ni tole, pɔ̀ ɔʋla ɛ, biayurɔ yɛ.
40024042	“Lɛ loso e, mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ, lɛ ese linu si mléte liwe lɛ klɔ gi mlɔ Ɔkaɛ aaba a.
40024043	Xe kepea ɔkaɛ ete elesi la lipoe lɛ klɔ gi oze ye aaba ɛ, wɔaka ní lɛ aʋa si aaze ni aŋu, lɛ ɔ́traki kude xe oze ye aatiku ní yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ.
40024044	Lɛ loso e, mlɔ fɛ mlabla aplɛ, lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ aʋa gi mlaʋídi yɛ kudeo onu i.
40024045	“Nite kɔ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ onu ɔnɔsumu gbã nì oboete e? Yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ɔkaɛ akɔ edu ní banɔsumu dzedze ba onu u, tɔ aaki ba bá kiŋaŋaɛ ni lipoe le aʋa.
40024046	Liaku ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ isami xe yɛ ɔkaɛ adziba tsani yɛ gi eedi kepea aʋa mumɔ ɛ!
40024047	Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si, yɛ ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ du ní yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee onu.
40024048	Pɔ̀ xe onu ɔnɔsumu nyani nyani i, aasi isu ya sì, yɛ ɔkaɛ ɔ́tratsɔ odzi i,
40024049	kɔ ekpese yɛ bahanuglɔ banɔsumu ba kukusi, lɛ aaŋa kɔ aŋwɛ ni badaŋwɛmu ba ɛ.
40024050	Xe ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ yɛ ɔkaɛ aadzi i liwe lɛ gi odi yɛ kudeo onu i, ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ gi óte aʋa ɛ.
40024051	Yɛ ɔkaɛ aatsà yɛ kukpe kukpe lɛ aaki si yɛ nì banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba biaze ní kakpá tiele me. Niklɔ aabemi xe aata yɛ ene na a.
40025001	“Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kiaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi idisami liɔfɔ ikɔ lɛ kani ʋa a, xe itrɛ si lɛzɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi ɛgbani ɔdzɛ kinɛ ɛ.
40025002	Bamɛ tietsu beze kunukpadze, lɛ tietsu gɔgɔ ba beze beboete e.
40025003	Idisami kunukpadzeo kwikɔ lɛ kani ʋa pɔ̀ kúvu kumu ipɔnɔ ɔ.
40025004	Pɔ̀ idisami beboete ba ɛ, bevu kumu ní kuʋeo me epɔni ba kani ʋa.
40025005	Ɔdzɛnyee ɔ́tsɔ kuba a, liki si sra si mu idisami nɛ, lɛ iku sra mɛ ɛ.
40025006	“Elesi la tetsu i, ozi lo eyi si, ‘ɔdzɛnyee aba loo. Mledo aba tsani yɛ!’
40025007	Lɛ idisami liɔfɔ lɛ inyime e, lɛ imuni lɛ kani ʋa kuklekleo e.
40025008	Lɛ idisami kunukpadzeo kwisi beboete ba si, ‘Mlapɔli mlɔ kumu kutɔ aki blɔ ɔ; blɔ kani ʋa bíha kuni.’
40025009	Idisami beboete ba bebu le onu si ‘Owo!’ ‘kumu liɔ gi kuli ní blɔ awla ɛ, kútrana blɔ nì mlɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso e, mlaze ebu aki isu ya ní kɔ badàdà ba klɔ ɔ.’
40025010	Pɔ̀ gi idisami kunukpadzeo kwitrɛ ní kumu yɔ obu klɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛnyee aba eku, lɛ idisami titsu i lɛ gi ize kublabla mɛ itiku ní ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ nì ɔdzɛnyee, lɛ bɛda opupo lo e.
40025011	Lɛ kede e, idisami gɔgɔ lɛ iba lɛ ikla ɛtsisi si ‘Ɔka, ɔka! Dra opupo lo ki blɔ ɔ!’
40025012	Pɔ̀ ɔdzɛnyee ebu le onu si mɛɛsi mlɔ si, méte mlo.”
40025013	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ abee si lɛ loso e, mleze ni aŋu lɛ ese linu si mléte liwe le e loo ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɔ, gi maadziba ɛ.
40025014	“Yesu atrɛ ni yɛ abee ba aʋa si dzɛ, lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kiaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛsɛ atrɛ ni kude me e xe axwa yɛ besumu bi ʋa a, lɛ akɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ akpɛ ni ba awla kinɛ ɛ.
40025015	Aki ɔkakaa ní yɛ kutanɛɔ onu. Aki ɔnɔ tole kibɔ ikotoku titsu, aki ɔnɔ ʋla yɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa, lɛ aki odzedze kibɔ okotoku tole e. Lɛ asɛ atrɛ ní yɛ kudeo me e.
40025016	Niteme si, osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu le e, akɔ yɛ kibɔe akpɛ ní axwɛwawa mɛ, lɛ amɔ kibɔ ikotoku titsu atrɔ ɛ.
40025017	Nite ke osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa lɛ ɛ abitɛ, lɛ yɛ kyɛ amɔ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa atrɔ ɛ.
40025018	Pɔ̀ osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ okotoku tole lo e, asɛ lɛ azeetu lizokpo le, lɛ ekpo yɛ ɔkaɛ yɛ kibɔɛ ɛ.
40025019	“Lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ kede e, besumubi ba ɔkaɛ edzì niteme si eʋi ba kiliɛ gi bɛwa kibɔɛ su axwɛ ɛ.
40025020	Osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu le e, akɔ kibɔ ikotoku titsu dzedze apɔnɔ lɛ ebu lɛ mɛ si, ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ, wɔki mɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu, Di titsu ilɛ ya gi lɛ mamɔ atrɔ ɛ.’
40025021	Lɛ yɛ ɔkaɛ apani si, ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wɔpɛ, wonu osumubi gbã, wodo anukwarɛ nì kibɔ sisami liɛ ya, madu wo ní eboe ʋidi onu. Ba tɔ gamɔ isami ni mɛ!’
40025022	Lɛ osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa lɛ kyɛ ɛ, aba lɛ apani si ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ, wɔkɔ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa kpɛ mɛ awla, pɔ̀ mamɔ ikotoku tiʋa apɔni lɛ ɛ.’
40025023	“Yɛ ɔkaɛ edo si ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wonu osumubi gbã, wodo anukwarɛ nì kibɔ sisami liɛ ya. Madu wo ní eboe glegle onu. Ba tɔ gamɔ isami nì mɛ!’
40025024	“Lɛ kede e osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ okotoku tole kyɛ aba a, lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔka mete si ɔnɔ gagla wonu gi wɔlɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi izɛ kɔ bidɔ ɛdɔni níklɔ gi ɔ́kpɛ kididɔ ɛ, le wuzɛɛŋwlɛ̃ bidɔ gi bínu wɔ binɛ ɛ.
40025025	Nite si mese lifu lɛ mazeekpo wɔ kibɔ ɛ ni sise se me. Ɔka di imɔ wɔ kibɔɛ, zikɛ ɛ.’
40025026	“Lɛ ɔkaɛ apani si, ‘Wɔ ɛ, ɔ́flɔ ni litukpo me gagla osumubi wonu, kɔ wote si mizeebu bidɔ niklɔ gi mákpɛ kididɔ ɛ, lɛ mizɛɛŋwlɛ bidɔ eŋa ní níklɔ gi mehle kididɔ ɛ
40025027	Agi wote si nite malɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso wɔ́kɔ mɛ kibɔɛ ɔzɛɛkɔ ɔkpɛ ní kibɔɛ ɔbla klɔ ɔ, xe kiapɔ trɔ kímɛ, xe ableke madzi na a.’
40025028	“ ‘Abla ɛ, mlazi kibɔ okotoku tole lo ní yɛ awla tɔ mlakɔ kɛ aki kibɔ ikotoku liɔfɔ lɛ onete e.
40025029	Ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ awla gi kidɔ kilɛ ɛ, biapɔnɔ ɔki yɛ, tɔ aamɔ sanɔ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, kisisami liɛ gi kiliɛ yɛ awla ɛ, biazɛ kɛ.
40025030	Osumubi ɔ́flɔ liɛ ya xunyɔ ɛ mlebu yɛ aŋwia kpɛ oŋwe no ní litumu ne me. Niklɔ aabemi xe aazeɔta yɛ ene na.’
40025031	“Xegi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba ni sikusi me ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba petee, aaze ní yɛ likusigbo le aʋa,
40025032	nite si kelea mɛ banima petee biaxogo ba ni yɛ aŋu na mɛ. Kɔ alɛ bamɛ ní kupɛ tuʋa ɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ ko gi oʋesi gbanɔ yɛ izeebu iʋesi le lidze ni bamu ʋa su kinɛ ɛ.
40025033	Aadu banama gi bɛbitɛ ní yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛ, ni yɛ kaŋaa mɛ, kɔ atsini bagɔgɔ ba ni yɛ kaba mɛ.
40025034	Kɔ Okusi ye asi yɛ kaŋaa mɛ bezeze ba si, ‘Mlaba, mlɔ Mɔka akrira, mlagazɛ mlɔ ɔŋa klɔ ni kaʋaŋaa gi abla aplɛ kimlɔ dɔni kelea likpese le e.
40025035	Gi kuʋɛɔ kwize kume e, mlɛki mɛ kiŋaŋa, olile ezeku me lɛ mlɛki mɛ kuni; Meze ɔbaba lɛ mlɛzi mɛ kpɛ mlɔ kupeo me.
40025036	Meze ni liya lɛ mlɛkpɛ kusa ní mɛ su i; Mazɛɛnya lɛ mledi mɛ aʋa ɛ, gi meze ligba fɛ ɛ, mlɛba edi me.’
40025037	Nite si banama gi bɛbitɛ Aya kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a biabu le onu ki yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, lipoe woli kwimɔ wɔ gi kuʋɛ kwizeeku wo o xe kwiki wɔ kiŋaŋa a, loo olile ezeku wo o xe kwiki wɔ kuni na a?
40025038	Lɛ lipoe woli kwimɔ wɔ gi woze ɔbaba xe kwizi wɔ ɛkpɛ blɔ kupeo me e loo woze ni liya xe kwikpɛ kusa ni wɔ su u?
40025039	Lɛ lipoe woli kwimɔ si wɔ isu mɛ igɔ ɔ, loo woze ligba, xe kwiba edi wo o?’
40025040	Nite si Okusi ye aabu le onu si, ‘Mɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, lipoe kakaa gi mlɛbitɛ nite me eboa la elu ɛki mɛ benemi ba ya mɛ tole e gi ɔnɔnɔ oʋíbù i, mɛ mlɛbitɛ lɛ ɛkɔ.’
40025041	“Kɔ asi banama gi bali ní yɛ kabãa mɛ si, ‘Mlaseza ní mɛ su, mlɔ Aya exo ifi le akpɛ. Mlazatrɛ ní kifumoni ye gi bɛkpɛ plɛ kí Ozimizi ye ni yɛ bapɔnɔpɔnɔ ba mɛ ɛ!
40025042	Kuʋɛ kwiku me pɔ̀ mlɛda aŋu na mláki mɛ kiŋaŋa a, olile eku me mláki mɛ kuni i;
40025043	Meze ɔbaba pɔ̀ mlazi mɛ akpɛ mlɔ kupeo me e. Meze ni liya mlegbe mlákpɛ kusa mɛ su u. Gi mazɛɛnya ɛ xe meze ligba kyɛ ɛ, mlákɔ litɔtɔ ní le mɛ aki mɛ ɛ.’
40025044	Kɔ banima bebu le onu ki yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, lipoe woli koŋ kwimɔ wɔ gi kuʋɛ kwiku wo, loo olile ezeku wo, loo woze ɔbaba, woze ni liya, wɔ isu ya mɛ igɔ ɔ, loo woze ní ligba xe kwikyí kede kpɛ wɔ na a?’
40025045	Niteme si Okusi ye aasi ba si, ‘Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, lipoe kakaa ɛ lɛ gi mlegbe xe mlapɔni mɛ benemi ba ya gi ɔnɔnɔ óʋibu i, mɛ mlapɔnɔ.’
40025046	“Lɛ loso biatsisi ba ní kutuhehe moblomoblo me e. Kɔ bɛtsisi banama gi bɛbitɛ ni Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, ní ligbã moblo le me e.”
40026001	Agi Yesu agù yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ bɛ ya petee e, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si;
40026002	“Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlete plɛ kinɛ ɛ, betráŋa kutseo lidɔzawe le ní ewe taʋa kede. Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla tɔ beku ye ní ose lo su.”
40026003	Nite me si kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsa ní Kayafa gi yɛ onu kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ,
40026004	lɛ bɛbitɛ batrɔtrɔ níklɔ si biavu Yesu ní kikpokpo me tɔ biaye ye.
40026005	Pɔ̀ bɛpani si “lima si kwiabitɛ lɛ ní liweŋaŋa lɛ mɛ” “xe aníte e banima biayɔ kedu.”
40026006	Yesu eze ní Betania ní onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si, Simon gi anya kunya kyikyi yɔ kepea mɛ.
40026007	Gi azɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ aba yɛ klɔ gi evu alabasta keʋe gi kamɛ kumu flafla a gi kwizi kedzi i, kwize; lɛ ɔdzɛɛ ekyi kumu yɔ abali yɛ litukpo le.
40026008	Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beyeʋi isu gi bɛmɔ nite e, lɛ beʋi si “Ege lɛ loso ezizi kumu yɔ nite e?”
40026009	“Nya biatani kumu liɔ kudà kedzi ʋidi gi biakɔ kibɔɛ ɔki bepiplinete ba xe e!”
40026010	Yesu ete liboe lɛ gi bɛzɛ pani, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege kunugu mlɛkpɛ ɔdzɛ liɛ ya,? Kidɔ gbã gi ki gyeno e, kɛ abitɛ aki mɛ.
40026011	Bepiplinete ba bali mlɔ kusi liwe kakaa, pɔ̀ mátraze mlɔ su lipoe kakaa.
40026012	Kumu yɔ gi abali mɛ aʋa te e kɔ akɔ abla mɛ kisugyaɛ aki mɛ kuviveo.
40026013	Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si ɔkɔ kakaa gi biapani Aya liboe le ni kelea mɛ ɛ, biapani ní kidiliɛ gi ɔdzɛ liɛ abitɛ su tɔ biakɔ lɛ plɛ aŋu ni yɛ aʋa a.”
40026014	Lɛ kede e, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bamɛ tole gi yɛ bizɛxwa si Yuda Iskariot i, atrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ba klɔ
40026015	lɛ eʋi ba si, “Xe gi mebu Yesu akɔ kimlɔ ɛ, ege mlaki mɛ ɛ?” Lɛ bɛkla kibɔ pititi yɛ avitata kɔ ɛki yɛ.
40026016	Dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Yuda azaapɛ kudeonu gi akɔ Yesu kukpɛ awla ki ba ɛ.
40026017	Ni Akla mɔnyasi na liwe tɔpu nɛ aʋa ɛ, badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔ̀pɛ si kululɔ plɛ ki kutse lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ kí wɔ na a?”
40026018	Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní onyime ɔtɔ klɔ ní ɔma ʋidi no me, tɔ mlasi yɛ si; ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ apani si, Mɛ ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna; mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaŋa Kutse lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ní wɔ́ kepea mɛ ɛ.’ ”
40026019	Lɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛbitɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛbla Kutseo lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ plɛ ɛ.
40026020	Gi kulagɔ kwina ɛ Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba beple eze ní kezia ese e.
40026021	Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu apani si “mɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, mlɔ mɛ tole atrákpɛ mɛ awla.”
40026022	Liki si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛpisa, lɛ bekpese ye kuʋí tole tole si, “Ɔkaɛ, maka si aní mɛ wɔɛsɛ ɛ?”
40026023	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlɔ mɛ liɛ gi ɛkpɛ awla kezia mɛ ni mɛ ɛ, yɛ atrábu me kɔ.
40026024	Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya liboe le lipani i kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ líaze gagla ki ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aabu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukɔ ɛ. Xegi baxà ɔniliɛ klɔ apɔ kura ɛ, liapɛ ki yɛ sanɔ ɔ!”
40026025	Lɛ Yuda gi yɛ atrákpɛ yɛ awla ɛ, eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, dani aní mɛ ɛ?” Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wɔ́ wɔɛpani nite.”
40026026	Agi bɛzɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu akɔ lìklã nɛ, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e, xe ayaʋi lɛ ɛ. Lɛ akɔ lɛ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlazɛ atà; lɛ lìnu mɛ kisugyaɛ.”
40026027	Lɛ kede e, akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lɛ edo ɖase e ní ka aʋa xe, akɔ ka aki ba si, “Mlɔ pɔ́ mlaŋwɛ ní ka onu.”
40026028	“Bɛ ya binu mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛkɔ e du kunyanya vuvu yɔ ní Aya ni yɛ banima kusi, mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛbali ní banɔ glegle ba eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ litukpo o.
40026029	Mɛsi mlɔ si, Mátraŋwɛ wain liɛ tɔɔ kɔzɛna nì liwe lɛ gi maaŋwɛ wain yɛ dzɛ nì mlɔ ní Mɔka Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
40026030	Lɛ gi bɛza ɔdzi tole e, bedo etrɛ ní Olif ye ise le ketokpa aʋa a.
40026031	Lɛ Yesu apani asi ba si, “Omono elesi ala ya ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaase yurɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le lipani si: “ ‘Aya aaye oʋesi gbanɔɛ, kɔ iʋesi le isehle e.’
40026032	“Pɔ̀ xegi mayɔ ádɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, maaku mlɔ ɔtɔ trɛ ní Galilea.”
40026033	Lɛ Petro ebu le onu aki Yesu si, “Xe banima pɔ́ bese yurɔ wɔ kura kyɛ ɛ, mátradzi kede ní wɔ su liwewe e!”
40026034	Yesu asi Petro si, “Sugba ɛ, katsaa gi ɔkukɔ lɔ si loeme elesi la ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me.”
40026035	Lɛ Petro ebu le onu si, “Xe liaze si beye me apɔni wɔ kyɛ ɛ, mátranada si mete wo!” Lɛ badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba kyɛ bɛpani nite ke e.
40026036	Lɛ Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Getsemane e, lɛ asi ba si, “Mleze ní ya tɔ mitrɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ kɔlɔ tɔ mizɛɛxwa Aya.”
40026037	Agba ni Petro ni Zebedeo yɛ bebinyime tiaʋa ba evu. Enu kuyeʋiyeʋi lɛ isu ikpese yɛ asigaga la kuga ɛ,
40026038	lɛ asi ba si, “mɛ esobo la ɛxixa gbɛgbɛ nite si míhatse. Mleze nì aŋu nì mɛ ní ya.”
40026039	Agi atrɛ ni ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ɛ, adɔ nì yɛ aŋu na mɛ ní kesea. Lɛ aki Aya litukpo si, “Mɔka, xe liapɛ ɛ, tɔ ti ɔzia nɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ní mɛ aʋa! Pɔ̀ aní kiliɛ gi mapɛ pɔ̀ bitɛ ní wɔ kupɛ́pɛɔ onu u.”
40026040	Lɛ gi edzi aba ní badɔkpasi tiata ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si bɛdɔ sra, lɛ eʋi Petro si “kɔ mlɔ tiata mlatrátani aŋu kuze ni mɛ ɔnyɔsasa tole kpoo na a?
40026041	Mlezè ni aŋu tɔ mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíku ní kufekedi me. Nya Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛdimɛ xe e pɔ̀ kisugyaɛ kibotso o.”
40026042	Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya kuʋla si, “Mɔka, xe lítrasɔnɔ si wɔati ɔzia nɔ kepliʋia ní mɛ aʋa a, sani si maŋwɛ ka ɛ, lɛ kɔ ɛ bitɛ ní wɔ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a.”
40026043	Gi Yesu edzi aba ɛ, amɔ si badɔkpasi ba bɛdɔ sra dzɛ; bátani ba bimbi ʋe kudra.
40026044	Dzɛ ɛ, Yesu ayurɔ ba, lɛ asɛ atrɛ xe azɛɛxwa Aya kutanɛ nì eboa la klɔ ke e.
40026045	Lɛ edzì atrɛ ní badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, xe eʋi ba si “Sra sɛ ko mlafini idɔ xe mlɛyɔ isu ya mɛ na a? Mledi ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna! Bɛtra bu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla ɛki banɔ zimizi ba.
40026046	Mlayɔ! Mlaki tɔ kusɛ! Imɔ ɔniliɛ gi eebu me kɔ ɛ.”
40026047	Agi Yesu aze gu kunugu yo e, Yuda, badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole e, aba eku ni ba kusi i. Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ gi kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛkpɛ ɛ, xe livu ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa ni kusekpeo, lize ni yɛ kude e.
40026048	Yuda gi yɛ ɛkpɛ Yesu awla ɛ, abitɛ kutrɔtrɔ ni linɔkpi le si; “Ɔniliɛ gi yɛ lidzɔ lɛ maamu i, yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi mlɛpɛ ɛ, mlevu ye!”
40026049	Lɛ Yuda eti apɔni Yesu kyɔŋ, lɛ apani yɛ si, “Kusuyɔ ki wɔ, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ.” Lɛ amu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ ɛ.
40026050	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kɔsi ni lɛ su, ɔʋia!” Lɛ linɔkpi le liga xe liba evu Yesu gagla ɛ.
40026051	Banama gi beze nì Yesu kude e, bamɛ tole etso yɛ ihɛ piɔpiɔ yɛ lɛ ati kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ ɔnɔdzidzi ye yɛ kutukpa ɛ.
40026052	Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdɔkpasi liɛ klɔ si, “Dzini wɔ ihɛ piɔpiɔ yɛ kpɛ ní yɛ ozeklɔ,” “Banama petee gi bizeetso ihɛ ɛ, biatse ní ihɛ onu.
40026053	Kite wóte si maatani kupɔnɔ kuʋi dɔni mɔka awla gi aatsisi yɛ baxwɛdzɛ baguta sani ahakpɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa na a?
40026054	Pɔ̀ xe mabitɛ nite e, kɔ kitɛ liboe lɛ gi bɛŋwlimi plɛ ni Aya liboe le me e liaba lɛ mɛ?”
40026055	Lɛ Yesu apani aki linɔkpi le si, “Liziã si mlaba nì ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa nì kusekpeo si mlévu me ŋwisi ɔnɔ zimizi gi ayɔ kedu u, xe ɔʋíbitɛ ni isã nɛ aʋa kinɛ na a? Mazɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, liwe kakaa pɔ̀ mlevu me e.
40026056	Pɔ̀ eboa la pɔ́ eba la mɛ tɔ eboa la gi Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba bɛŋwlimi plɛ ní Aya liboe le me e, aba la mɛ.” Lɛ badɔkpasi ba petee bese e, xe bɛsɛ yɛ su i.
40026057	Banama gi bevu Yesu i, bɛtsini yɛ ní Kayafa gi onu Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye kepea mɛ, níklɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsa.
40026058	Petro fɛ eze ní ba kedea ke. Agà riɖiɖi eti eku ní kusumu yo ɔkaɛ kepea mɛ. Eze kesea ní kepea mɛ kɔpɔni kepea bepepe ba tɔ yimɔ kiliɛ gi eboe la aatrɛ ɛ.
40026059	Kusumu yo baka ba ni Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ba petee bɛpɛ asia tɔ bɛkɔ ɛbu Yesu lipɔ atɔ biaye ye;
40026060	pɔ̀ bátani litɔtɔ kumɔ ɔ, linyaze lɛ mɛ si, banɔ glegle bedo bɛba ɔtɔ nɔ lɛ bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ yɛ awla a, gɔgɔɛ benyime tiaʋa bedo bɛba ɔtɔ nɔ,
40026061	lɛ bɛpani si, “Onyime liɛ ya apani si, ‘Maatani Aya yɛ lisɔligba lɛ kuyaʋi lɛ ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ, maadzini lɛ kuwa.’ ”
40026062	Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye ayɔ alɛɛ, lɛ eʋi Yesu si, “Kunububu kutɔtɔ kúma ní wɔ awla gi wɔakɔ ki liboe lɛ gi bɛkɔ ni wɔ su na a?”
40026063	Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔfuɛ, nì yɛ ɛ. Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye asi Yesu dzɛ si “Maka kitamu akí wɔ ní Aya linyi ne me, si blɔ xe wɔ wonu Kristo ye gi onu Aya Yebi ye e?”
40026064	Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu akí yɛ si, “lilɛ ní lɛ mɛ kiliɛ gi wɔpani i.” Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ si: Lipoe le litrába gi mlɛtramɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi odi i ní Aya kigagla ɛ petee onetee yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, xe atrába dɔni lifunu ne ní aplɛ la mɛ ɛ.
40026065	Lɛ kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye akyì yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ liwu le tɔ yikɔ ɛbasɛ yɛ kusuyeʋio, lɛ apani si, “Libusioboe! kúdzi uzia ɔnɔ gi eze liboe le katsalia tɔɔ. Mlenu yɛ libusioboe le gi apani i.
40026066	Lɛ eʋi ba si, ege kinu mlɔ begyodi ʋa ɛ?” Bebu le onu si “Aŋa lipɔ lɛ loso e egyeni ni kutse.”
40026067	Banɔatɔ bɛɛtsí sita sɛ kpɛ Yesu aŋu na mɛ, batɔ bekusi ye xe batɔ kyɛ bɛbɔ yɛ isumu ne e
40026068	lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Do liboe plɛ ki blɔ Kristo! Nyaŋwɛ asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ na a?”
40026069	Lɛ gi Petro eze ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea kuka mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ osumubi ɔtɔ eti apɔni Petro lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wɔfɛ woze ni Yesu Galilea ɔnɛ kude.”
40026070	Pɔ̀ Petro anada ní ba petee aŋu na mɛ si, “Méte liboe lɛ su gi wɔɛpani i.”
40026071	Lɛ edo atrɛ ní kepea kevunu ya, níklɔ ɔnɔsumu ɔdisami dzedze ɛmɔ yɛ lɛ ɛsi banɔaklɔ gi beze níklɔ si i, “onyime liɛ eze ni Yesu gi ádɔ Nazaret kude e.”
40026072	Petro anada dzɛ si, “Maka kitamu si méte onyime liɛ klɔ!”
40026073	Lidze xe banama a gi bɛlɛɛ niklɔ ʋa ɛ, bɛsi Petro si, “Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si bamɛ tole wɔfɛ wonu, wɔ kipaniɛ kibu wɔ ɛkɔ!”
40026074	Petro apani dzɛ si, Maka kitamu si sugba mɛɛsɛ! Aya ohe kutu kí mɛ faã xe lima lɛ mɛ ɛ! “Méte onyime liɛ klɔ ɔ!” Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖi i, ɔkukɔ lɔ eme e.
40026075	Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi Yesu asi yɛ aʋa a si: “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aame e, wɔanada tatá si wote me.” Edo lɛ aze bemi tiitiiti i.
40027001	Keletitia livlɛ lɛ fìfìfì ì, kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛnya si biaye Yesu.
40027002	Bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ lɛ bɛgbani yɛ tsini Pilato gi yɛ onu Roma ɔnɛ kesea aʋa odidi ye klɔ ɔ.
40027003	Agi Yuda a, gi yɛ ebu Yesu akɔ, enu si bɛtsa kutse pia ɛki Yesu i, ekyi ɔna mɛ lɛ edzini klosalo, kibɔ pititi avitata la atsini kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba ɛ.
40027004	Lɛ apani si i, “Mabitɛ liboe zimizi gi makɔ onyime e gi ɔ́ŋa lipɔ ɛ akpɛ awla kí kutse.” Lɛ bebu le onu kí yɛ si i, “Kitɛ líyi blo e? Wɔ liboe linu!”
40027005	Lɛ Yuda aŋwia kibɔɛ aplɛ ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ lɛ asɛ xe azɛɛkpɛ isu ya lihuʋi i.
40027006	Lɛ kusumu yo baka ʋidi ba bɛtá kibɔɛ lɛ bɛpani si i, “Ika kibɔ kɛ ya, liyɔ kedu ní blɔ isã nɛ su si kukɔ kɛ kpɛ ní bidɔgyɔgyɔ ʋɛ kepimia mɛ.”
40027007	Bɛbitɛ kugyodi lɛ bɛkɔ kɛ zeedzi ɔ́dɔʋɔ yɛ kesea tɔ biazevìve bababa ba.
40027008	Lɛ loso bizɛxwa kesea lia klɔ si ìka kese kɔkpɛ nì omono o.
40027009	Niteme si liboe lɛ klɔ gi Aya apani i agani oboedoplɛ Yeremya aʋa liba lɛ mɛ si, “Bɛkɔ kibɔ pititi avitata la gi Israelbanɛ ma bɛdimɛ si biatsa ní yɛ litukpo e,
40027010	bekɔ kɛ edzi ɔdɔʋɔɛ kesea ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkaɛ aki mɛ ɔsã nɔ kinɛ ɛ.”
40027011	Yesu alɛɛ ní Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye aŋu mɛ, lɛ eʋi Yesu si, “Wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?” Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Nite wɔ̀pani.”
40027012	Pɔ̀ gi kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛkɔ eboe la ní yɛ su i, óbu litɔtɔ onu u.
40027013	Lɛ gi Pilato eʋi Yesu si i, “Woʋínu eboe ala gi bɛkɔ ní wɔsu na a?”
40027014	Pɔ̀ Yesu obu liboeboe onu tɔɔ gi lítu kesea ɔʋadi ye kugyɔ ɔ.
40027015	Ni Kutseo lidɔzawe kakaa aʋa ɛ, Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye izɛyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi bɛkpɛ ligba ɛ, ɛki linɔkpi le xegi liʋi ye e.
40027016	Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔka ɔtɔ gi bete mɔmɔɔmɔ si eze ɔnɔ zimizi i, gi bɛzɛxwa si Baraba ɛ, eze ligba.
40027017	Lɛ loso gi linɔkpi le likpɛ likpɔ ɛ, Pilato eʋi ba si, “Bamɛ owoli mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ kí mlɔ na a? Baraba loo Yesu gi onu Kristo ye na a?”
40027018	Pilato etè mɔmɔɔmɔ si Yudanɛ ma baka ba ɛ, bɛkɔ Yesu i mani yɛ lɛ ese linu si bɛkɔ kaŋuza nì yɛ.
40027019	Agi Pilato eze ní litsixwagbo le aʋa ɛ, yedze atsisi yɛ ole si, “Wukíbitɛ kididɔ nì onyime liɛ klɔ ɔ, gi ɔ́ta kese e. Lɛ ese linu si mamɔ ɔzia glegle omono kelea petee kɔkpɛ kulila gi maza elesi la ní yɛ su i.”
40027020	Kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛliɔʋi linɔkpi le tɔ liʋi Pilato tɔ ɔyurɔ Baraba ɔki ba tɔ beye Yesu boŋu.
40027021	Lɛ Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye eʋi linɔkpi le si, “Ní banɔ tiaʋa ba ya kusi i, ba mɛ owoli mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ kí mlɔ na a?” bebu le onu si, “Baraba!”
40027022	Lɛ Pilato eʋi ba si, “Kɔlɔ ɛ, ege, mlɛpɛ si míbitɛ nì Yesu gi onu Kristo ye na a?” Lɛ ba pɔ́ bebu le onu si, “Kú ye ní ose lo su!”
40027023	Lɛ Pilato eʋi dzɛ si, “Ege loso o, liboe zimizi woli abitɛ na a?” Lɛ linɔkpi le likpɛ ozi lo gaglaa si, “Kú ye ní ose lo su!”
40027024	Agi Pilato amɔ si litrabu libiitɔtɔ xe yɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa a, pɔ̀ anyra ko aaga lɛ mɛ kudo e, akɔ kuni yo lɛ eplo yɛ awla la ní linɔkpi le aŋu mɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mɛ ɔwla ɔma ní onyime liɛ ya kutseo me! Mlɔ kiboebitɛ kɛ ya.”
40027025	Lɛ linɔkpi le pɔ́ libu le onu si, “Ki yɛ kutseo kɔ kutuheheo kuba blɔ ni blɔ bebi ba aʋa a!”
40027026	Lɛ Pilato ayurɔ Baraba aki ba ɛ; xe aki sì bɛfiaʋi Yesu atam la ɛ. Lɛ kede e, ayurɔ yɛ aki ba tɔ bazeekú ye ní ose lo su.
40027027	Lɛ Pilato yɛ baguta ba bɛkɔ Yesu itsini kesea ɔʋadi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, lɛ baguta ba pɔ́ ní ba lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ bɛklani yɛ ɛ.
40027028	Agi bebu ewu la ní yɛ su i, bɛkɔ liwu kyíkyĩ kpɛ ki yɛ.
40027029	Lɛ beyo bibu ʋɛ likuto le xe bɛkɔ lɛ ekume ki yɛ lɛ bɛkpɛ kiseʋi ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ; xe bɛdɔ ní ba aklamasi na aʋa ni yɛ ketu ya, lɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa ɛ nì eboa la si, “Oheye lo! Yudanɛ ma okusi ye ozè ligbã gblamadzaa!”
40027030	Betsĩ sita sɛ bali yɛ aʋa lɛ bɛzi kiseʋi ye yɛ awla xe bɛkɔ kɛ sa yɛ litukpo le tasɛ tasɛ.
40027031	Agi bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa pɔ́ ɛ, bebu liwu kyíkyĩ nɛ ní yɛ su lɛ bedzini yɛ ɔtutɔ ewu la ɛkpɛ ki yɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛgbani yɛ edono si bɛzekú ye ní ose lo su i.
40027032	Lipoe lɛ gi bedo ɔma nɔ mɛ xe bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi ádɔ Kirene gi bizɛxwa si Simon i, baguta ba bemi yɛ aʋa si ɔzɛ Yesu osetsase lo otu.
40027033	Bɛzɛna ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Golgota, gi lɛ ese linu si “Litukpoxwa ozekɔ.”
40027034	Ni klɔ bɛki Yesu kuda gi bɛtsa ni bidɔ tiitii bitɔ; pɔ̀ gi akpɛ kɔ onu edi i ɔŋwɛ kɔ.
40027035	Lɛ gi bekú ye ní osetsase lo su i, bɛlɛ yɛ ewu la gani exoeʋi ʋi kutata mɛ ɛ.
40027036	Lɛ kede e, beze kesea xe bezeepe ye e.
40027037	Ní yɛ etukpo la onu i, bekú bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi gi bipani si, “Yesu, Yudanɛ ma Okusi ye liɛ ya.”
40027038	Lɛ beku beze tiaʋa ní ise su i pɔni yɛ, tole ni yɛ kaŋa mɛ, ɔʋlaɛ ni yɛ kaba mɛ.
40027039	Banama gi bɛzɛga ɛza ɛ besugu ba etukpo la, lɛ bekpini Yesu si:
40027040	“Wɔpani si wɔayaʋi Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ, lɛ wɔadzini lɛ kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ! Bú isu ya xe Aya Yebi wonu i, tɔ ple ní osetsase lo su!”
40027041	Niteme ké, kusumu yo baka ba nì ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ani banɔtsitsi ba bɛzɛɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa si;
40027042	“Ebu banima, pɔ̀ ɔ́tani yɛ isu ya kubu! Xe yɛ onu Israelbanɛ ma okusi ye e, lɛ kɔ ople dɔni osetsase lo su abla tɔ kwiazi yɛ aʋa ŋa!
40027043	Aká Aya aʋa lɛ apani si, Aya Yebie yenu u. Xe nite e, mlaki tɔ kudi sì Aya aapɛ si yibu ye abla na!”
40027044	Nite ke e beze ba klɔ gi bekú i pɔni yɛ ɛ fɛ bekpini ye.
40027045	Gi kemizea inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa isã ɛ, litumu ne lìdɔ ní kesea pɔ́ aʋa inyɔ sasa tita.
40027046	Gi inyɔ tita isã ɛ, Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa si, “Eli, eli, lama sabaxtani?” gi lɛ ese linu si, “Mɛ Aya, mɛ Aya, ege lɛ loso wokyi kede ɔkpɛ mɛ ɛ?”
40027047	Lɛ banɔatɔ gi bɛlɛɛ ní klɔ ʋa ɛ, benu yɛ onu lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɛɛxwa Eliya!”
40027048	Bamɛ tole ese kyɔŋ, lɛ azɛɛkɔ ɔsapo ɔtɔ, akɔ lɔ akpɛ ní kuda nyagba nyagba mɛ, lɛ ete lo ní ose ɔtɔ onu i, xe akɔ lɔ atɔ si aki yɛ si ɔŋwɛ.
40027049	Pɔ̀ banɔ gɔgɔ ba bɛpani si, “Lɛɛ mlaki tɔ kudi sì Eliya atra bu ye na a!”
40027050	Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa dzɛ ko lɛ akɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ akɔ ɛ.
40027051	Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kusa gi bɛkɔ ɛtsa lɛ mɛ ɛ, kwikyi idɔnɔ lifune banani kesea. Lɛ kesea kesugu u, xe aklakpɔ la ɛyaʋi i.
40027052	Idrɔ lɛ idra lɛ banɔ dradra glegle gi betse e, bɛyɔni ba gi bedzi ligbã.
40027053	Bedo ní ba idrɔ lɛ mɛ, le gi Yesu ayɔ adɔ ni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, bɛtrɛ ni ɔma ʋidi dradra lɔ mɛ, lɛ banɔ glegle bɛmɔ ba a.
40027054	Agi baguta ba ɔkaɛ ni baguta ba gi beze ni yɛ su u, xe bɛzeepe Yesu u bɛmɔ kesea kusugu yo ni eboa la gi ɛba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lifu liku ba lɛ bɛpani si, “Sugba ɛ, Aya Yebi iliɛ ya!”
40027055	Badzɛ glegle gi beze nì yɛ kude e dɔni Galilea xe bezee di yɛ baziazia ba aʋa ɛ, bezee di bidɔ ɛdɔni ɔdzage no.
40027056	Maria Magdaladzee, Maria gi onu Yakobo nì Yosef ba onee ani Zebedeo yedze, beze ní ba kusi i.
40027057	Agi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, oxonete ɔtɔ gi ádɔ Arimatia ɛ, aba eku; yɛ linyi lize Yosef, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Yesu yɛ ɔdɔkpasi i.
40027058	Atrɛ ní Pilato aŋu mɛ lɛ eʋi si ɔkɔ Yesu yɛ okpo ye ɔki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ Pilato aki ɔsã si bakɔ okpo ye akí Yosef.
40027059	Lɛ Yosef akɔ okpo ye, xe axla kusa pititi vuvu ní yɛ su i,
40027060	lɛ azɛɛkɔ Yesu okpo ye akpɛ ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ ɔdrɔ vuvu gi ebu akpɛ ní liklakpɔ ɛtɔ mɛ. Lɛ emli likla ʋidi itɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ kevunu ya xe asɛ ɛ.
40027061	Maria Magdaladzee ni Maria ʋlaɛ, bezè niklɔ gi bebu aŋu na mɛ kpɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ ɛ.
40027062	Keletitia gi keze Lizemɔniwe le e, kusumu yo baka ba ni Farisianɛ ma bɛzɛtsani Pilato,
40027063	lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔka, kwiplɛ aŋu si lipoɛ lɛ gi ɔsia nɛ liɛ klɔ ezè ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, apani aplɛ si, ‘Mayɔ ní ewe tata kede’
40027064	Ki ɔsã nɔ tɔ bazeepe yɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ kɔzɛna nì liwetanɛ we le tɔ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bakítani yɛ okpo ye kuzuru tɔ biasi banima si, bɛyɔ ni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. Asia gɔgɔa la ya anyani sani atɔpu na.”
40027065	Lɛ Pilato asi ba si, “Mlatsini ɔnɔpe; tɔ mlazeetsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu niteme gi mlaatanɔ ɛ.”
40027066	Lɛ bɛsɛ xe bɛzɛtsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu i, lɛ bedu ɔnɔpe ye si ozeope ɔdrɔ lɔ ɛ.
40028001	Agi Lizemɔniwe le liza ɛ, xe Lipadzruwe le olezatɔ nɔ ɛna ɛ, Maria Magdaladzee ni Maria ʋlaɛ bɛtrɛ si bɛtredi ɔdrɔ lɔ.
40028002	Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, kesea kɛhwa gagla; lɛ Ɔka Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ eple adɔ ni lifunu ne, lɛ emli likla nɛ gi bɛkɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu i azanɔ ɛ, lɛ ezè ní lɛ aʋa ɛ.
40028003	Yɛ kiŋwiŋwi yɛ mɛ, kize ŋwisi dzeni kifububu kinɛ, lɛ yɛ ewu la ɛxwa pititi ŋwisi aklala kinɛ ɛ.
40028004	Lifu liku banɔpe ba nyani nyani sì besugu nite si bɛfɛ ŋwisi banɔ gi betse na a.
40028005	Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ apani aki badzɛ ba sì, “Mlakíse lifu, mete sì Yesu gi beku ní osetsase lo su i, yɛ mlɛpɛ.”
40028006	Ɔ́ma ní ya a; bɛyɔni yɛ, ɔlɛ ligbã́, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi apani i kinɛ. Mleti eku tɔ mledi niklɔ gi afɛ ɛ.
40028007	Mlatrɛ kyɔŋ, tɔ mlasi yɛ badɔkpasi ba sì, ‘Bɛyɔni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. Eku mlɔ ɔtɔ ɛɛtrɛ ní Galilea, niklɔ mlamɔ yɛ!’ Mlaplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ gi masi mlɔ aʋa ɛ.”
40028008	Nite si bɛkɔsi sɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su nì lifu, pɔ̀ isami kyɛ izeku ba xe bɛzɛtrɛ si bɛzeedo ɛsi yɛ badɔkpasi ba a.
40028009	Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, Yesu atsani ba lɛ apani ba si “Kusuyɔ ki mlɔ.” Beti ipɔni Yesu, bevu yɛ kuklikpɔɔ lɛ besumu ye e.
40028010	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakíse lifu, mlazɛ si mɛ benemi ba si batrɛ ní Galilea, lɛ niklɔ biamɔ mɛ ɛ.”
40028011	Agi badzɛ ba bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ɛ, baguta ba ba me batɔ bɛtrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ba klɔ ní ɔma ʋidi lo me. Lɛ bɛsi ba liboe kakaa gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
40028012	Gi kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsá ɛ, bɛbitɛ kutrɔtrɔ lɛ bɛki baguta ba kibɔ gi kidzi aŋu mɛ ɛ.
40028013	Lɛ bɛsi ba si mlapani si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba ezuru yɛ okpo ye elesi la gi kwidɔ sra sɛ ɛ.
40028014	Lɛ xegi kesea ɔʋadi ye aanu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, kwialiɔʋi yɛ tɔ kwiabu mlo ní liboe me.
40028015	Banɔpe ba bɛzi kibɔɛ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi bɛsi ba aʋa ɛ. Niteme si lɛ lize liboe lɛ gi lizɛklanɔ ní Yudanɛ ma kiboedoe onu ga kɔna ni omono o.
40028016	Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní ketokpaa aʋa ní Galilea ní niklɔ gi Yesu asi ba si batrɛ ɛ.
40028017	Agi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, besumu ye, pɔ̀ ba mɛ batɔ bazɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa a.
40028018	Lɛ Yesu eti apɔni ba lɛ asi ba sì, “Aya akɔ kigaglaɛ pɔ́ ní lifunu ne ni kesea aʋa akpɛ ní mɛ awla a.
40028019	Lɛ loso e, mlatrɛ, ní ɔkɔ kakaa ni banima pɔ́ klɔ tɔ mlabitɛ ba mɛ badɔkpasi: mlakpɛ kuni aki ba ní Ɔka yɛ ni Obi ye ani Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ linyi ne me.
40028020	Tɔ mlabasɛ ba sì babitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi kɛsu makpɛ ɔsã aki mlɔ ɛ. Lɛ mlaplɛ aŋu si, malɛ nì mlɔ lipoe kakaa kɔzɛna nì kelea ligù nɛ ɛ.”
41001001	Yesu Kristo Aya Yebi ye, yɛ su Liboe Gbã nɛ lilɛ ya.
41001002	Likpese ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ Yesaya aŋwlimi nɛ kinɛ si: “Aya apani si, ‘Maakpɛ mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ní wɔ ɔtɔ nɔ tɔ aadra kudeo ki wɔ.’
41001003	Ɔniliɛ klɔ ɛɛkpɛ ozi ní ɔyaya klɔ si, ‘Mlalulɔ kudeo plɛ aki Ɔkaɛ; mlebu kude gyɔgyɔɔ aplɛ ki yɛ tɔ aaga!’ ”
41001004	Lɛ loso e, Yohanes aba gi azɛɛkpɛ kuni yo aki banima a, lɛ azɛɛkla Aya yɛ liboe le ní ɔyaya klɔ si, “Mlekyi kedea kpɛ mlɔ eboe zimizi na tɔ mlaki tɔ bakpɛ kuni aki mlɔ, tɔ Aya ɔkɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ mlɔ.”
41001005	Banɔ glegle ní Yudea kesea mɛ ni Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ bedo etrɛ si tɔ bianu Yohanes yɛ liboe le. Bɛdra ba ina nɛ mɛ ní ba eboe zimizi na su, lɛ Yohanes akpɛ kuni aki ba ní Yordan Onipe lo me e.
41001006	Yohanes yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bize kposɔ sipi liwu; anya yɛ kasɛa mɛ ni kagaplekpa ɔgɛmi, lɛ yɛ bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ bize akikli la nì liŋwafu mɛ kibú.
41001007	Apani asi banima sì, “Ɔniliɛ gi aaba mɛ kede e, ekeme kura sani mɛ. Lɛ mágbɛ gi maaze yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ní kapɛa tɔtɔ mɛ ɛ.
41001008	Makpɛ kuni aki mlɔ, pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ, aakpɛ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ki mlɔ.”
41001009	Ni ewe ala klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu ádɔ Nazaret ní Galilea kesea mɛ aba a, lɛ Yohanes akpɛ kuni aki yɛ ní Yordan Onipe lo me e.
41001010	Kiliɛ gi Yesu eedo eemu dɔni kuni yo me ko e, amɔ si lifunu ne lizɛɛdra, gi Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ eeple dɔ yɛ aʋa ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ na a.
41001011	Ko lɛ ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lifunu ne si, “Wɔ wonu mɛ obi ye gi malɔ ɔ, lɛ wɔ liboe liiku me aŋu u.”
41001012	Kyɔŋ niklɔ ko e, Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛgbani yɛ tsinɔ ní ɔyaya klɔ.
41001013	Eze niklɔ ewe avitene lɛ Satana efeke ye edi i. Liŋwafu nɛ mɛ baga ʋa kyɛ beze ní klɔ, lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛba esumu ye xe bɛkpɛ yɛ kigagla ɛ.
41001014	Lipoe lɛ gi bevu Yohanes ikpɛ ligba pɔ́ ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Galilea gi azaapani Aya yɛ Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛ.
41001015	Yesu yɛ liboe le linu si, “Lipoe le lina ablɔ kɔ; lɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔnɔ ɔ! Mlekyi kede akpɛ mlɔ eboe zimizi na, tɔ mlazi Liboe Gbã nɛ aʋa ŋa!”
41001016	Gi Yesu azɛɛga Galilea Limu ne kutu i, amɔ bakpábu tiaʋa. Ba beze Simon nì yeneminyime Andrea gi bɛzɛɛta ba dzikle e.
41001017	Niklɔ Yesu axwa ba si, “Mleku nì mɛ kude, tɔ maabasɛ mlɔ kiliɛ gi mlaabù banima ɛ.”
41001018	Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, bɛyurɔ ba dzikle ʋa ko lɛ bekuni ni yɛ kude e.
41001019	Aga atrɛ ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ko lɛ amɔ beneminyime tiaʋa dzedze e, Yakobo nì Yohanes. Beze Zebedeo yɛ bebi. Beze ba katapokpaa mɛ gi bɛzɛɛlulɔ ba dzikle ʋa a.
41001020	Kiliɛ gi amɔ ba nite ko e, axwa ba. Bɛyurɔ ba ɔkaɛ Zebedeo ni apaa yɛ bebi ʋa ní katapokpaa me ko lɛ ba kɔɔ bɛsɛ xe bekuni Yesu kude e.
41001021	Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní Kapernaum ɔma nɔ mɛ. Gi Lizemɔniwe le lina ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsa klɔ; lɛ ekpese bidɔ mɛ kubasɛ ɛ.
41001022	Banama gi bɛta yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ kutu i, ba inugu itse, lɛ ese linu si yɛ kiniɛ kiga lidze ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su. Yesu xunyɔ ɛ, abasi bidɔ mɛ ni kigagla.
41001023	Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze yɛ mɛ ɛ, akpɛ ozi tatata ní kutsatsaa mɛ si,
41001024	“Wɔ Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní blɔ su u? Blɔ ɔkyurɔ kɔ wɔba niya putɔ ɔ? Mete ɔniliɛ gi wonu i. Wɔ wonu Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dradra yɛ.”
41001025	Yesu akpɛ ozi ní ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi! Do báza ní ɔnɔɛ mɛ!”
41001026	Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ esugu onyimee gaglaa, ɛkpɛ ozi tatata, lɛ edo eza ní ɔnɔɛ mɛ ɛ.
41001027	Banima pɔ́ ba inugu itse, lɛ bekpese ba ahanuglɔ ba kuʋi si, “Liboe woli lɛ ya a? Bidɔbasɛbasɛ vuvu woli lu bɛ ya a? Onyime liɛ kɔ kigagla kilɛ yɛ awla gi izɛɛki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔsã a, lɛ izeenu kutu yɔ fɛ ɛ.”
41001028	Niteme si Yesu yɛ linyi ne lihle eku ní ɔkɔ kakaa ní Galilea bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀.
41001029	Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní Simon ni Andrea kepea mɛ laa; Yakobo ni Yohanes fɛ beze ba kusi.
41001030	Simon yɛnadzee, kuwe kwivu ye plɛ ɔtɔsi aʋa, lɛ gi Yesu eku kepea mɛ ko e, bɛki yɛ kutète kyɔŋ.
41001031	Eti eku ní ɔdzɛɛ aʋa, lɛ evu yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ apɔni yɛ xe ayɔ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, kuweo kwití yɛ aʋa; lɛ ayɔ xe ekpese ba aʋa kudi i.
41001032	Agi liwe le liku xe ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, banima bɛkɔ ba banyanya ba petee ni banama mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e, manɔ ní Yesu klɔ.
41001033	Ɔma nɔ pɔ́ ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní kepea kevunu ya.
41001034	Yesu ayɔni banyanya ba dɔni ba bànya ede ede na mɛ, lɛ akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi glegle edo no ní banima mɛ ɛ. Pɔ ɔ́ki lɛ kudeo si ipani i, lɛ ese linu si ifuɛfuɛ nɛ ite ɔniliɛ gi Yesu onu i.
41001035	Liwe ʋla lɛ ɔlezatɔ tsitsi no e, Yesu ayɔ, lɛ edo kepea mɛ ɛ. Edo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ lɛ atrɛ ní okpokpo kɔ ɔ, niklɔ axwa Aya ɛ.
41001036	Pɔ̀ Simon nì yɛ ɔha lɔ bɛzɛɛklanɔ gi bɛzɛɛpɛ́ yɛ ɛ.
41001037	Lɛ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa ɛɛpɛ wɔ.”
41001038	Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Lilɛ si kutrɛ ní kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kwiklani blɔ mɛ ɛ. Liziã si mipani liboe le ní niklɔ fɛ, lɛ ese linu si lɛ ya loso maba a.”
41001039	Lɛ loso e, aga Galilea kesea petee me, lɛ apani liboe le ní ba itsaklɔ ɛ. Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ebu ní banima mɛ.
41001040	Onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛnya kunya kyikyĩ yɔ. Lɛ aba Yesu klɔ ɛ. Edu aklamasi kesea lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si ɔpɔni yɛ ɛ. Asi Yesu si, “Xegi linu wɔ kupɛpɛ ɛ, wɔatani kubitɛ gi mɛ isu ya iadra a.”
41001041	Asigaga la ɛga Yesu nì onyimee; anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ, lɛ agbɔni onyimee e. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Linu mɛ kupɛpɛ; wɔ isu ya idra a!”
41001042	Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, yɛ isu ya ilulɔ; kunyaa fɛ kwilila ní yɛ su.
41001043	Niklɔ Yesu akpɛ onyimee kude ni ɔsã gagla si,
41001044	“Ta kutu, di lɛ aʋa si wódo liboeboe si ɔnɔnɔ ní kibitɛɛ liɛ ya su u. Boŋu i, ga laa tɔ trɛ ní Yudanɛ ma kusumu yo ɔkaɛ klɔ; ki tɔ ɔtapo wo odi. Lɛ kede e, tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ si wɔnya ahaya ɛ, zeeyi ligoʋi lɛ klɔ gi Mose ɔsã nɔ eʋi i.”
41001045	Pɔ̀ gi onyimee asɛ ɛ, azeekpese liboe le kufuflu ní ɔkɔ kakaa a. Onyimee yɛ onugu haha lɔ ɛki si Yesu ɔ́zɛɛtani kudo ní ɔha kusi ní ɔma tɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Kɔ ɛ, ebu isu ya lidze dzaa ní banima su, pɔ̀ banima bɛzɛɛba yɛ klɔ dɔni ɔkɔ kakaa a.
41002001	Ewe atɔ kede e, gi Yesu edzi atrɛ ní Kapɛrnaum i, liyii klanɔ si eze ní kepea mɛ.
41002002	Banɔ glegle bɛba ɛkpɛ likpɔ níklɔ lɛ loso e, ɔkli ɔkpɛkɔ óze ligba lɛ mɛ kɔmanɔ ní ligba lɛ kevunu ya a. Yesu azɛɛpani liboe gbã nɛ asi ba.
41002003	Niklɔ benyime tiene bɛba eku i. Befeke onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ kapɛ̀ tiele ketse e manɔ ní Yesu klɔ.
41002004	Linɔkpi le lɛ loso e, bátani ɔnɔɛ kukɔtsini yɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso bepu liwui ní ligba lɛ ada la mɛ niklɔ gi Yesu eze e. Gi bepu liwui le pɔ́ ɛ, bepleni ɔnɔɛ nì yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ ɛkpɛ.
41002005	Gi Yesu amɔ kuziŋa liɔ gi kwize ní ba awla ɛ, edo asi ɔnyanyaɛ si, “Obi, bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ.”
41002006	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi beze niklɔ ɛ begyo le edi ní ba isu ya mɛ si,
41002007	“Kitɛ mɛ edo igyi le xe apani te e?” Libusioboe lɛ ya! Aya ko onu ɔniliɛ gi aatani eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ ɛ.
41002008	Yesu ete ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ kyɔŋ liboe lɛ gi bezegyo edi i, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso eboa la ya elu akpasi ní mlɔ etukpo la mɛ ɛ?
41002009	Liwoli lisa ɛplɔplɔ gi biapani i si kapɛ tiele tsetsea ɔnete liɛ ya: ‘Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ,’ loo, ‘Yɔ, feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ ga na a?’
41002010	Mapɛ si mlete si kigagla kiliɛ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla ní kesea aʋa si aakɔ̀ eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ ɛ.” Lɛ loso edo asi ɔnyanyaɛ sì,
41002011	“Mɛsì yɔ! Feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ sɛ trɛ kepea mɛ.”
41002012	Ba pɔ́ bezee di onyimee xe ayɔ ɔ. Efeke yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ lɛ akɔsi asɛ ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ. Ba pɔ́ ba inugu itse e. Niteme si bɛkpɔ̀ Aya lɛ bɛpani sì, “Kuʋímɔ kiliɛ ya elu iʋídi i!”
41002013	Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu dzɛ ɛ. Linɔkpiʋidi itɔ liba yɛ klɔ lɛ ekpese le bidɔ kubasɛ ɛ.
41002014	Gi azɛɛga atrɛ ɛ, amɔ ɔbɔgyɔ ɔtɔ, Lewi gi onu Alfeo Yebi i. Eze yɛ lixwɛwagba lɛ mɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ sì, “Kuni mɛ kude.” Lewi ayɔ, lɛ ekuni yɛ kude e.
41002015	Lɛ kede e, gi Yesu azɛɛŋa bidɔ ní Lewi kepea mɛ ɛ. Babɔgyɔ glegle atɔ ni banama gi bɛta Yudanɛ ma isã nɛ ese e, ba mɛ batɔ bekuni Yesu kude e. Niteme si ba mɛ beglegle bɛkpɛ awla ní kezi me e pɔni Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba.
41002016	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi beze Farisianɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si Yesu azɛɛŋa bidɔ ni banama gi bɛta Yudanɛ ma isã nɛ ese e, ni babɔgyɔ ba lɛ loso beʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso Yesu izɛŋa bidɔ nì banɔ ba ya elu na a?”
41002017	Agi Yesu enu ba liboe le e, Yesu ebu le onu si, “Banama gi ba isu ya mɛ ilɛ mumɔ ɛ, báziã ɔwabitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛnya ɛ, ba bɛziã ɔwabitɛɛ ɛ. Mába si mixwa banama gi ba bede ʋa bɛgyɔ ɛ. Boŋu i, banɔ ba ya gi benu banɔ zimizi ba ba loso maba a.”
41002018	Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni Farisianɛ ma bɛzɛɛnya onugu. Banɔ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni Farisianɛ ma ba badɔkpasi ba bizɛɛnya onugu, xe wɔ banɛ ma pɔ̀ baʋínya onugu na a?”
41002019	Yesu ebu abee aki ba si, “Mlɛpɛ si banama gi bɛba ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ ɛ, baza kuʋɛ na a?” Litrába lɛ mɛ ɛ. Xegi ɔdzɛnyee ɔlɛ basu i, bátranya onugu u.
41002020	Pɔ̀ liwe etɔ litraba gi biagbani ɔdzɛnyee sɛnɔ ní basu u. Lipoe lɛ klɔ bianya onugu lo.
41002021	“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋíkɔ lisaba vuvu kukɔlulɔ kusa koko o, lɛ ese linu si kusa kokoo kuapá vu lisaba vuvu nɛ kɔ liwu le likeme esani kiliɛ gi lize tsã ɛ.
41002022	Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ óʋinye kuda vuvu kukɔkpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe koko me e, lɛ ese linu si kuda vuvu yɔ kwiaki sì kagaplekpa keʋe kokoa kiata. Boŋu i, lilɛ si benye kuda vuvu yɔ akpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe vuvu mɛ.”
41002023	Yesu azɛɛga aza ní idoli inyrɔ ɛtɔ mɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa. Gi yɛ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛza ɛ, beku idoli le kuyasi mɛ ɛ.
41002024	Nite si Farisianɛ ma bɛsi yɛ si, “Di! Wɔ badɔkpasi ba bɛta blɔ ɔsã nɔ ese, gi bɛɛbitɛ nite ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ!”
41002025	Yesu ebu le onu si “Mlákla kidiliɛ gi Dawid abitɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi aziã kidiitɔ si yiŋa na a? Kuʋɛ kwizeeku ye nì yɛ banima.
41002026	Nite si atrɛ Aya kepea mɛ gi azɛɛta liklã dradra lɛ gi bɛbla plɛ ki Aya ɛ. Liba lɛ mɛ nite lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Abiata eze Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye e. Ni ɔsã nɔ onu i, kusumu yo baka ba ko biata liklã ɛnɛ klɔ xe e, pɔ̀ Dawid atà nɛ lɛ aki yɛ banima kyɛ ɛ.”
41002027	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Lizemɔniwe le ɛ, bɛbitɛ lɛ ɛki banɔ kupɛ̀pɛ, bábitɛ banima aki Lizemɔniwe le e.
41002028	Lɛ loso Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye onu Ɔkaɛ, gi aŋa Lizemɔniwe le kyɛ aʋa a.”
41003001	Agi Yesu edzì atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ní lipoe dzedze me e, amɔ ɔka ɔtɔ gi yɛ ɔwla lɔ ɛklɔʋi i.
41003002	Banɔatɔ beze niklɔ gi bɛpɛ si beebu Yesu lipɔ ɛ. Lɛ loso e bedu aŋu na ní yɛ aʋa gaglaa tɔ beedi si aayɔni ɔnyanyaɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a.
41003003	Yesu asi onyimee si, “Ga lɛɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ ya ní banima aŋu na mɛ.”
41003004	Lɛ eʋi banima si, “Ege blɔ ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si kubitɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a? Kubitɛ kidɔ gbã loo kidɔ nyani nyani na a? Kubu ɔnutɔ yɛ ligbã́ loo kuzizi le na a?” Pɔ̀ bápani liboeboe.
41003005	Yesu edi ba aklanɔ ní kusuyeʋi me pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, ba liboe liga yɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si ba ina nɛ mɛ izee gagla lɛ ba linɛ lígyɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi onyimee sì: “Nina wɔ ɔwla lɔ!” Anina lɔ ko lɛ edzì iku lɔ kiku ye e.
41003006	Lɛ Farisianɛ ma bɛsɛ ní ɔtsaklɔ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ kutsatsa nì Herodes ye baʋatrɔatɔ kyɔŋ. Lɛ bɛbitɛ kunyanya si biaye Yesu u.
41003007	Lɛ kede e, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ trɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ likuni yɛ kude e.
41003008	Banima bɛdɔ Galilea, Yudea, Yerusalem ani Idumea bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀. Batɔ fɛ bɛdɔ Yordan kedaa ni ima ʋidi ilɛ gi iklani Tiro ni Sidon i. Banɔ ba ya pɔ́ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ ese linu si benu yɛ kiboebitɛ onu.
41003009	Linɔkpi le likeme lɛ loso e, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bapɛ́ katapokpa atɔ aki yɛ tɔ banima bakípɔ yɛ akpɛ ɛ.
41003010	Lɛ ese linu si ayɔni banyanya glegle. niteme si banyanya dzedze ba pɔ́ bɛzɛɛŋwlɛ si bɛɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ.
41003011	Lɛ xegi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne gi ize ní banɔatɔ mɛ imɔ Yesu ko e kɔ begleʋe edɔ yɛ ketu ya ni ozi tatata si, “Wɔ wonu Aya Yebi ye!”
41003012	Pɔ̀ ɛ, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla akí ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne si ikísi ɔnɔnɔ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ yenu u.
41003013	Gi Yesu asɛ ní klɔ ɛ, emu ketokpa katɔ lɛ axwa banama gi apɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ.
41003014	Lɛ ebu ba mɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa gi aki linyi ne si, banɔkpɛkpɛ ba ɛ. Lɛ asi ba si: “Makya mlɔ si mleze ní mɛ su.” Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, maatsisi mlɔ tɔ mlaapani liboe gbã nɛ
41003015	Lɛ maaki mlɔ kigaglaɛ gi mlakɔ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudono e.
41003016	Banɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba klɔ gi akya ɛ, ba benu: Simon (Yesu aki yɛ linyi si Petro).
41003017	Yakobo ni yenemi ye Yohanes gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba a (Yesu aki ba linyi si Boanerges gi lɛ ese linu si, “dzeni kugugu benyime”).
41003018	Bagɔgɔ ba benu Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeo, Mateo, Toma, Yakobo gi onu Alfeo Yebi, Tadeo, Simon Kanaa ɔnɛ gi adimɛ nì yɛ kakàsea ɛ
41003019	ani Yuda Iskariot gi yɛ aba ebu Yesu akɔ ɛ.
41003020	Lɛ kede e, Yesu atrɛ ní kepea mɛ. Dzɛ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liba gi liki si Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba a, bámɔ lipoe xe biaŋa bidɔ fɛ ɛ.
41003021	Agi yɛ benete ba benu liboe le e, bekú kudeo me tɔ bɛzɛgbani yɛ, lɛ ese linu si banima bezeepani si, “Eewle!”
41003022	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi bɛdɔ Yerusalem i, bɛzeepani si, “Beelzebul yɛ ɔkpasi yɛ mɛ! Lɛ yɛ onu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ɔkaɛ, lɛ yɛ ɛɛki Yesu kigaglaɛ xe ɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono o.”
41003023	Lɛ Yesu axwa ba manɔ ɔ, xe egu kunugu yo aki ba ní abee ʋa me si, “Kitɛ Abosam yɛ aatani abosam yɛ kukpikpinɔ dono e?
41003024	Xegi keduyɔyɔ kɛba keseatɔ mɛ gani kifúgɔnigɔni mɛ ɛ, kesea lia klɔ kiayaʋi.
41003025	Xegi okú ɔtɔ ɛlɛ isu ya kpɛ paso paso ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe bɛɛgɔni i, okú lɔ klɔ aayaʋi.
41003026	Lɛ loso e, xegi Abosam yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛlɛ kluʋikluʋi i, katrátani kuze lipoe gblamadza, kiayaʋi kɔ kedu i.
41003027	“Ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kutiku ní ɔnɔ gagla yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ xe aahali yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, sani si anya ɔnɔ gagla yɛ akpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ, xe ableke aatani kiditɔ kuzuru u.
41003028	“Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si Aya aakɔ̀ banima eboe zimizi kakaa ni ebusioboe kakaa gi biado e, kukɔkyɛ ba.
41003029	Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aapani liboe zimizi kuyurɔ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛ, batrákɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ liwewe e, lɛ ese linu si abitɛ liboe zimizi gi batrákɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ liwewe.”
41003030	Yesu apani nite lɛ ese linu si banɔatɔ bɛpani si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ.”
41003031	Lɛ Yesu yene nì yɛ benemi ba bɛba eku u. Bɛlɛɛ ní oŋwe no lɛ bɛkpɛ odu itsisi yɛ si ɔba a.
41003032	Ɔnɔha ɔtɔ eze Yesu su lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Dike! Wone ni wɔ beneminyime ba ani wɔ benemidzɛ ba balɛɛ ní oŋwe no gi bɛɛpɛ wɔ ɛ.”
41003033	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu mone e? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ ba benu mɛ benemi ba a?”
41003034	Lɛ edi banama gi bedi iklani yɛ ɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mledi! mone liɛ ya, lɛ mɛ benemi ba ba ya a!
41003035	Ɔniliɛ gi izɛbitɛ kidiliɛ gi Aya apɛ ɛ, yɛ onu mɛ oneminyime e, nì mɛ onemidzɛɛ ani mone e.”
41004001	Yesu ekpese yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu. Linɔkpii lɛ gi lize yɛ ní su i, likeme niteme si, Yesu emu eku ní katapokpa atɔ mɛ lɛ eze ní ka mɛ ɛ. Katapokpaa kɛtrɔ ní kuni yo aʋa lɛ linɔkpi le lize ní limu ne kutu yɔ ɛ.
41004002	Ebú eboe glegle me aki ba epoe glegle gani abee ʋa mɛ si:
41004003	“Mlata kutu! Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi atrɛ amu na oglu kɔ ɔ.
41004004	Gi azeefuflu amu na ní kayaa mɛ ɛ, átɔ ɛdɔ kudeo me, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwita la ɛmlɔ ɛ.
41004005	Atɔ ɛdɔ ní akla na mɛ niklɔ gi sise sè sísrɛ ɛ, Lídze ko lɛ amubi la ɛyɛ ɛ lɛ ese linu si sise sè sísrɛ ɛ.
41004006	Pɔ̀ gi liwo le litu u xe kuweo kwiyi i, amuyɛyɛ la ɛyrɔ lɛ etse e. Lɛ ese linu si igũ̀ ne ísrɛ ní la ese e.
41004007	Amubiatɔ fɛ ɛwɔli eku ní bibu ʋe me. Gi bibu ʋe bitsì i, biwà ɛda ní amubi yɛyɛ la aʋa, niteme si amu na ébu libii tɔtɔ ɔ.
41004008	Pɔ̀ amubiatɔ ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa a. Niteme si ɛyɛ, etsi, lɛ eyo mɔmɔmɔ ɛ. Atɔ eyo ebi avitata, atɔ ebi aviteglo, lɛ atɔ fɛ eyo ebi alafa ɛ.”
41004009	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!”
41004010	Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu tole agɔ ɛ, banama gi benu yɛ liboe le e, ba mɛ batɔ ni badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bɛba yɛ klɔ, lɛ beʋi idɔni yɛ awla si abee gi ebu i, obu yɛ ese ɔki ba.
41004011	Niklɔ Yesu asi ba si, “Aya akɔ yɛ Kaʋaŋaa eboe kpòkpò la aki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ banama gi balɛ oge no e, ba xunyɔ ɛ, biapani eboe la asi ba ní abee ʋa mɛ,
41004012	tɔ ɛ, ‘Biatapo odi dzini kutapo odi, pɔ̀ batrámɔ egyesi i; biata kutu dzini kuta, pɔ̀ batránu kididɔ ese e. Lɛ ese linu si xegi bɛmɔ bidɔ egyesi i, loo benu eboe ese e, biakyi ní ba ina mɛ vu Aya kɔ akɔ akyɛ ba ɛ.’ ”
41004013	Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Xegi mlénu abee liɛ ese e, kɔ kitɛ liaze xe mlaanu abee dzedze ba ese e?
41004014	Ɔdɔkpɛɛ eefuflu Aya liboe le.
41004015	Banɔ batɔ balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ kudeo su kinɛ ɛ. Xegi benu liboe le ko e, kɔ Satana aba kɔ lɛ asɛ nɔ ɛ.
41004016	Nite ke banɔ batɔ fɛ balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní akla na mɛ kinɛ ɛ. Xegi benu liboe le ko e, bizɛɛzi lɛ ni isami.
41004017	Pɔ̀ liboe le liʋívu kese e, lɛ baʋíze gagla ní liboe le me e. Lɛ loso xe kuxixa loo keduyɔyɔ kɛba agani liboe le me e, kɔ bɛɛdzi kede kyɔŋ.
41004018	Lɛ banɔ batɔ fɛ balɛ ŋwisi amu a na klɔ gi ɛdɔ bibu ʋe me kinɛ ɛ. Ba benu banɔ batɔ gi bizeenu liboe le,
41004019	pɔ̀ kelea mɛ baxixa ʋa nì kibɔɛ kude kuzenoo ani kelea mɛ ɔgyi nɔ ɛ, bɛ pɔ́ bikpɛ likpɔ ɔ, gi bikɔ si liboe le límɔ obufuɛkɔ xe liabu libiitɔtɔ ɔ.
41004020	Pɔ̀ banɔ batɔ kɔ ɛ, balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ kese gbã aʋa kinɛ ɛ. Benu liboe le, bɛzi lɛ, lɛ beyò ebi la ɛ; batɔ beyò ebi avi tata, batɔ avi teglo, lɛ batɔ fɛ ɛ, ebi alafa ɛ.”
41004021	Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ aʋa si, “Nyaŋwɛ izɛsú kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ agba yɛ ese loo abati ese e? Aní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa bizɛtrɔ kani yɛ ɛ?
41004022	Kidɔ kakaa gi bekpo e biabu ke kudono ní oŋwe no, lɛ kidiliɛ aʋa gi bɛvini awlakpa la ɛtrɔ ɛ, bíabu ke dono.
41004023	Lɛ loso e, ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!”
41004024	Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa sì, “Mlata eboa la gi mlenu kutu mɔmɔmɔ! Kikpɛɛ liɛ gi mlɛkpɛ ɛki banima ɛ, nite ke biakpɛ ɔki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ mlɔ kiniɛ kiasanɔ ɔ.
