42001042	lɛ emuni yɛ ole lo si, “Wɔ́ Aya asa krira ní badzɛ ba petee kusi; lɛ obi liɛ gi wɔtrapɔ ɛ, biakrira yɛ!
42001043	Ege lɛ loso meku Aya liŋu te si mɛ Ɔkaɛ yene aaba si yipani mɛ ɛ?
42001044	Lɛ ese linu si kiliɛ gi wɔ kunɔpaniɔ kwiza eku mɛ kutu yɔ mɛ ko e, obi ye ní mɛ lipo le me, ahwa ni isami.
42001045	Lisamiboe linu si wɔzi lɛ aʋa ŋa si Ɔkaɛ eboe la gi asi wɔ ɛ, aaba la mɛ!”
42001046	Lɛ Maria apani si, “Mɛ ɔna nɔ ɛɛkpɔ Ɔkaɛ;
42001047	Lɛ isami iku mɛ esobo la ní Aya, yɛ onu mɛ ɔnɔbu ye;
42001048	Lɛ ese linu si aplɛ aŋu ni mɛ yɛ osumubi gi oyi kididɔ aʋa a. Dɔni abla ɛ, banima petee biaxwa mɛ si ɔsamì nɛ
42001049	Kɔkpɛ eboe ʋidi ala klɔ gi kigaglaɛ petee onetee abitɛ aki mɛ ɛ. Yɛ linyi ne linu Kudradra!
42001050	Banama petee gi bizenu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ izedi ba asigaga dɔni kipɔpɔ mɛ tsinɔ kipɔpɔ mɛ.
42001051	Abitɛ eboe kigagla nì yɛ ɔwla lɔ, lɛ ehle basufeke ba ni ba batrɔtrɔ ʋa petee e,
42001052	Lɛ bekusi ʋidi ba ɛ, ebu ba asa dɔni ba ekusigbo la aʋa, lɛ banama gi bepleni isu ya ɛ, emuni ba.
42001053	Banama gi kuʋɔɔ kwiku i, aki beke ni bidɔ gbã mɛ, lɛ akpɛ bexonete ba pɔ̀ kude ni iwla pluplu i.
42001054	Eboa la gi atrɔ aplɛ aki blɔ bakatsi ba ɛ abitɛ la aʋa lɛ apɔni Israel, yɛ besumubi ba.
42001055	Edi Abraham ni yɛ besoebi ba petee, asigaga kɔtsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ.”
42001056	Maria eze ní Elisabet su ŋwisi badzidzi tiata xe edzi atrɛ kepea a.
42001057	Gi lipoe le lina ɛki Elisabet si ople kese e, apɔ obinyime.
42001058	Lɛ gi yɛ axolika ba ni yɛ benete ba benu yɛ kubipɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ isami pɔni yɛ ní kiliɛ gi Aya apɛ lipo me aki Elisabet loso.
42001059	Ni liwe ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛba si bɛtsa ɔyaʋi tɔ bɛki obi ye linyi. Bɛpɛ si bɛkɔ yɛka linyi ne Zakaria ɛki yɛ.
42001060	Pɔ̀ yene ɔ́dimɛ lɛ aʋa a; lɛ asi ba si “yɛ linyi ne linu si Yohanes”.
42001061	Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si “wɔ ɔŋanɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔkɔ linyii lɛ klɔ.”
42001062	Lɛ, bɛbasɛ Zakaria awla a, xe beʋi ye linyi nɛ klɔ ɔ, gi apɛ si biaxwa obi ye e.
42001063	Zakaria eʋi si baki yɛ lidɔŋwlimikla lɛ aŋwlimi si, “Yɛ linyi si Yohanes.” Litu ɔnɔ kakaa kugyɔ.
42001064	Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Zakaria yɛ onugu lo ɛdra gi ekpese kunugu yo kugu u, lɛ ekpese Aya kukpɔ̀ ɛ.
42001065	Liki si lifu liku axolika ba petee, lɛ liboe le lihle eku ní Yudea eto la ima nɛ petee me.
42001066	Nite si ɔnɔ kakaa gi enu liboe le e, egyo le edi. Lɛ beʋi si, “Obi liɛ, ege atrádzi i?” Lɛ mɛ lidra si, Aya yɛ ɔwla ɔlɛ ní yɛ aʋa.
42001067	Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eyí Zakaria gi onu Yohanes yɛka ɛ, niteme si apani aplɛ si,
42001068	“Mlaki tɔ kukpɔ̀ Ɔkaɛ, gi onu Israel Aya ɛ! Aba apɔni yɛ banima, lɛ ebu ba ní bibɔ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ.
42001069	Aki blɔ Ɔnɔbu gagla dɔni Dawid gi eze yɛ osumubi yɛ lipo le me e.
42001070	Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi edo aplɛ gani yɛ beboedoplɛ dradra ba aʋa lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ lɛ ya kinɛ ɛ
42001071	si yɛ aabu blo dɔni blɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba iwla mɛ, ni dɔni banama petee gi bevu blo ekpɛ lipo me ba kigaglaɛ ese e.
42001072	Asi yɛ adi blɔ bakatsi ba asigaga, lɛ yɛ aplɛ aŋu ní yɛ kunyanya dradra ni ba aʋa a.
42001073	Kunyanya dradraa liɔ klɔ kunu kitamu gi aka aki blɔ ɔkatsitsi ye Abraham
42001074	si yɛ aabu blo ní blɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba iwla mɛ tɔ kwiamɔ kudeonu gi kwiasumu ye lifumose e,
42001075	niteme si blɔ isu ya nì blɔ ina nɛ mɛ iadra lɛ iagyɔ ní yɛ aŋu mɛ blɔ ewe la petee e.
42001076	“Lɛ loso mobi ye, biaxwa wɔ si kigaglaɛ petee onetee yɛ oboedoplɛ. Wɔatu ɔtɔ ki Ɔkaɛ tɔ wɔalulɔ kudeo plɛ ki yɛ,
42001077	lɛ wɔ́ wɔtrabasɛ Aya yɛ banima si, Aya aabu ba kɔ akɔ ba eboe zimizi na akyɛ ba ɛ.
42001078	Blɔ Aya onu ɔnɔ gi izeedi asigaga a lɛ yɛ ɔna ɛyɔ ɔ. Lɛ aaki ligbã nɛ liwo le liatu ki blɔ dɔni lifunu ne,
42001079	gi líakle bali banama gi bákpasi litumu ni kutseo lifu kusese le me aʋa; gi kuklekleo liɔ klɔ kwiagbani blɔ kukpɛ ní kusuyɔ lideke le me e.”
42001080	Lɛ obi ye etsi gi eze gagla ní kisugya ni Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Yɛ ozeklɔ eze ɔyayakɔ kɔkpɛ ni liwe lɛ gi ebu isu ya abasɛ Israelbanɛ ma ɛ.
42002001	Liba lɛ mɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ si Roma Ɔʋaŋaɛ Kaisaro Augusto akpɛ ɔsã si bakla banama petee gi beze ní Roma Kaʋaŋaa ese e, tɔ baŋwlimi aplɛ ɛ.
42002002	Lɛ ya lize banɔ kuklakla tɔpu ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi Kirenio eze Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ ní Siria a.
42002003	Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ kakaa atrɛ ní yɛ kepea si tɔ bakla yɛ.
42002004	Liki si Yosef asɛ Nazaret ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea kesea mɛ atrɛ ní Betlehem ɔma nɔ mɛ gi ɔlɛ Yudea kesea mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ onu Okusi ye Dawid yɛ ɔpɔklɔ. Lɛ ese linu si Yosef ádɔ Okusi ye Dawid yɛ okú no me.
42002005	Yɛ ni Maria gi onu ɔdzɛɛ ɛ gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawla ɛki yɛ ɛ, ba bɛtrɛ ní enyi na ɔŋwlimi klɔ. Pɔ̀ lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖi i, lipo lize ní Maria su.
42002006	Lɛ gi beze ní Betlehem i, yɛ lipoe le lina si ople kese.
42002007	Nite si apɔ Yebi tɔpu yɛ gi eze obinyime e. Lɛ axla basa ní yɛ su, xe akɔ yɛ aplɛ ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazi ya mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si bámɔ ozekɔ ní bababa ba ɔya klɔ ɔ.
42002008	Beʋesigbanɔ ba bezeepe ba iʋesi le ní ɔyayakɔ ní kusio klɔ elesi la.
42002009	Ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ ebu isu ya abasi ba, lɛ Aya yɛ kudradraa kwikle ebali ní ba aʋa a gi lifu liku ba a.
42002010	Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba si i, “Mlekíse lifu! Mamani mlɔ liboe gbã, lɛ liboe lɛ klɔ linu lisamiboe ki banima petee e.
42002011	Lɛ ese linu si omono liwe le e, bɛpɔ Ɔnɔbu ye ki mlɔ ní Dawid ɔma nɔ mɛ. Yɛ onu Kristo Ɔkaɛ.
42002012	Nite si kidiliɛ gi mlakɔ mɔ yɛ gyesi i, kɛ kinu si, mlaamɔ obi ɔtɔ gi bɛxla basa ní yɛ su u, xe bɛkɔ yɛ ɛplɛ ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazia me e.”
42002013	Lɛ lisɛ́ɛ nɛ ɛ, lifunu ne baxwɛdzɛ ba likpiʋiidi itɔ liple eku iklani ɔxwɛdzɛ tɔpu yɛ; bɛzɛkpɛ idzi nɛ lɛ bɛzɛkpɔ̀ Aya si:
42002014	“Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ kunu Aya yɛ kunɛ ní lifunu ne hwii! tɔ kusuyɔ kuba Kesea aʋa ki banama gi beku yɛ liŋu i.”
42002015	Gi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bedziimu lifunu ne ní ba su i, beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛpani ɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutrɛ ní Betlehem tɔ kuzeedi liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, gi lɛ Ɔkaɛ ebu abasɛ blɔ ɛ.”
42002016	Lɛ loso bɛkɔsi itrɛ lɛ bɛzɛmɔ Maria ni Yosef ani obi ye gi ɔfini ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazia mɛ ɛ.
42002017	Gi beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛmɔ obi ye e, behle liboe lɛ gi Aya ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba ní ɔnuvɔɛ su i.
42002018	Liki si banama petee gi benu liboe le e, ba inugu itse ní beʋesigbanɔ ba eboe la su.
42002019	Pɔ̀ Maria aplɛ aŋu ní eboe la petee aʋa, lɛ egyo la edi fɔ̃ɔ ni yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ.
42002020	Lɛ beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛsɛ ɛ. Bɛzɛkpɛ idzi nɛ zɛɛkpɔ Aya lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi bɛmɔ ɔ xe benu i, eze kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba ɛ.
42002021	Liwe ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ gi lipoe le lina si batsà ɔyaʋi aki obi ye e, bɛki yɛ linyi si Yesu. Linyi lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ edo aplɛ akpɛ ɔtɔ si bakɔ aki yɛ ɛ, xe ableke bɛkɔ yɛ limɛ nɛ ɛ.
42002022	Gi lipoe le lina si Yosef ni Maria bazeplo isu ya ní Mose Ɔsã nɔ onu i. Bɛtsini ɔnuvɔɛ ní Yerusalem, tɔ bɛkɔ yɛ basɛ Ɔkaɛ.
42002023	Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ mɛ si, “Obinyime tɔpu kakaa ɛ, biakɔ yɛ ɔki Ɔkaɛ.”
42002024	Bɛdzɛ fɛ si tɔ biaki Aya bisumudɔ, gi binu abronuma tiaʋa loo akpakpo nuvɔ taʋa, ní Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ onu u.
42002025	Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Simeon i, eze ní Yerusalem. Eze ɔnɔ gbã lɛ azɛɛbitɛ ní Aya yɛ isã nɛ aʋa a. Azeepe lipoe lɛ gi Aya aabu Israel i. Lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eze ní yɛ aʋa a.
42002026	Lɛ lɔ̀ ɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki yɛ si ɔ́tratse e, kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ gi aamɔ Ɔkaɛ yɛ Kristo ye e, gi aka aplɛ ɛ.
42002027	Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ́ ɛgbani Simeon tsini Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi bapɔnɛ ba fɛ bɛkɔ obi ye Yesu i manɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ní ligoʋi le oxo klɔ ní Ɔsã nɔ onu.
42002028	Simeon azɛ obi ye evu lɛ edo Aya ɖase e si:
42002029	“Abla ɛ, Ɔkaɛ Aya, liboe lɛ gi wɔka aplɛ ɛ, wɔbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa. Lɛ loso e, ki tɔ wɔ osumubi ye, ɔsɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ.
42002030	Lɛ ese linu si mɛ ɔtutɔ mamɔ wɔ kubúbú yo ni mɛ bimbi ʋe.
42002031	Gi lɛ wɔbla aplɛ ní banima petee aŋu mɛ ɛ.
42002032	Kuklekle gi kiabu wɔ kupɛ́pɛ ɔ ɔbasɛ banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ. Lɛ kwiamani kuklekleo ki wɔ banima Israel.”
42002033	Obika yɛ ni obinee ba inugu itse ní eboa la gi Simeon apani ní ɔnuvɔɛ su i.
42002034	Lɛ gi Simeon akrira ba ɛ, asi Maria, Yesu yene si, “Obi liɛ, Aya ɔtutɔ akya yɛ si gani yɛ aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle ní Israel biagleʋe. Pɔ̀ gani yɛ ke aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle biamɔ kubúbú ní Israel. Yɛ aaze lixaŋu kikpɛdɔ dɔni Aya klɔ, gi kɛsu banɔ glegle biayɔ kedu u.
42002035	Lɛ banima begyodi kpòkpò ʋa biaŋwi. Pɔ̀ wɔ tutɔ ɛ, kuyeʋiyeʋi kwiaze ŋwisi ihɛ piɔpiɔ, gi aatiku wɔ ɔna nɔ mɛ kinɛ ɛ.”
42002036	Lipoɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ oboedoplɛ tsitsi ɔtɔ eze ní Yerusalem. Yɛ linyi si Hana eze Fanuɛl gi ádɔ ní Asa yɛ okú no me e, Yebi. Agɔ tegloele ko eze ní kenyime pe xe yenye etse e.
42002037	Eze ahosi gi azɛ agɔ avi ɔgɔtaʋa ni tene e. Kesumupea mɛ ko azeeze lɛ eze ní onugu nyanya ni aklamasi aʋa elesi ni kemize gi azeesumu Aya ɛ.
42002038	Yɛ fɛ eze ní kesumupea mɛ ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ aʋa. Lɛ gi eti apɔni ba ɛ, edo Aya ɖase. Lɛ banama petee gi bɛzeepe Aya si aazi ki Yerusalem i, Hana apani liboe ní obi ye su asi ba.
42002039	Gi Yosef ni Maria bexo egoʋi la pɔ́ ni Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ onu i; bedzitrɛ ní Nazaret, ba kepea ní Galilea kesea mɛ.
42002040	Ɔnuvɔɛ etsi gi kigagla kize ní yɛ su u. Kuboeteo fɛ kwize ní yɛ awla, lɛ Aya yɛ lipomepɛpɛ nɛ lize ní yɛ aʋa a.
42002041	Ligɔ kakaa Yesu yɛ bapɔnɛ ba bɛzɛɛdzɛ Yerusalem Kutselidɔzawe le ɔŋakɔ.
42002042	Gi Yesu azɛ agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní liwe le ɔŋakɔ dzɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛzɛbitɛ lɛ kinɛ ɛ.
42002043	Pɔ̀ gi bɛŋa liwe le pɔ́ ɛ, yɛ bapɔnɛ ba beku kudeo me dzitrɛ ní Kepea. Pɔ̀ obi ye Yesu xunyɔ awɔ Yerusalem ní yɛ bapɔnɛ ba kumotemote me.
42002044	Begyodi si ba obi ye eze ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi xe bɛzɛɛtrɛ ɛ. Bɛga kudeo liwe zizi, xe ableke bekpese ba obi ye kupɛ́ ní ba benete ba ni ba baʋianɛ ba kusi i.
42002045	Agi bámɔ yɛ ɛ, bedzitrɛ ní Yerusalem gi bɛɛzɛpɛ yɛ ɛ.
42002046	Liwe tanɛ we le e, bɛtsani yɛ ní Lisumugba lɛ mɛ. Eple eze ní Yudanɛ ma badɔbasɛ ba kusi gi azɛɛta ba kutu u, xe azeeʋi ba beʋiʋi ʋa ɛ.
42002047	Ɔnɔ kakaa gi enu yɛ eboe la ɛ, yɛ onugu etse ní yɛ kuboesenu yo nì eboe la onu kubúbú mɔmɔmɔ su.
42002048	Lipoe lɛ gi yɛ bapɔnɛ ba bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, litu ba kugyɔ. Lɛ yene eʋi ye si, “Mobi ye, ege lɛ loso wɔbitɛ nite ɔmanɔ ní blɔ su u? Mɛ ni wɔka kwikyigyi gi kwipɛ wɔ ɛ.”
42002049	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛpɛ́ mɛ ɛ? Kɔ kite mléte si, lilɛ si mize ní mɔka kepea mɛ na a?”
42002050	Pɔ̀ bénu liboe lɛ gi apani ese e.
42002051	Lɛ Yesu edzi atrɛ ní Nazaret nì ba ɛ. Lɛ Yesu enu kutu aki ba a. Pɔ̀ yene evu eboa la petee akpɛ yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ.
42002052	Lɛ Yesu, etsi ní kisugya ni kuboeteo me, gi yɛ liboe liku Aya ni banima aŋu u.
42003001	Ni ligɔ liɔfɔ ni otsu ye me gi Tiberio edzì Roma ɔʋaŋaɛ ɛ, xe Pɔntio Pilato kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Yudea kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ mɛ ke Herodes azɛɛŋa Galilea kesea aʋa a; xe Herodes yenemi ye Filipo kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Iturea nì Trakonite kuseo aʋa a. Lisania kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Abilene kesea aʋa,
42003002	lɛ Anas ni Kayafa ba kyɛ beze kusumu yo baka ba ɛ. Lipoɛ klɔ mɛ Aya yɛ ole lo ɛba ɛki Yohanes, Zakaria ye bi ye ní ɔyaya klɔ.
42003003	Ɛki si Yohanes aklanɔ kuseo liɔ klɔ gi kuli ní Yordan onipe lo su i me. Gi azɛɛpani Aya yɛ liboe le si, mlekyi adɔ ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ tɔ mlaki tɔ bakpɛ kuni yo aki mlɔ, atɔ Aya ɔkɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ mlɔ.
42003004	Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ni Yesaya oboedoplɛ yɛ keplekpaa mɛ kinɛ si, “Ɔnutɔ ɛɛkla ní ɔyaya klɔ si, ‘Mlalulɔ kudeo aplɛ akí Ɔkaɛ, Mlebu kude gyɔgyɔ aplɛ aki yɛ tɔ aaga!
42003005	Mlayaʋi eto la tɔ mlakɔ etsi bàpɛ ʋa, tɔ mlepleni eto la ni ketokpa kakaa tɔ bidzi kadadase. Bede klɔʋiklɔʋi ʋa petee bàgyɔ̀ tɔ bede aʋa gi bázrɔ ɛ, ba petee aʋa tɔ bazrɔ.
42003006	Tɔ ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ kupɔpɔɔ pɔ́ kwiamɔ Aya yɛ kubúbú yo.’ ”
42003007	Yohanes eʋi anɔkpi ala gi edo etrɛ si ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba a si, “Mlɔ bagblaga kipɔpɔ mɛ bebi ba a, nyaŋwɛ asi mlɔ si mlaatani kuse ní Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio gi kwitraba su u
42003008	Mlabitɛ eboa la gi aabasɛ si mlekyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ, tɔ mlamɔni isu ya kusɛ si Abraham yɛ lipo me bebi kunu. Mɛɛka lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si Aya aatani besoebi kubu dɔni akla la ya mɛ ki Abraham!
42003009	Dike! Aya yɛ kawɛa katini ní ose lo igu ne aʋa kooko gi kɛtratsa ose lo eʋe e. Lɛ ose kakaa lɔ gi óyo ebi gbã ɛ, biatsa lɔ kɔŋwia kpɛ kifu yɛ mɛ.”
42003010	Linɔkpi le liʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ ege kwiabitɛ ɛ?”
42003011	Lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔniliɛ gi ewu taʋa alɛ ní yɛ awla ɛ, ɔkɔ tile ɔki ɔniliɛ awla gi litɔtɔ lima ɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ awla gi kiŋaŋa kilɛ ɛ, ɔlɛ kɛ ɔki banima.”
42003012	Babɔgyɔ batɔ kyɛ bɛba si ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ”, “ege lilɛ si kubitɛ ɛ?”
42003013	Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlakígyɔ kibɔ ní ɔnɔnɔ awla sani kiliɛ gi ɔsã nɔ eʋi i.”
42003014	Bagutaatɔ kyɛ beʋi ye si, “Blɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, ege lilɛ si kubitɛ ɛ?” Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlakíkɔ gigagla ɛzi kibɔ ní ɔnɔnɔ awla a; lɛ mlakísɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔnɔ awla a. Mlɔ liʋɛ nɛ liku mlɔ aŋu.”
42003015	Banima bezee di kudeonu lɛ ba petee bezegyo edi si putɔ Yohanes yɛ onu Kristo ye na a?
42003016	Pɔ̀ Yohanes asi ba petee si, “Mɛ kɔ ɛ mɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki mlɔ; pɔ̀ ɔnutɔ atrába ní mɛ kede gi ekeme asani mɛ ɛ. Lɛ mégyeno gi maable yɛ afɔkpa ʋa igbé ne e. Yɛ aakpɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ nì kifu ki mlɔ.
42003017	Evu yɛ kitɛɛ gi atrákɔ ɛpi amu na ní yɛ ketsripɛa mɛ kɔ ahali agbã̀ na akpɛ ní owle lo me. Pɔ̀ itsɔ lɛ xunyɔ ɛ, aakani lɛ nì kifu moni ye.”
42003018	Yohanes, aga bede glegle aʋa gi akɔ apani Liboe Gbã nɛ asi banima a, lɛ eme le akpɛ ba batu ʋa mɛ si bekyi ba agbã́zeze na.
42003019	Pɔ̀ Yohanes aka aŋu mɛ aki Herodes gi eze kesea ɔʋadi ye e, ní kiliɛ gi azɛ yenemi ye yedze Herodia agbanɔ ni eboe dovo dzedze ala la petee gi abitɛ ní lɛ ya kede e.
42003020	Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, Herodes abitɛ liboe zimizi litɔ sanɔ gi lɛ lize si evu Yohanes akpɛ ligba a.
42003021	Agi akpɛ kuni aki banima petee pɔ ɛ, akpɛ kuni aki Yesu fɛ. Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya, ɛ, lifunu ne lidra
42003022	lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eple edɔ yɛ aʋa ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lifunu ne si, “Wɔ wonu mɛ obinyimee gi madimɛnɔ ɔ. Wɔ liboe liku mɛ liŋu.”
42003023	Yesu azɛ ŋwisi agɔ avi tata kinɛ xe ekpese yɛ axwɛ na a. Ní banima begyodi ʋa onu i, eze Yosef yɛ obinyime. Lɛ Yosef fɛ eze Eli yɛ obinyime e.
42003024	Lɛ Eli fɛ eze Matati yɛ obinyime e, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Lewi yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Lewi fɛ eze Melki yɛ obinyime e. Mɛlki eze Yona yɛ obinyime gi yɛ fɛ eze Yosef yɛ obinyime e;
42003025	Yosef fɛ eze Matatia yɛ obinyime, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Amos yɛ obinyime e. Amos eze Nahum yɛ obinyime, lɛ Nahum fɛ eze Ɛsli yɛ obinyime e, gi Ɛsli fɛ eze Nagai yɛ obinyime e.
42003026	Niteme si Nagai fɛ eze Maati yɛ obinyime; lɛ Maati fɛ eze Matatia yɛ obinyime e lɛ Matatia fɛ eze Semei yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Semei fɛ eze Yosek yɛ obinyime e, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e.
42003027	Yoda fɛ eze Yohanan yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yohanan fɛ eze Reza yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Reza eze Zerubabel yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Zerubabel eze Seyaltiɛl yɛ obinyime e, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Neri yɛ obinyime e.
42003028	Neri fɛ eze Mɛlkai (Melki) yɛ obinyime, gi yɛ fɛ eze Adi yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Adi fɛ eze Ɛlmadam yɛ obinyime e. Ɛlmadam fɛ eze Ɛr yɛ obinyime.
42003029	Niteme si Ɛr fɛ eze Yosua yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yosua fɛ eze Eliezɛ yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Eliezɛ fɛ eze Yorim yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Yorim fɛ eze Matati yɛ obinyime e, gi yɛ fɛ eze Lewi yɛ obinyime e.
42003030	Lewi fɛ eze Simeon yɛ obinyime; lɛ Simeon fɛ eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e, gi yɛ fɛ eze Yosef yɛ obinyime e. Yosef fɛ eze Yonam yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yonam fɛ ɛ eze Eliakim yɛ obinyime e.
42003031	Eliakim eze Melea yɛ obinyime, lɛ Melea eze Mena yɛ obinyime e; lɛ Mena fɛ eze Matata yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Matata ɛ, eze Natan yɛ obinyime, lɛ Natan eze Dawid yɛ obinyime.
42003032	Dawid eze Yese yɛ obinyime e, gi yɛ fɛ eze Obed yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Obed fɛ eze Boaz yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Boaz fɛ eze Salmon yɛ obinyime, lɛ Salmon fɛ eze Nahson yɛ obinyime e.
42003033	Nahson eze Aminadab yɛ obinyime, lɛ Aminadab eze Ram yɛ obinyime e. Ram eze Arni yɛ obinyime. Lɛ Arni fɛ eze Hesron yɛ obinyime e; Hesron fɛ eze Perez yɛ obinyime, gi Perez fɛ ɛ, eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e.
42003034	Nite si Yoda eze Yakob yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yakob fɛ eze Isak yɛ obinyime e, gi yɛ fɛ ɛ eze Abraham yɛ obinyime e, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Tera yɛ obinyime e. Tera fɛ ɛ, eze Nahor yɛ obinyime.
42003035	Nahor fɛ eze Seruk yɛ obinyime. Seruk fɛ eze Regu yɛ obinyime; lɛ Regu fɛ eze Pɛlɛk yɛ obinyime e. Pɛlɛk fɛ eze Ebɛ yɛ obinyime, lɛ Ebɛ fɛ eze Sala yɛ obinyime e;
42003036	gi Sala fɛ ɛ, eze Kainan yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Kainan eze Afasad yɛ obinyime e, gi yɛ fɛ eze Sem yɛ obinyime e; lɛ Sem eze Noa yɛ obinyime e. Noa eze Lamɛk yɛ obinyime.
42003037	Lɛ yɛ Lamɛk fɛ eze Metusela yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Metusela eze Enɔk yɛ obinyime e; Enɔk fɛ eze Yarɛd yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yarɛd fɛ eze Mahalaleel yɛ obinyime e; Mahalaleel fɛ eze Kenan yɛ obinyime,
42003038	lɛ Kenan fɛ ɛ, eze Enos yɛ obinyime e, gi Enos eze Set yɛ obinyime e, lɛ Set fɛ eze Adam yɛ obinyime e; niteme si Adam kɔ eze Aya Yebi i.
42004001	Gi Yesu ádɔ ní Yordan onipe lo su i, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kigagla ɛ kize ní yɛ aʋa, Lɛ ɛgbani yɛ ɛtsinɔ Ɔyaya klɔ ɛ,
42004002	níklɔ Ozimizi ye efeke ye edi ewe avi tene nyɔŋ. Lipoe lɛklɔ petee ɔŋa kididɔ ɔ, lɛ loso gi ewe la ɛza ɛ, kuʋɛ kwiku ye.
42004003	Lɛ Ozimizi ye asi yɛ si i, “Xe Aya Yebi wonu i, ki tɔ likla lɛ ya lidzì lìklã.”
42004004	Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya liboe le lipani si, ‘Aní kiŋaŋa su ko ɔnɔ gbagbe aaze ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.’ ”
42004005	Lɛ Ozimizi ye atsini yɛ ní ɔkɔ gyɔgyɔ ɔtɔ, lɛ ebu kelea mɛ baʋaŋa ʋa petee abasi Yesu ni lipoe kpekpemi itɔ mɛ ɛ.
42004006	Lɛ asi yɛ si, “maakɔ kigaglaɛ ni exo a la petee ki wɔ, bɛkɔ bɛ petee kpɛ awla ɛki mɛ, lɛ makɔ bɛ ki ɔniliɛ gi mapɛ ɛ.
42004007	Xegi wɔasumu me e, bɛ petee biadzi wɔ binɛ.”
42004008	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya liboe le lipani si, ‘Aya gi onu Wɔka ɛ, Yɛ tete ko wɔasumu lɛ Yɛ lixwɛ ko wɔawa a.’ ”
42004009	Lɛ Ozimizi ye agbani Yesu atsinɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɔgyɔgyɔ klɔ. Lɛ asi yɛ si, “Xegi Aya Yebi wonu i, lɛ kɔ yɔ lixu le dɔni ya tɔ zɛdɔ kesea.
42004010	Lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le lipani si, “ ‘Aya aakpɛ ɔsã aki yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi biadi wɔ aʋa mumɔ ɔ.’
42004011	Lipani fɛ si, ‘Biafeke wo ni ba awla la gi wɔtratù kikliʋi i.’ ”
42004012	Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu dzɛ si, “Aya liboe le ke lipani dzɛ si, ‘Wukífeke wɔ Ɔkaɛ gi yɛ onu wɔ Aya edi i!’ ”
42004013	Agi Ozimizi ye efeke Yesu edi gani kude kakaa onu xe ɔ́mɔ yɛ kude e, ayurɔ yɛ fukɔ.
42004014	Lɛ Yesu edzì atrɛ ní Galilea, lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kigaglaɛ kize ní yɛ aʋa a. Banima benu yɛ onu ní kusio klɔ petee.
42004015	Abasɛ bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ, gi banima petee bɛkpɔ̀ yɛ ɛ.
42004016	Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Nazaret niklɔ gi bɛgani yɛ ɛ. Lɛ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa ɛ, atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ kinɛ ɛ. Ayɔ si yikla Aya yɛ Liboe le.
42004017	Lɛ bɛkɔ oboedoplɛ Yesaya yɛ keplekpa ɛki yɛ ɛ. Gi adra ka ɛ, keboekpea lia klɔ gi aklà ɛ kɛpani si:
42004018	“Ɔkaɛ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔtini mɛ aʋa, lɛ ese linu si akya mɛ si mikɔ liboe gbã nɛ tsini bepiplinete ba. Akpɛ mɛ si, mible banama gi balɛ ní kunyánya mɛ ɛ, tɔ kuŋupoo fɛ kumɔ, tɔ banama gi bemi kpɛ kese e, fɛ bamɔ obufuɛkɔ.
42004019	Atɔ miki kelea petee ketè si, lipoe le lina gi Aya aabu yɛ banima ɛ.”
42004020	Yesu ada keplekpaa lɛ edzini ka aki ɔnɔpɔnɔ ɛ, xe eze kesea ɛ. Banama petee gi beze ní ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, bezeedi ye
42004021	lɛ asi ba si, “Liboe lɛ klɔ gi makla a xe mlenu i, liba lɛ mɛ omono.”
42004022	Yɛ liboe le liku ba petee aŋu, lɛ yɛ kinemi ye kɛ kubebeo, kwibitɛ ba yaa. Niteme si beʋi isu ya si, “Aní yɛ onu Yosef yebinyime lo o?”
42004023	Yesu asi ba si: Maka lɛ aʋa si mlɛtrabu abee liɛ ɛki mɛ si, “Ɔwabitɛɛ, bitɛ kuwa ki isu” mlɛtrapani si mɛ fɛ si, ‘eboa la klɔ gi mlenu si bɛbitɛ ní Kapernaum i, mibitɛ la ní mɛ kepea ní ya fɛ.’
42004024	Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, “Oboedoplɛ tɔtɔ liboe liʋiku aŋu ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kepea.”
42004025	Atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Mlata kutu: anukwarɛ linu si, lipoɛ lɛ klɔ gi dzeni ɔ́dɔ ɔ ní Israel kesea aʋa agɔ tata nì kapɛ ní Eliya lizepoe le e, xe kuʋɛ gagla atɔ kwidɔ ní kesea mɛ ɛ, badzɛ glegle gi ba benye ba betse e, beze ni Israel.
42004026	Pɔ̀ Aya ɔ́kpɛ Eliya ní ɔtɔtɔ kɔ ɔ, sani ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi yenye etse ní Zarefat ní Sidon kesea mɛ kɔ ɔ.
42004027	Lɛ kunya kyikyi yɔ kwize ní banɔ glegle su ní Israel ní Oboedoplɛɛ Elisa lizepoe le e. Pɔ̀ Aya ɔ́yɔni ɔtɔtɔ sani Naaman, Siria ɔnɛ ɛ.”
42004028	Banama petee gi beze ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ɔ, xe benu yɛ eboe la ɛ, isu iyeʋi ba.
42004029	Bɛyɔ lɛ behe Yesu idono ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛtsini ketokpaa aʋa ɛ. Ketokpaa lia klɔ aʋa bɛtsa ba ɔma nɔ. Nya bɛpɛ si betutru Yesu ikpɛ ní kupɛɔ mɛ xe e.
42004030	Pɔ̀ Yesu aga linɔkpi le kusi i, lɛ asɛ ní ba su i.
42004031	Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Kapernaum ɔma ɔtɔ ní Galilea kesea mɛ, lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa ɛ.
42004032	Banima inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su, lɛ ese linu si kigagla kize ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ.
42004033	Onyime ɔtɔ eze ní ɔtsaklɔ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní yɛ aʋa a. Akpɛ ozi tatata si,
42004034	“Ei! liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní blɔ su u? Wɔ Yesu, Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, Blɔ ɔkyurɔ kɔ́ wɔba na a? Mete ɔniliɛ gi yɛ wo nu i. Wɔ wo nu Aya yɛ Ɔxwɛdzɛ Dradra yɛ.”
42004035	Yesu akpɛ ozi ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi! Do za ní onyimee mɛ!” Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛŋwia onyimee plɛ kesea ní banima aŋu mɛ pɔ̀ ɔ́kpɛ yɛ libi i, lɛ edo ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.
42004036	Banima petee inugu itse lɛ bekyi xe beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “E! Eboe woli lu la ya a? Amɔ kudeonu ni kigagla gi ɛɛkɔ ɛpani iiki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne lɛ iido e.”
42004037	Niteme si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyii klanɔ ní kusio klɔ petee.
42004038	Gi Yesu asɛ ní Ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní Simon kepea mɛ. Kuwe gagla kutɔ kwivu Simon yɛ nadze; nite si bɛki Yesu kutete ní yɛ su.
42004039	Adzɛ alɛɛ ní yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ su lɛ akpɛ ɔsã aki kunyaa si kudo ní yɛ mɛ. Kuweo kwido ní yɛ mɛ nite si ayɔ kyɔŋ lɛ edi ba aʋa ɛ.
42004040	Gi liwo le liku i, banɔ baklɔ petee gi ba benete ba bɛzɛnyà bànyà ede ede na ɛ, bɛgbani banyanyaa ba petee manɔ ní Yesu klɔ. Yesu atrɔ awla ni ba mɛ ɔkakaa aʋa lɛ ayɔ ni ba ɛ.
42004041	Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne gi izɛkpɛ ozi tatata si “wɔ wonu Aya Yebi ye” kyɛ ido ní banɔ glegle me gi Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki lɛ si ikípani yɛ su i. Lɛ ese linu si ite si yɛ onu Kristo ye.
42004042	Keletitia livlɛ lɛ ɛ, Yesu edo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ, lɛ atrɛ ni ɔkutɔ gi ebu lidze e. Banima bɛzɛpɛ́ yɛ klanɔ. Lɛ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bekeni edi si betsí kudeo ɛki yɛ kusɛ̀sɛ.
42004043	Pɔ̀ asi ba si, “Lilɛ si mipani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su Liboe Gbã nɛ klanɔ ní ima dzedze le kyɛ mɛ. Lixwɛ lɛ klɔ loso Aya akpɛ mɛ.”
42004044	Lɛ loso Yesu apani Liboe Gbã nɛ aklanɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ petee ní kesea mɛ ɛ.
42005001	Liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu alɛ ní Genesaret limu ne kutu, lɛ banima bɛsa likpakpa lɛ klani yɛ si tɔ bénu Aya yɛ liboe le.
42005002	Amɔ kutapokpa tuʋa ní limu ne kutu yɔ gi bakpábu ba bɛyurɔ xe bezeplo ba dzikle ba ɛ.
42005003	Yesu emu eku ní tole me. Katapokpa lia klɔ keze Simon kanɛ. Nite si Yesu asi yɛ si otutru ka tsinɔ kuni yo aʋa taʋɛ. Yesu eple eze ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
42005004	Gi Yesu abasɛ bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ ɛ, asi Simon si, “mleku katapokpaa atsinɔ ní limu ne odzudzu klɔ tɔ mlata mlɔ dzikle ʋa atɔ mlebu akpa.”
42005005	Simon ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, kwikeni idi elesi zizi na petee pɔ̀ kúbu kididɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ní wɔ liboe le onu i, maapleni blɔ dzikle ʋa.”
42005006	Gi epleni be ɛ, bebu akpa la gbí gi ɛki si ba dzikle ʋa bekpese kukyì i
42005007	Lɛ loso bɛbasɛ ba benemi ba awla ní katapokpa ʋla mɛ si ba gapɔni ba. Bɛba ɛpɔni ba lɛ akpa la gi bebu i, eyí kutapokpa tuʋa gi ligɔ sisami tɔ kunyrɔ ɔ.
42005008	Gi Simon Petro amɔ ɔ liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, ekutu Yesu lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ sɛ ní mɛ su lɛ ese linu si eboe zimizi ɔbitɛbitɛ menu!”
42005009	Simon ni yɛ ahanuglɔ ba pɔ́ ba inugu itse ní akpa kɔdzɔkɔdzɔ ala gi bebu i su.
42005010	Nite ke Simon yɛ ahanuglɔ ba gi bɛzɛxwa si Yakobo ni Yohanes gi benu Zebedeo yɛ biba fɛ ɛ, libitɛ ba yaa. Lɛ Yesu asi Simon si, “Wukíse lifu u, dɔnɔ abla ɛ, banɔ wɔtrabu!”
42005011	Gi betini ba kutapokpaa ɛmanɔ ní oge no e, bɛyurɔ kidɔ kakaa lɛ bekuni Yesu kude e.
42005012	Gi Yesu eze ní ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi kunya kyikyĩ kwize ní yɛ su i, amɔ Yesu lɛ adɔ ni yɛ ketu ya a, xe aki yɛ litukpo si i, “Ɔkaɛ, xe wɔpɛ ɛ, wɔatani mɛ kuyɔnɔ.”
42005013	Yesu anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ lɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ. Lɛ apani si i, “Mapɛ! Wɔ isu ya idra!” Kyɔŋ ko e, kunyaa kwiblo ní yɛ su.
42005014	Yesu akpɛ ɔsã akí onyimee si, “Wukísi ɔnɔnɔ! Pɔ̀ trɛ ní kusumu yo ɔkaɛ klɔ tɔ zɛɛkɔ wɔ isu ya basɛ yɛ, tɔ ɔtapo wo odi. Lɛ kede e, tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ egyesi si wɔnyayɔ ɛ, zɛki bidɔ kɔkɔ ɛ bɛklɔ gi bɛ ɔsã Mose akpɛ ɛ.”
42005015	Pɔ̀ Yesu su eboe la eyi klanɔ ɛsanɔ. Lɛ anɔkpi la ɛba si lɛ enu yɛ eboe la tɔ biamɔ kuyɔyɔ dɔni ba bànya ʋa mɛ ɛ.
42005016	Pɔ̀ Yesu azeebu isu ya lidze e, lɛ azɛɛxwa Aya ní ɔyaya kɔ ɔ.
42005017	Liwe etɔ lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Farisianɛ batɔ ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ beze ní klɔ. Bɛdɔ ní ɔma kakaa mɛ ní Galilea ni Yudea kuseo me ani Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛba. Ɔkaɛ yɛ Kigaglaɛ kize yɛ aʋa gi akɔ azɛɛyɔni banyanya ba ɛ.
42005018	Benyime batɔ bɛmani onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e ní ɔtɔsi aʋa. Bekeni idi si bɛɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ligba lɛ mɛ tɔ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛplɛ ní Yesu ketu ya.
42005019	Pɔ̀ ɔnɔha lɔ loso e, bátani kudeo kumɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso befeke ye emu ní ligba lɛ aʋa a. Lɛ bebu liwu le ní ɔvitɔ lɔ ɔ, xe bepleni ɔnyanyaɛ ní yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ aʋa gani lɛ mɛ kpɛ ligba lɛ mɛ, ní banima kusio ní Yesu ketu ya a.
42005020	Gi Yesu amɔ ba kuziŋaa ɛ, asi onyimee si, “Ɔʋia, bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ.”
42005021	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma bekpese kupani ní batsali kusi si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ ya gi ɛɛpani ebusioboe ala la te e? Aya ko onu ɔniliɛ gi aatani eboe zimizi kukɔ kyɛ ɛ.”
42005022	Yesu ete ba begyodi ʋa lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege loso xe begyodi ba ya elu bàkpasi ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ?
42005023	Liwoli lisa ɛplɔplɔ si biapani i, ‘Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ’ loo, ‘Yɔ tɔ ga na a’?
42005024	Pɔ̀ tɔ mlete si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye amɔ kude ní kesea aʋa si aakɔ̀ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ ɛ.” asi onyime liɛ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ si, yɔ; feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ trɛ kepea mɛ!”
42005025	Kyɔŋ ní ba pɔ́ aŋu mɛ ɛ, onyimee ayɔ, efeke yɛ ɔtɔsi ɔlɔ aʋa gi afɛ ɛ, lɛ atrɛ kepea mɛ nì Aya kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ɔ.
42005026	Litu ba pɔ́ kugyɔ. Lifu liku ba; lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya xe bɛpani si, “Enugutseboe woli aŋu mɛ kwimɔ nite omono o?”
42005027	Eboa la ya kede e, Yesu edo; lɛ azɛɛmɔ ɔbɔgyɔ ɔtɔ ɔ, gi yɛ linyi linu Lewi i, gi eze ní yɛ lixwɛwagba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kuni mɛ kude e.”
42005028	Lɛ Lewi ayɔ, ayurɔ kidɔ kakaa lɛ eku ni yɛ kude e.
42005029	Lɛ Lewi atrɔ ɔdɔŋakplɔ ʋidi si yikpɛ kubùbù ní Yesu su ní yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Babɔgyɔ glegle ni banɔ dzedze batɔ beze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su.
42005030	Pɔ̀ líze Farisianɛ batɔ ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi bafɛ beze farisianɛ kule e. Lɛ loso beʋi Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛkpɛ awla ní kezi me xe mlɛɛŋwɛ bidɔ ni babɔgyɔ ba ni banama a gi benu banɔ zimizi na a?”
42005031	Yesu ebu le onu akí ba si, “Banama gi balɛ mumɔ ɛ, báziã ɔwabitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛnya ɛ, ba bɛziã ɔwabitɛ.
42005032	Mába si mixwa banɔ gbã, pɔ̀ banɔ zimzi ba maba si mixwa tɔ bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.”
42005033	Banɔ batɔ bɛsi Yesu si, “Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bizɛnya onugu, lɛ bizɛxwa Aya lipoe kakaa; lɛ nite ke Farisianɛ ma badɔkpasi ba fɛ bizɛbitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ wɔ badɔkpasi ba xunyɔ ɛ kuŋaa ni kuŋwɛŋwɛɔ aʋa ko balɛ́.”
42005034	Yesu ebu le onu akí ba si, “Xegi ɔdzɛnyee ɔlɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su i, kitɛ yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba biaze ni kuʋɛ ɛ? Lítraba lɛ mɛ liwewe e!
42005035	Pɔ̀ lipoe le litrába gi biagbani ɔdzɛnyee sɛnɔ ɔ. Kɔ banɔxwaxwa ba bɛnya onugu i.”
42005036	Yesu ebu abee aki ba dzɛ si: “Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋíkyi lisiapɛ dɔni liwu vuvu su kukɔlulɔ liwu koko ɔpami kɔ. Xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e, libasɛ si ezizi liwu vuvu nɛ, lɛ lisiapɛ nɛ ɛ, lítrasɔ nɔ liwu koko le e.
42005037	Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋikɔ kuda vuvu kukpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe koko me e. Xe aní te e, keʋe kokoa kiata kɔ kuda kwibali kɔ keʋea kezizi.
42005038	Boŋu i lilɛ si bakɔ kuda vuvu yɔ akpɛ ní Kagaplekpa keʋe vuvu me.
42005039	Nite ké ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋípɛ si yiŋwɛ kuda vuvu yɔ xegi aŋwɛ kukokoo pɔ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si aapani si, ‘Kuda kókoo kwipɛ ɛsani kuvuvũ yɔ!’ ”
42006001	Ni sabat ɔtɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛga idoli kayaa atɔ mɛ ɛza. Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekpese idoli le kuyasi, bɛ fili lɛ, xe bɛzɛ ta ɛ.
42006002	Niteme si Farisianɛ atɔ beʋi si, “Ege loso kidiliɛ liɛ gi blɔ ɔsã nɔ ɛsi si mlatrátani kubitɛ ní sabat yɛ aʋa ɛ, xe mlɔ kɔ mlɛbitɛ kɛ na a?”
42006003	Yesu ebu lɛ onu akí ba si, “Mlakla kidiliɛ gi Dawid abitɛ lipoe lɛ gi kuʋɔɔ kwiku yɛ ni yɛ banima lo o,?
42006004	Eti eku ní Aya ligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ akɔ lìklã nɛ gi bɛbla ɛplɛ ki Aya ɛ, lɛ atà nɛ, xe aki yɛ banima kyɛ. Gi liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su lɛ ese linu si kusumu yo baka ba ko bɛmɔ kude si biata lìklã ɛ nɛ klɔ.”
42006005	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si “Ɔnɔɛ Yebie e, onu Ɔka ki sabat yɛ.”
42006006	Ni sabat dzedze aʋa ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ gi azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ɔ. Onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ ɔŋawla lɔ etse e, eze klɔ.
42006007	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ ni Farisianɛ batɔ beze klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ kunutsatsa ní Yesu su i. Lɛ loso e bezevu aŋu ní yɛ su mɔmɔmɔ, tɔ bedi si aayɔ ni ɔnɔ ní Sabat yɛ aʋa na.
42006008	Pɔ̀ Yesu kɔ ete ba begyodi ʋa lɛ loso asi onyimee si, “Yɔ! Ga ba ɔtɔ nɔ yà.” Nite si onyimee ayɔ ɔlɛɛ.
42006009	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Miʋi mlo o: ege blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛsi si kubitɛ ní Sabat yɛ aʋa na a? Kubitɛ liboe gbã loo kubitɛ liboe nyani nyani i? Kubu ɔnɔ ligbã loo kudi ye tɔ otse e?”
42006010	Edi ba petee aklanɔ lɛ asi onyimee si, “Nina wɔ ɔwla lɔ!” Yɛ ɔwla lɔ eku lɔ kizee lɛ anina lɔ ɛ.
42006011	Isu ya iyeʋi Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma nyani nyani nite si begyodi ni ba kusi kidiliɛ gi biatani Yesu kubitɛ ɛ.
42006012	Liwetɔ lɛ ɛ Yesu emu atrɛ ketokpa katɔ aʋa si yizɛɛxwa Aya. Eze klɔ elesi la petee.
42006013	Gi kelea kɛti i, axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ. Lɛ ebu ba mɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa gi aki ba linyi si banɔkpɛkpɛ ba.
42006014	Banɔkpɛkpɛ ba beze Simon (Yesu axwa yɛ dzɛ si Petro) ni yenemie Andrea, Yakobo ni Yohanes i, Filipo ani Batolomeo.
42006015	Batɔ fɛ beze Mateo ni Toma, Yakobo, Alfeo yebie ni Simon gi adimɛ ni yɛ kesea ɛ.
42006016	Bagɔgɔ ba beze Yuda, Yakobo yebie, ani Yuda Iscariot gi yɛ abakpɛ Yesu ní awla ɛ.
42006017	Gi Yesu eple adɔ ni lito le aʋa a, ni yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba xe ana ɔdada klɔɛ ɛ, atsani yɛ badɔkpasi glegle atɔ. Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ gi lidɔ ní Yudea kesea petee me e, Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ, Tiro ni Sidɔn gi lɛ kyɛ inu ima ʋidi ni axu la kutu yɔ mɛ ɛ, lize ní iklɔ.
42006018	Banɔ baklɔ ba petee bɛba si benu yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ni tɔ ɔyɔ ni ba dɔni ba bànya ʋa mɛ. Banɔ baklɔ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne izɛkpɛ kunugu yo fɛ bɛba gi Yesu ayɔni ba a.
42006019	Ɔnɔ kakaa ekeni edi si yigbɔni yɛ, lɛ ese linu si kigagla kizɛdɔ ní yɛ mɛ gi kizɛyɔni banyanya ba petee e.
42006020	Yesu edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba lɛ apani si, “Mlamɔ isami mlɔ bepiplinete ba lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa ɛ mlɔ kanɛ kenu.
42006021	Mlamɔ isami mlɔ banama gi kuʋɛ kwiku abla ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlɛtrake e. “Mlamɔ isami mlɔ banama gi mlebemi abla ɛ lɛ ese linu si mlɛtramwɛ ɛ
42006022	Mlamɔ isami xe banima bevu mlo ekpɛ lipo me e, xe begbe mlo e, xe bekpini mlo o, xe bedo eboe nyani nyani na ɛyurɔ mlɔ ɔ kɔkpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye loso.
42006023	“Mleyo ni isami xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ liʋɛtsatsa lɛ lilɛ ní lifunu ne e. Likípè mlo o, lɛ ese linu si nite ké ba bakatsitsi ba bɛbitɛ tsinɔ ní Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba su ní kanɔa mɛ ɛ.
42006024	“Pɔ̀ babaa kí mlɔ bexonete ba a, lɛ ese linu si mlɛŋa mlɔ ligbã́ nɛ kooko!
42006025	Babaa kimlɔ banama gi mlekè abla ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ kuʋɛ kwitraku u! Babaa ki mlɔ banama gi mlɛmwɛ abla ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ mlɛtraze ní asigaga mɛ ɛ, xe mlaabemi i!
42006026	“Babaa ki mlɔ xe banima pɔ́ bɛkpɔ̀ mlɔ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si nite ke ba bakatsitsi ba bɛpani ní asia na beboedoplɛ ba su.”
42006027	“Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ banama gi mlenu mɛ liboe le si, mlalɔ mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma; tɔ mlapɛ̀ lipo me aki banama gi bevu mlo ekpɛ ɔna mɛ ɛ.
42006028	Mlakrira banama gi beexo ifi le ekpɛ mlɔ ɛ, lɛ banama gi beebu kini ɛki mlɔ ɛ, mlaxwa Aya ní ba litukpo.
42006029	Xe gi ɔnutɔ ábɔ wɔ osumu ní ɔtuʋa tole e, tɔ kyi ɔʋla lɔ ki yɛ tɔ ɔbɔ, lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ wɔ liwu le aʋa lini nɛ ɛ, tɔ bu lɛ ese liwu le fɛ ki yɛ.
42006030	Xe ɔnutɔ eʋi wo kiditɔ ɛ, kɔ kɛ ki yɛ. Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ wɔ kidɔ ɛ, wukíti ke e.
42006031	Lɛ kidiliɛ gi wɔ̀pɛ si babitɛ aki wɔ ɛ, bitɛ nite ke ki banima.
42006032	“Xegi mlɛdimɛ ni banama ko gi bɛdimɛ ni mlɔ ɛ, kitɛ Aya aakrira mlɔ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si banɔ zimizi ba kura fɛ ɛ bizɛdimɛ ni banama gi bɛdimɛ ni ba ɛ.
42006033	Lɛ xegi mlɛbitɛ eboe gbã ɛki banama ko gi bizɛbitɛ eboe gbã ɛki mlɔ ɛ, ege lɛ loso biakpɔ mlɔ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si nite ke banɔ zimizi ba fɛ bizɛbitɛ ɛ.
42006034	Lɛ xegi ɔniliɛ gi aatani kidiliɛ gi wɔdɔ ɔki yɛ dzini kutsa ki wɔ ko wɔɛdɔ bidɔ ɛkɔ ɛ, kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ tɔtɔ kúma lɛ mɛ ɛki wɔ. Banɔ zimizi ba fɛ nite ko bizɛdɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛki ba ahanuglɔ ba, lɛ ese linu si beedi kudeo onu si biadzini be kutsa aki ba.
42006035	Owo, Boŋu i, mlalɔ mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma tɔ mlapɛ̀ lipo me aki ba. Mladɔ bidɔ aki ba pɔ̀ mlakídi kudeo onu si biadzini ʋɛ kutsa ki mlɔ. Xe mlɛbitɛ nite e, mlɔ liʋɛ nɛ liakeme lɛ mlaaze Lifunu ne Ɔkaɛ yɛ bebi. Lɛ ese linu si, yɛ izepɛ̀ lipo me ɛki banama gi bidɔ biʋíku ba liŋu u, ni litukpo me gagla benete ba.
42006036	Mlazedi banɔ asigaga ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɔ Ɔkaɛ Aya fɛ izedi asigaga la kinɛ ɛ.
42006037	“Mlakíxwa litsi ni mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba tɔ Aya fɛ ɔ́kixwa litsi ni mlo o. Mlakíbu mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba lipɔ tɔ Aya fɛ aabu mlo lipɔ ɔ. Mlakɔ eboe akyɛ tɔ Aya fɛ aakɔ̀ kyɛ mlɔ.
42006038	Mlaki banɔ bidɔ tɔ Aya fɛ aaki mlɔ. Mlaamɔ bidɔ gi biayi kekpoa biami ʋe kpɛ lɛ biagbigba xe biakɔ kpɛ mlɔ awla. Lɛ ese linu si kália mɛ gi wɔkpɛ ɔki wonemi i, kamɛ ké Aya fɛ aakpɛ ɔki wɔ.”
42006039	Yesu ebu abee dzedze aki ba si, “Kaŋupo kátratani kaŋupo dzedze kugbanɔ ɔ. Xe ani nite e, ba tiaʋa pɔ́ biawɔli ku ní lizokpo me e.
42006040	Ableke e, ɔdɔkpasibi ɔ́tɔtɔ óʋikeme ɔsani yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ xegi ɔdɔkpasibi ye akpasi bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ ɛ, kɔ edzì ŋwisi yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kinɛ ɛ.
42006041	Ege lɛ loso wɔedi ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ onemi ye kimbie me e, xe wodze kanyikpea lia gi kalɛ ní wɔ ɔtutɔ wɔ kimbi ye me na a?
42006042	Kitɛ wɔasi wɔ onemi ye si, ‘Ki tɔ mibu ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ kimbi ye me’ gi wɔʋítani kanyikpea lia gi kalɛ ní wɔ kimbi ye me kumɔ na a? Wɔ ɔnɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ, bú kanyikpea ní wɔ kimbi ye me kpɛ ɔtɔ, kɔ wɔmɔ mumɔ kɔ wobu ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ onemi ye kimbi ye me.
42006043	“Kiliɛ gi ose gbã oʋí yo esebi nyani nyani i, nite ké ose nyani nyani kyɛ ɔ́tratani esebi gbã kuyo o.
42006044	Ose kakaa ɛ, lɔ esebi la bizɛkɔ te lo. Ɔ́nɔnɔ ɔ́ʋigu mangɔ ní ɔdɔ̃ mɛ ɛ; lɛ ɔ́nɔnɔ fɛ ɔ́ʋigu imumɔɛ ní fife me e.
42006045	Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ gbã ɛ, izebu bidɔ gbã ɛdɔnɔ ní bidɔ gbã ɛ mɛ gi bilɛ ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ. Nite ké ɔnɔ zimizi ye kyɛ izebu eboe zimizi dɔnɔ ní bidɔ zimizi bɛ klɔ gi bilɛ ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi eyi ɔna nɔ ɛ, la onugu lo izɛpani.
42006046	“Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba dzɛ si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛxwa mɛ si, ‘Ɔka, Ɔka’, xe mláʋibitɛ ní eboa la gi mɛɛsi mlɔ aʋa a!
42006047	Ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛba mɔklɔ ɛ, xe izenu mɛ eboe la a, xe izɛbitɛ ní la aʋa ɛ, maabasɛ mlɔ ɔniliɛ elu gi onu i.
42006048	Ɔniliɛ klɔ ɔlɛ ŋwisi onyime liɛ gi azɛɛwa ligba kinɛ ɛ. Ebu ide ne gi iidzu u xe ina liklakpɔ lɛ ní sise se me; lɛ akpɛ ɔklaxɔ gagla ní ide ne me e. Onipe lo eyi gbigba gi ɛyaʋi iku ligba lɛ klɔ ese e; pɔ̀ kididɔ kísa ligba lɛ, lɛ ese linu si bɛwa lɛ mumɔ ɔ.
42006049	Pɔ̀, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izenu mɛ eboe la a, xe ɔ́ʋibitɛ ni la aʋa ɛ, ɔlɛ ŋwisi onyime ɔtɔ gi awa yɛ ligba lɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔ́kpɛ ɔklaxɔ ní ligba lɛ ese kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso lipoe lɛ gi kuni yo kwiyaʋi iku ligba lɛ ese e, likpà kyɔŋ gi kibitɛ tɔtɔ kize ní lɛ su u.”
42007001	Agi Yesu ebu abee báklɔ aki banima nite e, asɛ atrɛ ní Kapernaum.
42007002	Roma banɛ ma baguta ba ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi osumubi gbã ɔtɔ eze yɛ awla. Yɛ ɔkaɛ ɔ́dimɛ ní yɛ su, osumubi ye yɛ isu ya mɛ izizi gi ihatse e.
42007003	Agi baguta ba ɔkaɛ enu Yesu unu i, ebu Yudanɛ ma banɔtsitsi batɔ akpɛ ní Yesu klɔ si basɛ yɛ si ɔga ayɔni yɛ osumubi ye ɔki yɛ.
42007004	Gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛki yɛ litukpo glegle si, “Liziã si wɔapɔni baguta ba ɔka liɛ.
42007005	Alɔ blɔakɔanɛ ma, lɛ yɛ, awa blɔ ɔtsaklɔ ligba lɛ aki blɔ ɔ.”
42007006	Lɛ loso e Yesu atrɛ ni ba. Kiliɛ gi bíha kepea mɛ okú i, baguta ba ɔkaɛ atsisi yɛ ole si, “Ɔkaɛ, wukíkpɛ isu kunugu u, mégyeno si wɔatiku mɛ kepea mɛ ɛ.
42007007	Lɛ mébu isu ya si megyeno gi maaba wɔ kɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso e, wɔ kɔ pani liboe ko mɛ osumubi ye aayɔ.
42007008	Mɛ fɛ makpasi ɔnutɔ yɛ kigagla ese, lɛ baguta bákpasi mɛ ese e. Xe masi tole si, ‘Trɛ ɛ!’ aatrɛ. Xe masi ɔʋlaɛ si, ‘Ba a!’ aaba. Lɛ xe maka mɛ osumubi ye si, ‘Bitɛ kidiliɛ ɛ,’ izɛɛbitɛ kɛ.”
42007009	Gi Yesu enu yɛ eboe la ɛ, yɛ onugu etse lɛ ekyi edi linɔkpii lɛ gi lize ni yɛ kude e; lɛ asi ba si, “sugba ɛ, mámɔ kuziŋa ʋidi uliɔ elu edi ní Israel fɛ.”
42007010	Lɛ gi baxwɛdzɛ ba bedzitrɛ ní baguta ba ɔkaɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si osumubi ye ayɔ.
42007011	Lidze xe Yesu atrɛ ní ɔma ɔtɔ ɔ gi bizɛxwa si Nain mɛ ɛ. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lizeni yɛ kude.
42007012	Gi ana ɔma nɔ kevunu ya ɛ, atsani ɔnɔha gi ɛtrɛɛvive okpo ye e. Okpo ye eze ɔtrɛtrɛ ɔtɔ yedze yebinyime tole. Lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize ni ɔtrɛtrɛ yedzee kude dɔni ɔma nɔ mɛ.
42007013	Agi Ɔkaɛ amɔ ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze e, yɛ liboe liga yɛ asigaga. Lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wukíbemi i.”
42007014	Lɛ Yesu eti apɔni okpo ye yɛ aɖaka yɛ lɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ. Lɛ banama gi bevu aɖaka yɛ ɛ, bedzialɛ. Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Ɔyasɔʋi, mɛɛsi wɔ si, yɔ!”
42007015	Ko lɛ okpo ye ayɔ eze, xe ekpese kunugu yo kugu i. Lɛ Yesu edzini yɛ aki yene e.
42007016	Liki si lifu liku ba petee, lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya a, lɛ bɛpani si, “Oboedoplɛ ʋidi ɔtɔ aba blɔ kusi i. Aya aba gi atrázɛ ikí yɛ banima a!”
42007017	Nite si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyi gi litsa Yudea kesea ni besi ba klɔ petee.
42007018	Gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛpani ní Yesu yɛ eboe bitɛbitɛ la su ɛsi Yohanes i, axwa ba mɛ tiaʋa
42007019	Lɛ akpɛ ba si bazeeʋi Ɔkaɛ si, “Wɔ wonu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi bɛsi si aaba a, putɔ kudi ɔnɔ dzedze ɔtɔ kudeonu na a?”
42007020	Agi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ akpɛ blɔ si kuʋi wo si wɔ wonu ɔniliɛ su gi yɛ edo aplɛ si aaba na, putɔ kudi ɔnɔ dzedze ɔtɔ kudeonu na?”
42007021	Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖii, Yesu ayɔni banyanya glegle adɔ ní ba bànya ʋa mɛ, lɛ akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne adɔ nɔ batɔ mɛ ɛ; xe aki kuŋupo glegle bimbi ʋe bidra a.
42007022	Lɛ ebu le onu aki Yohanes yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba si i, “Mledzi atrɛ tɔ eboa la gi mlɛmɔ ɔ, xe mlenu i, mlakɔ la abasɛ Yohanes, si kuŋupoo kwimɔ, lɛ gbafa ba bɛyɔ ɛga a. Lɛ banama gi bɛnya kunya kyikyi yɔ ɛ, ba isu ya iidra. Lɛ itoku le fɛ ɛ, iinu, lɛ bekpo ʋa fɛ ɛ, bɛɛyɔ edzì ligbã. Lɛ bɛɛpani Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛsi bepiplinete ba.
42007023	Isami iku banama gi bálila ba kuziŋa ni mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, kɔkpɛ kidiliɛ gi mɛɛbitɛ ɛ!”
42007024	Agi Yohanes yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛsɛ ɛ, Yesu ekpese kupani ki linɔkpi le ní Yohanes su si, “gi mledo etrɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ ɛ, ege mlɛdi kudeonu si mlamɔ ɔ? Aplɔ̀plɔ̀ na gi liwɔ lɛ lizeefu putɔ ɔ?
42007025	Ege mledo etrɛ si mlɛzeedi i? Ɔnɔ gi eze ní awu gbã na mɛ putɔ ɔ? Banama gi bizɛkpɛ awu la nite e, xe bizɛŋa ligbã nɛ ɛ, kukusipe me bizɛmɔ ba.
42007026	Mlasi mɛ; ege mledo etrɛ xe mlɛzɛɛmɔ ɔ? Oboedoplɛ? Ee, nite ɖii. Pɔ̀ kidiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, kisani oboedoplɛ.
42007027	Lɛ ese linu si Yohanes yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ sú Aya yɛ liboe le lipani plɛ si, “ ‘Aya si, maakpɛ mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ wɔ ɔtɔ nɔ tɔ aadra kudeo ɔki wɔ.’
42007028	Lɛ Yesu edo apɔnɔ si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ si Yohanes ekeme asani ɔnɔ kakaa gi eze edi i. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi onu ɔsisami yɛ ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, ekeme asani Yohanes.”
42007029	Banama pɔ́ gi benu liboe lɛ gi Yesu apani i, ni babɔgyɔ ba kyɛ ɛ, bɛzi lɛ si Aya yɛ kudeo kwigyɔ, lɛ loso ba Yohanes akpɛ kuni yo akɔ ɔ.
42007030	Pɔ̀ farisianɛ ma ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba kɔ ɛ, begbe bázɛ Aya kudeo gi ata aplɛ akí ba ligbã nɛ kupɛ̀pɛɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso bádimɛ si Yohanes ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba a.
42007031	Lɛ Yesu atrɛ yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Ege maakɔ abla kelea mɛ banima srɔnɔ ɛ? Ege beyi i?
42007032	Balɛ ko ŋwisi banuvɔ gi bɛɛwaʋi ní line ne me kinɛ ɛ. Ba ɔha tole ɛɛkpɛ ozi lo exwa ɔha ʋla lɔ si, “ ‘Kwiʋe isamidzi iiki mlɔ, pɔ̀ mléyo o; kwikpɛ ibemidzi iiki mlɔ, pɔ̀ mlébemi i.’
42007033	Agi Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ aba ɛ, anya onugu lɛ ɔ́ŋwɛ kuda fɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ lɛ mlɛpani ní yɛ su si, ‘Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.’
42007034	Lɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba ɛ. Yɛ kɔ ɛ, aŋa bidɔ, lɛ aŋwɛ bidɔ fɛ ɛ. Lɛ mlɛsi si, ‘Mledi onyime liɛ! Ɔŋazinete ni ɔdaŋwɛmu onu u. Ɔnɔ gi onu babɔgyɔ ba ni “banɔ zimizi ba ba ɔʋia!” ’
42007035	Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛzi Aya yɛ Kuboeteo e, ba bizɛbasɛ si Aya kuboeteo kɔ kunu kuboeteo.”
42007036	Liba lɛ mɛ si farisiɔnɛ ɔtɔ axwa Yesu si ɔga aŋa bidɔ ni yɛ. Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ lɛ eple ze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su si yiŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
42007037	Ni ɔma nɔ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi eze ɔwawadze e, enu si Yesu eze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ní farisiɔnɛ yɛ kepea mɛ, lɛ akɔ kumu flafla alabasta keʋe tiele,
42007038	lɛ atrɛ ɛ xe ɔzɛ ɔlɛ ní Yesu kedea ní yɛ kuklikpɔ onu i. Niklɔ ekpese kubeo kubemi balɛ yɛ kuklikpɔɔ aʋa a. xe ɛkɔ yɛ siya sɛ etsoli kubeo ní yɛ kuklikpɔ ɛ. Lɛ amu kɔ ɛ, xe akɔ kumu flaflaa abali kɔ aʋa ɛ.
42007039	Gi farisiɔnɛ amɔ nite e, egyo le edi ni yɛ isu ya mɛ si, “Atɛsi oboedoplɛ onyime liɛ ɔnyanu i, nya aatè ɔniliɛ elu gi ɔdzɛliɛ onu u xe ɛɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ; lɛ aatè ligbã nyaninyanii lɛ gi ɔdzɛliɛ ɔlɛ ɛ.”
42007040	Lɛ Yesu apani aki yɛ si, “Simon, mapɛ si misi wɔ liboetɔ!” Simon adimɛ aki yɛ si, “Yoo, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mɛɛta wɔ kutu.”
42007041	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Benyime tiaʋa batɔ bɛdɔ kibɔ liʋɛ ní ɔbɔda ɔtɔ su. Tole adɔ kibɔ pititi alafa tietsu liʋɛ, lɛ ɔʋla yɛ fɛ yɛ liʋɛ nɛ linu kibɔ pititi avitetsu i.
42007042	Agi bamɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tani yɛ liʋɛ nɛ kutsa onu i, ɔbɔdaɛ akɔ ba aʋɛ na akyɛ ba a. Baʋɛnete tiaʋa ya ɛ, ba mɛ owoli wogyodi si asa ɔbɔdaɛ kudimɛ nɔ ɔ?”
42007043	Simon ebu le onu si? “Megyo edi si ba mɛ iliɛ gi yɛ liʋɛ nɛ lisa keme e, xe bɛkɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ ɛ.” Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Nite ɖii lilɛ ɛ!”
42007044	Lɛ ekyi aŋu na mɛ akpɛ ɔdzɛɛ, lɛ eʋi Simon si, “Dani wɔɛmɔ ɔdzɛ liɛ ɛ? Agi meti eku wɔ kepea mɛ ɛ, wɔ́ki mɛ kuni si miplo mɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ ɛ, eplo mɛ kuklikpɔɔ ni yɛ kubeo, lɛ etsoli ko ni yɛ siya sɛ ɛ.
42007045	Lɛ wɔ́kpɛ mɛ wolaa a. Pɔ̀, dɔni lipoe lɛ gi maba kɔna ni abla ɛ, ɔ́mɔni mɛ kuklikpɔɔ kumu u.
42007046	Ableke gi maba ɛ, wɔ́sra kumu kí mɛ litukpo le e. Pɔ̀ yɛ xunyɔ ɛ, abali kumu flafla ní mɛ kuklikpɔɔ.
42007047	Lɛ loso mɛɛsi wɔ si kulɔlɔ glegle kɔklɔ gi abasɛ ɛ, kwibu ibasɛ si bɛkɔ yɛ eboe zimizi glegle la ɛkyɛ yɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔnɔ kakaa elu gi bɛkɔ sisami ɛkyɛ ɛ, yɛ kudimɛnɔɔ kyɛ kuzeeze sisami.”
42007048	Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ!”
42007049	Ɔkplɔ nɔ su bezeze gɔgɔ ba beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ liɛ, gi yɛ kɔ ɔ izɛkɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ ɛ?”
42007050	Pɔ̀ lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Wɔ kuziŋaa kwibu wo o. Sɛ̀trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ ɛ!”
42008001	Lipoetɔ kede e, Yesu aklani ima ni kumami yɔ mɛ gi azaapani Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa su Liboe Gbã nɛ aklanɔ ɛ. Badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba beze ni yɛ kude.
42008002	Badzɛ batɔ mɛ gi Yesu akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono o, xe ayɔni ba ní ba bànya ba mɛ fɛ beze ni ba kude e. Ba mɛ ɔtɔ eze Maria gi bizɛxwa fɛ si Magdalene e, gi yɛ mɛ Yesu akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele le dono e.
42008003	Odzedze eze Yohana gi yenye eze Kuza: lɛ Kuza ɛ eze Herodes yɛ kekusipea mɛ ɔka ɔtɔ ɔ. Odzedze ɔtɔ fɛ eze Susana. Ni ba ya kede e, badzɛ dzedze glegle fɛ beze ni Yesu kude, gi bɛkɔ ba tutɔ iwla mɛ bidɔ ɛkɔ ɛpɔni Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba a.
42008004	Banima bɛzɛɛdɔ ima ede ede me eba Yesu klɔ, lɛ lipoe lɛ gi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lixogo e, Yesu ebu abee aki ba si,
42008005	“Liba lɛ mɛ si onyime ɔtɔ atrɛ ní amu oglu kɔ. Gi azɛɛkpɛ amu na ní kayaa mɛ ɛ, atɔ ɛwɔli ɛdɔ ní kudeo me. Banima bɛga ní la aʋa, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwita la ɛmlɔ ɛ.
42008006	Atɔ ɛwɔli ɛdɔ kese kpakpla aʋa. Ɛyɛ, pɔ̀ gi sise se sísrɛ ki la loso e, amɔ kuni, lɛ loso ɛyurɔ ɔ lɛ etse e.
42008007	Amubi la atɔ fɛ ewɔli iku bibu ʋe me. Agi ɛyɛ ɛ, xe la ni bibu ʋe bizeetsi kpɛ likpɔ ɛ, bibu ʋe biwà ɛda la aʋa.
42008008	Lɛ atɔ fɛ ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa a; niteme si la kɔ etsi, lɛ likáka liyo amubi alafa a.” Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ abee si, “Xe batu bali ní mlɔ awla ɛ, tɔ mlenu!”
42008009	Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi abee liɛ gi ebu ese e.
42008010	Lɛ ebu le onu aki ba si i, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su eboe kpokpo la su kuboeteo e, bɛkɔ kɔ ɛki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ ki banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, mizɛpani ní abee ʋa mɛ, “ ‘tɔ xegi bedi fɛ ɛ, bátramɔ ɔ; lɛ xegi bɛta kutu fɛ ɛ, bátranu liboeboe ese e.’
42008011	“Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, abee yɛ ese onu si: amubi la enu Aya yɛ liboe le.
42008012	Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli ɛdɔ ní kudeo me e, la enu banɔ baklɔ gi bizenu liboe le e, pɔ̀ kɔ́ Ozimizi ye aba ekple liboe le ebu ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ. Niteme si bátrazɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a xe biamɔ kubúbú u.
42008013	Amubi ala la klɔ gi edɔ ní kese kpakpla aʋa ɛ, la enu banɔ baklɔ gi bizeenu liboe le e gi bizɛzɛ lɛ ni isami fɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ liboe le liʋita igu u. Lipoe kpekpemi itɔ ko bizɛzɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa. Pɔ̀ xegi baxixa ʋa bɛba ko e, kɔ bɛɛdzi kede e.
42008014	Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli eku bibu ʋe me e, alɛ aki banama gi bizenu liboe le e. Pɔ̀ ligbã nɛ mɛ kusuŋwasiɔ, exo la ni ligbã́ŋaŋa nɛ, bikpɛ likpɔ kɔ bimi liboe le kpɛ ba mɛ, gi líʋibu libi tɔ́tɔ liwewe e.
42008015	Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli ɛdɔ kese gbã aʋa ɛ, la alɛ aki banɔ baklɔ gi xe benu liboe le e, bizevu lɛ ɔzɔ mɛ ni kutununu ɔna gbã a. Nite si bizɛkpɛ ikũ nɛ ní liboe le kɔkpɛ nì lipoe lɛ klɔ gi liabu libi i.
42008016	“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋisu kani i, xe izɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ agba yɛ ese e loo kpo ye ní abati ese. Boŋu i, bizɛkɔ yɛ trɔ ní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa tɔ okle ki banama gi beetiku kepea mɛ ɛ.
42008017	“Lɛ kidɔ kakaa liɛ gi bekpo e, kiaŋwi. Lɛ kidiliɛ aʋa gi bewe bidɔ ɛ, biamɔ kɛ kɔ bebu ke basɛ ní oŋwe no e.
42008018	“Lɛ loso e, mledi mumɔ tɔ mlevu aŋu ní kiliɛ gi mleenu eboe la ese e su. Lɛ ese linu si, ɔniliɛ awla gi bidɔ bilɛ ɛ, biaki yɛ bidɔ pɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, kidiliɛ gi egyoedi si kilɛ ní yɛ awla kyɛ ɛ, biazɛ kɛ yɛ awla.”
42008019	Yesu yene ni yɛ beneminyime ba bɛba si bɛɛmɔ Yesu. Pɔ̀ bátani yɛ kuti pɔnɔ ɔ, linɔkpi le kisrɛsrɛ loso.
42008020	Ɔnutɔ asi Yesu si, “Wone nì wɔ beneminyime ba balɛɛ ní oŋwe no gi bɛpɛ si bɛmɔ wɔ ɔ.”
42008021	Yesu asi banima petee si, “Mone ni mɛ beneminyime ba ɛ, ba benu banama gi bizenu Aya yɛ Liboe le e, xe bizɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa a.”
42008022	Liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bemu iku ní katapokpa atɔ mɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutsa limu ne tɔ kutrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ aʋa.” Lɛ beku kudeo me e.
42008023	Agi beze kuni yo aʋa ɛ, Yesu adɔ sra. Kyɔŋ ko, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu ní limu ne aʋa gi liki si kuni yo kwiyaʋi iku katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Nite si ba petee ba agbã́ na, eku kuxixa mɛ.
42008024	Lɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛhwani Yesu u, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, Ɔkaɛ, kuhanyrɔ ɔ!” Yesu ayɔ, lɛ aki liwɔ lɛ ni kuni nyra nyra ɔsã ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, liwɔ lɛ limɔni kufu, lɛ kuni yo kwidɔ zii gi niklɔ ɛgɔ kranaa a.
42008025	Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Nifɔ mlɔ kuziŋaa kulɛ ɛ?” Pɔ̀ liboe le litu ba kugyɔ ɔ, lɛ lifu liku ba a. Lɛ beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ? gi Yɛ kɔ izɛki liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo ɔsã xe bizenu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ!”
42008026	Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛga limu ne aʋa lɛ bɛzeedo ni Garaseanɛ ma kesea aʋa ɛ. Garaseanɛ ma kesea kebu aŋu mɛ ɛkpɛ Galilea kanìa ní limu ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ.
42008027	Kiliɛ gi Yesu eple ní katapokpaa mɛ ko e, onyime ɔtɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ize e, ádɔ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ aba atsani yɛ ɛ. Onyimee eze liya lipoe gblamadza lɛ óze kepe me fɛ ɛ. Ikpodrɔ lɛ me ize yɛ ozeklɔ.
42008028	Gi amɔ Yesu i, akpɛ ozi gaglaa, lɛ adɔ ní Yesu ketu ya ɛ. Lɛ apani ni ozi si, “Wɔ Yesu, Ɔka Ʋidi ye Yebi ye! Liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní mɛ su u? Maki wɔ litukpo wukihe kutu iiki mɛ ɛ!”
42008029	Apani nite lɛ ese linu si, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no si “do ní yɛ mɛ.” Epoe glegle e, xe ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛdɔ ní yɛ aʋa a, xe bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ, ikli ni iwla a, xe beepe ye fɛ ɛ, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no izɛki si onyimee izɛpa bala ʋa kɔ ɛkpikpini yɛ ɛtsisi ɔyaya klɔ ɛ.
42008030	Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bizɛxwa wɔ ɔ?” Onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, Mɛ linyi si “Likpi.” Lɛ ese linu si ifuɛfuɛ zimizi glegle ize ní yɛ mɛ.
42008031	Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ikí Yesu litukpo si ɔki kpikpini nɛ zɛɛkpɛ ní lizokpo gluglui lɛ gi odukɔ ɔma ɔki lɛ ɛ mɛ.
42008032	Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, iha likpɔkpɛkpɛ ʋidi itɔ lizɛɛŋa bidɔ ní ketokpaa su ní niklɔ. Lɛ loso ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne iiki Yesu litukpo, si ɔki tɔ izetiku ní iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu aki lɛ kudeo onu i.
42008033	Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido ní onyimee me lɛ izetiku ní iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Nite si iha lɛ likpi le petee liseeple ketokpaa lɛ izɛdɔ limu ne, iŋwɛ kuni yo xe itse e.
42008034	Baxwɛwaa ba gi bezeedi iha lɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛmɔ liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ; nite si bese etrɛ lɛ bezehle liboe le kpɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ni inyrɔɔ nɛ aʋa a.
42008035	Lɛ banima bedoetrɛ si bezeedi liboe lɛ liba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido e, gi odi ní Yesu ikli lɛ onu u; akpɛ awu, lɛ yɛ begyodi ʋa bɛflɔ ɔ, lɛ lifu liku ba a.
42008036	Banama gi bɛmɔ liboe le kibabaɛ mɛ ɛ, bɛsi banɔ dzedze ba kiliɛ gi Yesu ayɔni onyime liɛ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e.
42008037	Lɛ Gerasese banɛ ma petee bɛsi Yesu si, ɔsɛ ní ba kesea mɛ lɛ ese linu si lifu liku ba nyani nyani. Lɛ loso e, Yesu emu eku katapokpaa mɛ lɛ asɛ ɛ.
42008038	Onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido e, aki Yesu litukpo si, “Ki tɔ mize ni wɔ kude.” Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ yɛ kude si,
42008039	“Dzi trɛ ní kepea mɛ tɔ zɛɛsi banima kidiliɛ gi Aya abitɛ akí wɔ ɛ.” Niteme si onyimee atrɛ lɛ azɛɛpani aklanɔ ɔma nɔ mɛ kidiliɛ gi Yesu abitɛ aki yɛ ɛ.
42008040	Gi Yesu edzì atrɛ ní limù ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ ɛ, banima bɛkpɛ yɛ wolaa, lɛ ese linu si banima petee bezeepe ye.
42008041	Lɛ onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛɛxwa si Yairo aba a, eze ɔka ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ. Adɔ ní Yesu yɛ ketu ya, lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si ɔba yɛ Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ
42008042	lɛ ese linu si yɛ obidzɛ tolee gi aŋa agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa ihatse e. Agi Yesu eze kudeo me e, linɔkpi le lizɛpɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ní kupɛɔ petee.
42008043	Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi ika izedo ní yɛ su agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa nyɔŋ ɛ, eze ní linɔkpi le kusi. Pɔ̀ ɔdzɛ liɛ ɛ, ezizi yɛ kibɔɛ petee ní bawabitɛ ba su, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani yɛ kuyɔnɔ ɔ.
42008044	Etutru isu ya akpɛ linɔkpi le kusi gani Yesu kedea, lɛ agbɔni yɛ liwu le kutu yɔ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, yɛ ika lɛ kudodoo kwitsa!
42008045	Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ agbɔni mɛ ɛ?” Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́dimɛ si yɛ ɛ. Niklɔ Petro asi yɛ si, “Ɔka, banima petee bɛpɔ wɔ ɛkpɛ”,
42008046	Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si, “Ɔnutɔ agbɔni mɛ lɛ ese linu si mete si kigagla kido ní mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ.”
42008047	Ɔdzɛɛ amɔ si kibitɛ kima tɔ ɔ; nite si ekpese kusugu, lɛ adɔ Yesu ní ketu ya ɛ. Lɛ ní banima petee aŋu na mɛ ɛ, asi yɛ kidiliɛ gi kɛ loso yɛ agbɔni yɛ nì kiliɛ gi kunyaa kwiyurɔ yɛ kyɔŋ ɛ.
42008048	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔni wɔ. Ga trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ!”
42008049	Gi Yesu azaapani i, ɔnɔ kpɛkpɛ ádɔ ní Yairo kepea mɛ aba si Yairo ɔtsaklɔ ɔkaɛ si, “Wɔ obidzɛɛ etse,” lɛ loso e, “wukúkpɛ Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kunugu tɔ ɔ.”
42008050	Pɔ̀ Yesu enu liboe le, lɛ asi Yairo si, “Wukíse lifu u; wɔ kɔ zi lɛ aʋa ŋa ko. Wobi ye aayɔ!”
42008051	Gi Yesu eku Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ, ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ kude onu si oti oku sani Petro, Yohanes ni Yakobo kɔpɔni obika yɛ ni obinee e.
42008052	Ɔnɔ kakaa eze ni asigaga mɛ lɛ bezeebemi ɔnuvɔɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakíbemi i! Ɔnuvɔɛ ótse e; sra ko ɛɛdɔ!”
42008053	Ba petee bɛmwɛ yɛ, lɛ ese linu si bete si ɔdzɛʋi yɛ etse.
42008054	Pɔ̀ Yesu evu ɔdzɛʋi yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obi ye, yɔ!”
42008055	Yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ edzì iku yɛ mɛ, nite si ayɔ ɔlɛɛ kyɔŋ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, bapɛ́ kiditɔ aki ɔdzɛʋi yɛ tɔ ɔŋa a.
42008056	Obidzɛʋi yɛ yɛka ni yene ba inugu itse. Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.
42009001	Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba akpɛ likpɔ. Lɛ aki ba kigagla ni kudeonu si tɔ biakɔ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne petee kudono atɔ biayɔ ni banyanya ba.
42009002	Lɛ akpɛ ba si bapani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa liboe le tɔ baki tɔ banyanya ba bayɔ.
42009003	Asi ba si, “Mlakíkɔ kididɔ evu aki mlɔ kudegaga a: mlakívu osevugavuga, kepimi loo kiŋaŋa, kibɔ loo liwu ʋla a.
42009004	Xegi bɛzi mlɔ ní kepe atɔ mɛ ɛ, mleze ni iklɔ kɔkpɛni mlɔ lisɛpoe le ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ.
42009005	Pɔ̀ niklɔ gi bázɛ mlɔ ɛ; mlasɛ ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ. Pɔ̀ xe mlasɛ ɛ, mlekple ovugbo lo ní mlɔ ikli lɛ aplɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ŋwisi kiseʋidudu ní ba su kinɛ ɛ.”
42009006	Badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ lɛ bɛzɛɛklani kumami yɔ petee me e, gi bɛzɛpani Liboe Gbã nɛ, xe bɛyɔni banyanya ba ní ɔkɔ kakaa ɛ.
42009007	Gi Herodes gi azɛɛŋa Galilea kesea aʋa a, enu eboa la petee gi Yesu azaabitɛ ɛ, apisa. Lɛ ese linu si banɔ batɔ bɛpani si, Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ edzì ligbã.
42009008	Banɔatɔ kyɛ si Eliya aba edo; lɛ banɔ dzedze kyɛ si kana mɛ beboedoplɛ ba mɛ tole edzì ligbã a.
42009009	Pɔ̀ lɛ Herodes apani si yɛ aki bɛtsa Yohanes yɛ litukpo le ní yɛ onu u, lɛ eʋi isu ya si, “Kɔ onyime woli iliɛ gi yɛ su meenu eboa la ya ɛ?” Lɛ loso azeekeni edi si yimɔ Yesu u.
42009010	Gi Yesu yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bedzi idɔni kudeo me e, bɛba ɛki yɛ kunutsatsa ní eboa la petee gi bɛzɛɛbitɛ su u. Lɛ agbani ba evu lɛ bedoetrɛ ní ɔma ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Bɛtsaida mɛ ɛ.
42009011	Agi linɔkpi le linu niklɔ gi bɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛgbani yɛ ɛkpɛ. Azɛ ba lɛ apani aki ba ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su u, lɛ banama gi bɛziã kupɔnɔ ní ba bànya ʋa mɛ ɛ, ayɔni ba a.
42009012	Agi liwo le lizeeku i, badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bɛba ɛsi yɛ si, “Ki tɔ banima basɛ tɔ beti iku kumami yɔ ni inyrɔ nɛ me tɔ bazɛpɛ kiŋaŋa ni iyakɔ; lɛ ese linu si niya ebu lidze.”
42009013	Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ mlaki ba kiditɔ tɔ baŋa a.” Bebu lɛ onu ɛki yɛ si, “Aklã tetsu ni akpa taʋa ko alɛ blɔ awla a. Wɔpɛ si kuzeedzi kiŋaŋaɛ aki linɔkpi ʋidi ilɛ ya lo o?”
42009014	Banama gi beze ni klɔ ɛ, biana benyime akpe tietsu. Pɔ̀ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banima beze kesea ni ahakpɔ mɛ, banɔ ŋwisi avitetsu avitetsu.”
42009015	Gi badɔkpasi ba bɛki si banima beze kesea ɛ,
42009016	Yesu akɔ àklã tetsu la ni akpa taʋa la evu. Edi lifunu ne hãa, lɛ edo Aya ɖase ní la aʋa a, xe ayaʋi la ɛ. Lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ alɛ aki banima ɛ.
42009017	Ba petee bɛŋa, beke, lɛ biŋaŋa gɔgɔ ʋɛ ɛ, biyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa.
42009018	Liwetɔ lɛ gi Yesu tole azɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní yɛ su. Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ anɔkpi la izɛpani si menu u?”
42009019	Badɔkpasi ba bebu lɛ onu si, “Banɔ batɔ bizedo si wɔ́ wonu Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ, banɔ batɔ kyɛ si wɔ́ wonu Eliya, lɛ bedzedze ba ba kugyodi yo kunu si Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ koko ba ɛ, bamɛ tole wonu gi edzì ligbã a.”
42009020	Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ xwɛ, nyaŋwɛ mlɛ si sì yɛ menu u?” Petro ebu le onu si, “Wɔ́ wonu Aya yɛ Kristo ye.”
42009021	Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakífeke onugu ní eboa la aʋa asi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.
42009022	Apani asi ba kyɛ si, “Lilɛ si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye, ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle; banɔtsitsi ba, kusumu yo baka ba, ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biakyi kede kpɛ yɛ. Lɛ biaye ye e; pɔ̀ ní ewe tata kede e, ayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
42009023	Lɛ asi ba petee si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapɛ si yize ni mɛ kude e, liaziã si odze isu liboe, tɔ otu yɛ osetsase lo liwe kakaa tɔ oze ni mɛ kude.
42009024	Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aakɔ̀ yɛ ligbã nɛ kukɔkyɛ ní mɛ litukpo e, aabu yɛ ligbã nɛ.
42009025	Libi woli lilɛ ki ɔnutɔ xe aamɔ kelea mɛ bidɔ mɛ petee e pɔ̀ xe aalila yɛ esobo la a?
42009026	Xegi ɔnutɔ aase kuye ní mɛ nì mɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su i, kɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye fɛ aase kuye ní yɛ su xegi aba ní yɛ tutɔ yɛ kusudraa, nì Yeka ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba petee ba kusudraa mɛ ɛ.
42009027	Lɛ mɛɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, banama gi bali niya ɛ, ba mɛ batɔ bátratse sani si bɛmɔ Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa xe e.”
42009028	Ŋwisi ewe ɔgɔtaʋa kede gi apani eboa la klɔ ɛ, Yesu agbani Petro, Yohanes ni Yakobo, lɛ bɛtrɛ ní ketokpa katɔ aʋa si tɔ bɛzɛxwa Aya a.
42009029	Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, yɛ aŋu na mɛ kiŋwiŋwi yɛ mɛ kikyi, yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bixwa pititi lɛ bize ŋle e.
42009030	Banɔ tiaʋa, Mose ni Eliya,
42009031	bɛŋwi ní lifunu ne kusudraa mɛ; gi bɛzɛpani ni Yesu ní kiliɛ mɛ gi litraze xe aatse ní Yerusalem ní Aya kutrɔtrɔ onu su u.
42009032	Petro ni yɛ ahanuglɔ ba bɛzɛ ní sra mɛ, pɔ̀ gi ba aŋu mɛ ɛdra ɛ, bɛmɔ Yesu yɛ kusudraa ni banɔ tiaʋa ba gi balɛɛ ni Yesu i.
42009033	Gi benyime ba bɛzɛsɛ̀ ní Yesu su i, Petro asi Yesu si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, lipɛ koŋ si kulɛ ní ya! Ki tɔ kuwa akatsa tata; wɔ linɛ tile, Mose linɛ tile ni Eliya linɛ tile.” (Liboe lɛ gi azɛɛpani i, yɛ ɔtutɔ óte le e.)
42009034	Gi azaapani i, liplɛ ɛtɔ liŋwi lɛ liba ewe ba a; lɛ gi beti iku liplɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ, lifu liku badɔkpasi ba.
42009035	Ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔnɔ ní liplɛ lɛ mɛ si, “Mɛ Obi ye iliɛ ya, yɛ makya! Mlata yɛ kutu!”
42009036	Gi ole lo ɛpani tsa ɛ, bɛmɔ si Yesu tètè ko agɔ. Badɔkpasi ba béfeke onugu ní eboa la aŋu mɛ gi bɛmɔ su i si ɔnɔnɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ.
42009037	Keletitia mɛ gi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beple edɔni ketokpaa aʋa ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liba ɛtsani yɛ.
42009038	Lɛ onyime ɔtɔ ní linɔkpi le me akpɛ ozi si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Maki wɔ litukpo, di mɛ obinyimee, lɛ ese linu si yɛ ko onu mɛ obi tolee!
42009039	Ɔfuɛfuɛ ɔtɔ izɛdɔ yɛ aʋa gi izɛki si izɛkpɛ ozi lo, kɔ ekpese kuhe e. Nite si ɔfɔ lɔ izedo yɛ onu. Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ izɛdugu ye gi sigagla mɛ izɛyurɔ awla ní yɛ su u.
42009040	Maki wɔ badɔkpasi ba litukpo ní lɛ su, pɔ̀ bátani lɔ kukpikpinɔ dono o.”
42009041	Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kitɛ xe kumɔziŋa ni kesetata kalɛ mlɔ mɛ nite e?” “Kɔna ni lipoe woli maaze mlɔ su du u? Lɛ kɔna ni lipoe wolite maplɛ litɔ kese kimlɔ du u? Lɛ asi onyimee si, Gbani wɔ obi ye mani ya a!”
42009042	Agi ɔyasɔʋi lɔ etrába ɛ, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛsa yɛ kesea gi ekpese kuhe e. Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ ozi ní ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ aʋa, lɛ ayɔni ɔyasɔʋi lɔ, lɛ akɔ lɔ aki yɛka ɛ.
42009043	Liki si ɔnɔ kakaa onugu etse ní Aya kigagla ʋidi ye su. Yesu yɛ kiboebitɛ kitu banima kugyɔ lɛ asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si,
42009044	“Mlakídze liboe lɛ gi matrasi mlɔ ɛ. Bɛtrákpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ní awla ɛki banima.”
42009045	Pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bénu liboe le ese e. Bɛ kɔ lɛ ekpo ba tɔ bakítani lɛ ese kunu. Lɛ badɔkpasi ba kyɛ ɛ, bese lifu ne ní kiliɛ gi biaʋi ye liboe le ese e.
42009046	Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ kwiku badɔkpasi ba kusi ní ɔniliɛ gi yɛ asa keme ní ba kusi su u.
42009047	Agi Yesu ete ba begyodi ba onu i, agbani ɔnuvɔ ɔtɔ amanɔ lɛ aki si ɔlɛ ni yɛ su i;
42009048	lɛ asi ba si, “Ɔniliɛ gi aazi kanuvɔʋia lia ní mɛ linyi ne me e, mɛ ɔniɛ azɛ ɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi azɛ mɛ ɛ, azɛ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi yɛ onu ɔsisami yɛ petee ní mlɔ kusi i, yɛ asa keme e.”
42009049	Lɛ Yohanes apani si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, kwimɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi azɛkpikpinì ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní wɔ linyi ne me e, nite si kwisi yɛ si odzini kumɔni lɛ ese linu si aní blɔ mɛ tole onu u.”
42009050	Yesu asi yɛ nì badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba si, “Mlekítsi kudeo aki yɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́yɔ kedu ní mlɔ su i, ɔtini mlɔ aʋa.”
42009051	Agi Yesu yɛ lifunu ne kutrɛtrɛɔ lipoe le litipɔnɔ ɛ, atrɔ lɛ si yɛ atrɛ ní Yerusalem.
42009052	Niteme si atsisi baxwɛdzɛ ba ní yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ ní Samaria kamami katɔ mɛ si babla kidɔkakaa aplɛ aki yɛ.
42009053	Pɔ̀ banima ni iklɔ bázɛ yɛ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si lɛ mɛ lidra ɛki ba si Yesu atrága ba klɔ ɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem.
42009054	Agi yɛ badɔkpasi ba Yakobo ni Yohanes bɛmɔ lɛ gyesi i, beʋi si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, wɔpɛ si kuxwa kifu idɔni lifunu ne tɔ kibakani banɔ ba ya na a?”
42009055	Pɔ̀ Yesu ekyi xe aka aŋu mɛ aki ba ɛ
42009056	Nite si Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekyi itrɛ ní kamami dzedze me.
42009057	Agi bɛzɛtrɛ ní kudeo me e, onyime ɔtɔ asi Yesu si, “Ɔkɔ kakaa gi wɔatrɛ ɛ, maze ni wɔ kude.”
42009058	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wayu ʋa bɛmɔ beke ʋa, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kyɛ kwimɔ evu na. Pɔ̀ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, ɔ́mɔ ɔkɔkɔ gi aafɛ ɛ, xe aayɔ isu mɛ ɛ.”
42009059	Yesu asi ɔnɔ dzedze si, “Zenì mɛ kude!” Pɔ̀ onyimee asi yɛ si, “Ɔka kitɔ mizeevive mɔka xe e.”
42009060	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ki tɔ bekpo ba bevive ba tutɔ ba bekpo ba. Wɔ kɔ trɛ tɔ zepani ni Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa su u.”
42009061	Lɛ ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, maaku ni wɔ kude; pɔ̀ ki tɔ mizɛɛklá mɛ benete ba xe e.”
42009062	Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɛwa lixwɛ xe ɔ́ʋiwa lɛ ni yɛ ɔna nɔ petee, ógyeno gi aasumu ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!”
42010001	Eboa la klɔ kede e, Ɔkaɛ ebu, badɔkpasi avi tegloele ni tiaʋa dzedze, lɛ atsisi ba tiaʋa tiaʋa kpɛ ɔtɔ ní ɔma kakaa ni ikɔɛ lɛ klɔ gi apɛ si yitrɛ ɛ mɛ.
42010002	Lɛ asi ba si, “Amu na lipapoe le lina pɔ̀ la bapapa ba básrɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso mleʋi tɔ ɔnyrɔɔ nɔ onetee ɔtsisi baxwɛwa ba ní yɛ kayaa mɛ tɔ bapa la.
42010003	Mlatrɛ! Mɛɛkpɛ mlɔ ŋwisi kuʋesibi kinɛ ní kuŋwafudroʋi yo kusi i.
42010004	Xe mlɛɛtrɛ ɛ, mlakívu kepimi loo ɔdɔʋi gudo loo afɔkpa lide ʋla, Mlakílɛɛ apani ɔnɔnɔ ní kudeo aʋa a.
42010005	“Xe mleti iku kepe katɔ mɛ ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, mlapani si, “Kusuyɔ kuze ní kepea lia aʋa a!”
42010006	Xegi kusuyɔ onete ɔlɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, mlɔ kusuyɔɔ kwiaze ní yɛ aʋa. Xe aní te pɔ̀ ɛ, mlɔ kusuyɔɔ kwiadzi kuba mlɔ klɔ.
42010007	Mlatí ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ. Mlaŋa bidɔ tɔ mlaŋwɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bɛki mlɔ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si ɔxwɛwa yɛ yɛ bizɛɛtsa liʋɛ ɛkɔ ɔ. Mlakítsrɛ kupeo o.
42010008	Xegi mleti iku ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bɛkpɛ mlɔ wolaa ɛ, mlaŋa kidiliɛ gi bɛki mlɔ ɛ.
42010009	“Mlayɔ ni banyanya ba ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ, tɔ mlasi banima ní klɔ si, ‘Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔni mlɔ.’
42010010	Pɔ niklɔ gi mlɛtrɛ ɛ, xe bázɛ mlɔ ɛ, mledo ní lɔ ablɔ ʋa aʋa tɔ mlapani si,
42010011	‘Mlɔ ɔma nɔ mɛ ovugbo ɔlɔ klɔ gi evu blɔ kuklikpɔ kyɛ ɛ, kwisugu lo ɛplɛ ki mlɔ ŋwisi kiseʋi dúdu ní mlɔ su kinɛ ɛ, Pɔ̀ mlaplɛ aŋu si, Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa, ketipɔni mlɔ ɔ.’
42010012	Matrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si, Aya aadi Sodom asigaga sani ɔma lɔ klɔ ní Litsixwawe le aʋa.
42010013	“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Korazinanɛ ma; litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Bɛtsaidanɛ ma kyɛ ní Litsixwawe le aʋa. Atɛsi enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ ní mlɔ kusi i, xe Tiro ni Sidon ima nɛ mɛ bɛbitɛ la ɛ, nya niklɔ banɛ ma benyime akpanya, xe bɛdzà kusuʋɔtɔ tɔ libasɛ si bekyi ba ina nɛ mɛ ní ba eboe zimizi na su u.
42010014	Ni Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Aya aadi Tiro ni Sidon asigaga sani mlɔ.
42010015	Lɛ wɔ Kapernaum ɔma nɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, kitɛ wɔpɛ si wumuni isu ya lifune e? Lizokpo gluglui lɛ gi odukɔ ɔma kilɛ ɛ, lɛ mɛ bɛtráŋwia wɔ ɛkpɛ ɛ.
42010016	“Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ɔniliɛ gi azɛ mlɔ liboe le e, mɛ liboe le azɛ; nite ke ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ mlɔ ɛ, mɛ ɔ́zɛ ɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ mɛ ɛ, Ɔkaɛ gi akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔ́zɛ ɛ.”
42010017	Badɔkpasi avi tegloele ni tiaʋa ba bedzi dɔni kudeo me ni isami glegle. Lɛ bɛki kunutsatsa si, “Ɔkaɛ, agi kwidzɛ ɛ, xegi kwikpɛ isã ɛki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kura fɛ ní wɔ linyi ne me e, izenu kutu iiki blɔ.”
42010018	Yesu asi ba si, “Mamɔ Satana gi awɔli adɔ nɔ lifunu ne ŋwisi dzeni kifububu kinɛ ɛ.
42010019	Mlata kutu! Maki mlɔ kigagla si tɔ mlaatani kuga ní bagblaga ʋa ni kutapiadzɔɔ aʋa, lɛ mlaaŋa Ozimizi ye kigaglaɛ petee aʋa gi kididɔ kítrasa mlɔ ɔ.
42010020	Pɔ̀ isami ikíku mlo tete si ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne inu kutu iiki mlɔ ɔ; boŋu i, isami iku mlo si bɛŋwlimi mlɔ enyi na ní lifunu ne.”
42010021	Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛki si isami iyi Yesu me. Lɛ apani si, “Mɔka, wɔ wonu lifunu ne ni kesea Ɔkaɛ! Medo wɔ ɖase si wɔkɔ eboa la okpo beboete ba ni beplekpate ba, pɔ̀ woble la ɔbasɛ krutu ba. Ee, Ɔka, nite wɔ pɛ si lize.
42010022	“Mɔka akɔ bidɔ mɛ petee akpɛ mɛ awla. Ɔnɔnɔ óte ɔniliɛ gi Obi ye onu u sani Ɔkaɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ óte ɔniliɛ gi Ɔkaɛ onu u sani Obi ye ni banama gi beku Obi ye liŋu si yibu Ɔkaɛ basɛ ɛ.
42010023	“Lɛ Yesu ekyi edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba xe asi ba tètè dzaa si, “Kunya kulɛ mlɔ su koŋ gi mlɛmɔ eboa la aŋu mɛ ɛ.
42010024	Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, eboa la gi mlɛɛmɔ ɛ, beboedoplɛ glegle ni bekusi ba bɛpɛ la aŋu mɛ si bɛɛmɔ pɔ̀ líba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ bɛpɛ si beenu eboa la gi mleenu i, pɔ̀ bénu u.”
42010025	Liba lɛ mɛ si ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ɔtɔ aba Yesu klɔ gi apɛ si yipunu yɛ evu u. Lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ,” “ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e?”
42010026	Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Mose ɔsã nɔ mɛ ɛ? Kitɛ wonu le ese e?”
42010027	Lɛ onyimee ebu le onu si, “Dimɛni Ɔkaɛ gi yɛ onu wɔ Aya ɛ, nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee, nì wɔ esobo la petee, nì wɔ kigaglaɛ petee ani wɔ kugyodi yo petee. Lɛ dimɛni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.”
42010028	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wobu le onu mumɔ, Trɛ tɔ zɛbitɛ kiliɛ gi wɔpani i, tɔ wɔaze ligbã́.”
42010029	Pɔ̀ ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ apɛ si yɛ linɛ ligyɔ ɔ; lɛ loso eʋi Yesu dzɛ si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu mɛ ɔhanuglɔɛ ɛ?”
42010030	Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Liba lɛ mɛ liwetɔ lɛ si, onyime ɔtɔ ádɔ Yerusalem gi azeeple atrɛ ní Yerixo e. Beze batɔ bɛdɔ yɛ aʋa, bɛzi yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee ní yɛ awla, bekusi ye lɛ bebu ye liya lɛ ɛ. Niteme si bɛyurɔ yɛ ɛplɛ gi etse okpokpo lo e.
42010031	Liba lɛ mɛ si kusɔli yɔ ɔka ɔtɔ azɛɛga kudeo liɔ klɔ ke, pɔ̀ gi amɔ onyimee gi bekusi i, aga kedepɛ ʋla aza a.
42010032	Nite ke Lewiɔnɛ ɔtɔ kyɛ gi aba na níklɔ ɔ xe edi onyime e, yɛ kyɛ aga kedepɛ ʋlaa aza yɛ aʋa.
42010033	Pɔ̀ Samaria ɔnɛ ɔtɔ gi yɛ kyɛ azɛɛga kudeo liɔ klɔ ɛ, aklani onyime onu. Gi amɔ yɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔna ekyi vu onyimee.
42010034	Eti apɔni yɛ su, lɛ abali wain ni kumu akpɛ ní yɛ ebi la mɛ ɛ, lɛ anya na ɛ. Lɛ efeke ye atrɔ ní yɛ tedzi ye aʋa a, xe akɔ yɛ atsinɔ ní bedega ba ɔyakɔ ɔtɔ ɔ, xe edi yɛ aʋa ɛ.
42010035	Keletitia mɛ ɛ, ebu bibɔ pititi tuʋa akɔ aki kepea ɔʋadi ye. Lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Di yɛ aʋa, tɔ kidɔ kakaa elu gi wɔazizi pɔnɔ ní yɛ litukpo e, maatsa kɛ ɔki wɔ xe medzi aba ɛ.’
42010036	“Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ liboe le ni kuʋiʋi si, “Ni wɔ kugyodi yo onu i, ni banɔ tiata ba ya mɛ ɛ, owoli onu ɔhanuglɔ ɔki odega liɛ gi awɔli eku ní beze ba iwla mɛ ɛ?”
42010037	Lɛ ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ ebu le onu si, “ɔniliɛ gi edi yɛ asigaga ɛ.” Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wɔ kyɛ trɛ, tɔ zɛbitɛ nite ke e.”
42010038	Gi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní ba kudeo aʋa ɛ, beku kamamiatɔ mɛ gi ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Marta eze e. Yɛ si azɛ Yesu akpɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ.
42010039	Yɛ onemidzɛ ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Maria ɛ, eze ní Yesu yɛ ikli lɛ onu gi azeenu yɛ kudɔbasɛ yɔ ɛ.
42010040	Pɔ̀ kaʋadi ya axwɛ na emi ní Marta tole aʋa a. Nite si Marta aba Yesu klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔka wɔ́kɔ lɛ me si monemi ye ayurɔ axwɛ na petee atrɔ ni mɛ tole aʋa a? Si yɛ tɔ ɔbapɔni mɛ.”
42010041	Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Marta, Marta wɔepè lɛ wɔxixa ní eboe glegle su u.
42010042	Pɔ̀ kidɔ tile ko kizia. Maria kɔ akya kidɔ gbã ɛ gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trazi kɛ ní yɛ awla a.”
42011001	Liwetɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya ní ɔkutɔ, gi abitɛ pɔ́ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole asi yɛ si, “Ɔka basɛ blɔ kiliɛ gi kwiaxwa Aya ɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yohanes abasi yɛ baxwɛkpasi ba kinɛ ɛ.”
42011002	Yesu asi ba si, xegi mlɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlapani si, “ ‘Ɔka, Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ki wɔ linyi ne; Ki tɔ wɔ Kaʋaŋaa keple kú ní blɔ kusi,
42011003	Ki blɔ liwe kakaa lɛ kiŋaŋaɛ.
42011004	Kɔ blɔ eboe zimizi na kyɛ blɔ ɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi blɔ kyɛ ɛ, kuzɛɛkɔ ɛkyɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛta blɔ ese kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ wukígbani blɔ ɛkpɛ kufekedi me e.’”
42011005	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Xe liba lɛ mɛ si mlɔ mɛ tole atrɛ ní yɛ ɔʋia nɛ ɔtɔ kɔ elesi tetsu, lɛ asi yɛ si: ‘Ɔʋia dɔ àklã tatá ki mɛ.
42011006	Mɛ ɔʋia nɛ ɔtɔ gi aga kude e, abaya mɛ, pɔ̀ kididɔ kíma ní mɛ awla gi makɔ odu yɛ ketu ya.’
42011007	“Lɛ xegi liba lɛ mɛ si wɔ ɔʋiaɛ aabu le onu dɔni yɛ ligba lɛ mɛ si, ‘Wukíkpɛ mɛ kunugu u! Madà mɛ kevunu ya kooko, lɛ mɛ nì mɛ bebi ba kwiku ligba a. Mátratani kuyɔ xe maadi wɔ ɔza a.’
42011008	Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xegi ɔ́yɔ ɔ ní kiliɛ mɛ gi wonu yɛ ɔʋia nɛ onu kyɛ ɛ, aayɔ ní wɔ su gi aaki wɔ ɔ kidiliɛ gi kizia wɔ ɔ, kɔkpɛ wɔ kunugu uliɔ gi wɔɛkpɛ yɛ loso o.”
42011009	“Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si i, mleʋi bidɔ tɔ baki mlɔ; mlapɛ bidɔ tɔ mlamɔ; mla sa opupo lo tɔ badra lɔ aki mlɔ.
42011010	Lɛ ese linu si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeʋi bidɔ ɛ, bizɛki yɛ; lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛpɛ bidɔ ɛ, izɛmɔ; lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛsa opupo lo e, bizɛdra lɔ ɛki yɛ.
42011011	“Nyaŋwɛ ɔlɛ ní ya gi onu obika xe Yebi ye aaʋi ye likpa a xe aakɔ̀ ɔgblaga ɔki yɛ ɛ?
42011012	Loo xe eʋi ye likukɔdze e, xe aakɔ̀ katapiadze ɔki yɛ na a?
42011013	Mlɔ ŋwisi baka kinɛ gi mlɛnyani kyɛ ɛ, mlete kiliɛ gi mlaaki mlɔ bebi ba bidɔ gbã ʋɛ ɛ. Lɛ kitɛ gbɛgbɛ liaze xe mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne e, ɔ́trayurɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛki banama gi biaʋi ye na a!”
42011014	Yesu azɛ kpikpini ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi gi ɔʋípani dono ní onyime ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo pɔ́ ɛ, onyimee apani, gi litu linɔkpi le kugyɔ ɔ.
42011015	Pɔ̀ banɔ batɔ ní ba mɛ bɛpani si, “Belzebul gi yɛ onu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ɔkaɛ ɛ, yɛ aki Yesu kigaglaɛ xe ɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ ne edono o.”
42011016	Banɔ batɔ kyɛ bɛpɛ si bɛɛpunu Yesu. Lɛ loso e, beʋi idɔnɔ ní yɛ awla si, ɔbitɛ linugutseboe litɔ gi liabasɛ si Aya anya kpɛ yɛ ɛ.
42011017	Pɔ̀ gi Yesu etè ba begyodi ʋa onu i, asi ba si, “Kaʋaŋaa kakaa gi ka mɛ benete ba bɛyɔ kedu ní ba ahanuglɔ ba su i, kiayaʋi, lɛ kepe kakaa gi ka mɛ benete ba bɛyɔ kedu ní ba ahanuglɔ ba su i, kiayaʋi.
42011018	Lɛ loso e, xe Satana kaʋaŋaa kɛlɛ ní paso ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe bɛɛgɔni i, kitɛ liaze xe kiali i? Mlɛɛpani si Belzebul yɛ aki mɛ kigaglaɛ xe mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono o.
42011019	Xegi Belzebul aʋa mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono e, kɔ nyaŋwɛ yɛ kigagla mɛ mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba bizɛkpikpini lɛ edono e? Mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba ɛ, ba beebu mlɔ lipɔ si mlɔ linɛ lígyɔ ɔ!
42011020	Pɔ̀ xe Aya yɛ kigaglaɛ aʋa mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono e, libasɛ si Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛba mlɔ kusi kooko o.
42011021	“Xegi onyimewa eepe yɛ kepea ni yɛ bigutadɔ mɛ ɛ, yɛ kepea kizeze ní kusuyɔ mɛ.
42011022	Pɔ̀ xegi ɔniliɛ gi asani yɛ onu adɔ ní yɛ aʋa a, xe aŋa yɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ aahali yɛ bigutadɔ mɛ gi bɛ aʋa ɛɛwa igyi le e, kɔ alɛ yɛ exo la ni yɛ baʋianɛ ba ɛ.
42011023	Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɔ́ma mɛ aʋa ɛ, ayɔ kedu ní mɛ su. Ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́kpɛ bidɔ likpɔ ɔpɔni mɛ ɛ, kihle eehle ʋe.
42011024	“Xegi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi edo ní ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, izɛpɛ ozekɔ ɛklanɔ ní ɔyaya kɔ. Xegi ɔ́mɔ ɔkɔ gbã ɔtɔtɔ kɔ ɛ, izɛsi isu ya si, ‘Maadzi trɛ ní mɛ kepe kokoa mɛ.’
42011025	Xe edzi atrɛ ɛ, aamɔ si bɛgba kepea mɛ ɛlulɔ,
42011026	kɔ ɛzɛɛgbani ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele dzedze gi inyani sani lɔ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛmanɔ kɔ iiba kɔ iizɛ ní kepea mɛ, gɔgɔɛ ɔnɔɛ yɛ kizezee me kudegbaa kianyani sani kiliɛ gi eze tsã ɛ.”
42011027	Gi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi apani si, “Aya aakrira one liɛ gi apɔ wɔ xe aki wɔ limwa nɛ ɛ.”
42011028	Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya aakrira banama gi beenu Aya Liboe le xe bɛɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa a boŋu!”
42011029	Agi anɔkpi la ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní Yesu i, atrɛ ní yɛ kunugu yo aʋa si, “Kelea lia mɛ bebi ba ɛ, bɛnyani koŋu! Bɛɛpɛ linugutseboe si bɛɛmɔ ɔ; pɔ̀ bátramɔ litɔtɔ ɛ sani Yona yɛ linugutseboe le e.
42011030	Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yona oboedoplɛɛ eze liŋwitsɛ aki Ninive banɛ ma ɛ, nite ke Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ aaze liŋwitsɛ aki abla kelea mɛ benete ba.
42011031	Ní Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Sheba Okusidzɛɛ, aayɔ alɛɛ gi aabu kiwlaʋi kukpɛ mlɔ abla bebi ba aŋu mɛ. Lɛ ese linu si aga adɔ ní yɛ kepea ke, gi aba ata Okusi ye Salomo yɛ kuboeteo kutu u. Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ɔnutɔ gi ekeme asani Salomo ɔlɛ ní ya a.
42011032	Ní Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Ninive banɛ ma kyɛ biayɔ ɔlɛɛ, gi bíabu mlɔ omono bebi ba lípɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si bekyi ɔna mɛ gi benu Yona yɛ liboe le e. Lɛ mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ní ya gi ekeme asani Yona ɛ.
42011033	“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋísu kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ agba yɛ ese loo izekpo ye; boŋu i, izɛkɔ yɛ ɛtrɔ ní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa tɔ okle ɔki banama gi beetiku ní kepea mɛ ɛ.
42011034	Mlɔ bimbi ʋe binu kani ɔki mlɔ inɔse le. Xegi mlɔ bimbi ʋe bipɛ ɛ, kɔ mlɔ inɔse le ina ɛ. Pɔ xegi mlɔ bimbi ʋe bípɛ ɛ, kɔ mlɔ inɔse le iwɔ ní litumu ne me e.
42011035	Lɛ loso mledi le aʋa si kuklekleo kukídzi litumu ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ.
42011036	Xegi kuklekleo kwiyi mlɔ mɛ gi mlɔ inɔse le kapɛa tɔtɔ káma litumu me e, mlɔ inɔse le petee iaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi kaniɛ izeekle bali ní mlɔ aʋa kinɛ ɛ.”
42011037	Gi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, Farisiɔnɛ ɔtɔ ekpe ye si ɔga aŋa bidɔ ni yɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ. Lɛ loso Yesu atrɛ, eple eze lɛ ekpese bidɔ mɛ kuŋa ni yɛ ɛ.
42011038	Pɔ̀ litu Farisiɔnɛ kugyɔ si Yesu óplo awla xe ekpese bidɔ mɛ kuŋa a.
42011039	Lɛ Yesu asi kepea ɔkaɛ si, “Mlɔ Farisianɛ ma mlɛzeplo mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kudɔŋazi yo kɔ kedea; pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ eyi ni kuŋazi ni litukpo me gagla a.
42011040	Baga! Aní Aya gi abitɛ kedea ɛ, yɛ ke abitɛ kimɛ mɛ kyɛ na a?
42011041	Pɔ̀ kidiliɛ gi kikpasi ní mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kuzi yo me e, mlakɔ kɛ aki bepiplinete ba tɔ kidɔ kakaa su kidra ɛki mlɔ ní mlɔ egoʋi la onu.
42011042	“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ Farisianɛ ma, lɛ ese linu si mlɛzɛki Aya oni bitɔ́dɔ, ni siwa flafla, kapɛ liɔfɔa, pɔ̀ mlapɛ si mlɛxwa etsi gyɔgyɔ, lɛ mlálɔ Aya kyɛ ɛ. Mlegyeni la ya kubitɛ pɔ̀ mlatrayurɔ atɔpu na kyɛ ɛ.
42011043	“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ Farisianɛ ma, mlɛzɛɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ; lɛ mlɛzɛɛpɛ si bapani mlɔ ni kubùbù ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa.
42011044	“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ! Mla lɛ ko ŋwisi idrɔ gi bákpɛ lɛ gyesi i, xe banima bize ga lɛ aʋa ɛza ní motemote me kinɛ ɛ.”
42011045	Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba mɛ tole asi yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, xegi wɔɛɛpani eboa la ɛ, wɔekpini blɔ kyɛ.”
42011046	Yesu ebu le onu si, “Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ kyɛ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba! Mlɛtrɔ adɔtu zegbezegbe ní banima aʋa gi bátratani kutu i; pɔ̀ mlaʋíkpɛ awla si mlɛpɔni ba tɔ betu la a.
42011047	“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ! Mlɛlulɔ Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ya gi mlɔ bakatsitsi ba beye e, ba idrɔ lɛ ɛ.
42011048	Mlɔ kibitɛɛ kibasɛ si mlɛtrɔ ní mlɔ bakatsitsi ba kiboebitɛɛ aʋa a; lɛ ese linu si beye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba lɛ mlɔ pɔ̀ mlɛba ɛʋɔ ba idrɔ lɛ ɛ.
42011049	Lɛ loso e Aya ní yɛ kuboeteo me e, edo aplɛ si, ‘Maatsisi ba beboedoplɛ ba ni baxwɛdzɛ ba; biaye ba mɛ batɔ, kɔ bɛyɔ kedu ní bedzedze ba su i.’
42011050	Nite si Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba klɔ petee gi beye e, dɔnɔ ní kelea likpese le gakɔna ni abla ɛ, mlɔ abla bebi ba ɛ, biaʋi ba kuwle dɔni mlɔ awla.
42011051	Kuwleo ki banama gi beye e dɔnɔ ní Abel aʋa gakɔna ni Zakaria gi yɛ beye ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ni lisumugba lɛ kusi yo e. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, biahe kutu ki mlɔ abla kelea bebi ba ní kunɔyeo liɔ klɔ petee litukpo!
42011052	“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba! Mletso safi ye ebu ní kuboeteo ligba lɛ opupo lo onu. Mlɔ tutɔ mléʋiti ku lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ mletsi kudeo onu ɛki banama gi bɛɛpɛ si beetiku i.”
42011053	Agi Yesu asɛ níklɔ ɛ, Farisianɛ ma nì Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛyɔ kedu ní yɛ su lɛ beʋi ye beʋiʋi ní eboe glegle su ní kusuyeʋi me
42011054	lɛ ese linu si bɛpɛ si ɔpani liboe trama ɛtɔ tɔ bɛɛpunu ye evu.
42012001	Liba lɛ mɛ si banɔ akpe akpe ba bɛkpɛ likpɔ, gi beze ga ní ba ahanuglɔ ba aʋa kyɛ ɛ. Yesu agba yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní ɔtɔpu kɔ si, “Mlakpɛ lixaŋu ní Farisianɛ ma kunyasi yɔ gi kunu banɔ aŋu mɛ kiboebitɛ su u.
42012002	Kidɔ kpokpo kakaa kiaŋwi, lɛ liboe kpokpo kakaa liado oŋwe e.
42012003	Niteme si liboe kakaa gi mlapani ní litumu ne me e, bianu le ní liwo le kuklekle onu. Lɛ idali kakaa gi mlaado ní lifɛgba lɛ mɛ ɛ, biakla lɛ ní ivitɔ lɛ ɛ.
42012004	“Mɛ baʋia ba, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama gi ɔnɔse lo ko biata ni kuye e, pɔ̀ xe bátratani kididɔ kubitɛ sanɔ ɛ, mlakíse ba.
42012005	Maasi mlɔ ɔniliɛ gi lilɛ si mlese e. Mlese Aya gi xegi eye ɔnɔ pɔ́ ɛ, kigagla kilɛ yɛ awla gi aatani yɛ kukpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e. Mlazi mɛ aʋa aŋa yɛ lilɛ si mlese e!
42012006	Aní pɛsɛwa tiaʋa ko bizɛda ayikpakpa tietsu i? Pɔ̀ Aya óʋidze ayikpakpa klɔ ʋa mɛ ni tole e!
42012007	Mlɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, mlɔ litukpo le siya sɛ kura kyɛ ɛ, bɛkla sɛ petee. Lɛ loso lifu likíku mlo o. Mlɛŋa kedzi isanɔ ayikpakpa glegle.
42012008	“Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama gi bɛpani ní banima aŋu mɛ si mɛ benu mɛ banɛ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ aapani ní Aya baxwɛdzɛ ba aŋu mɛ si, yɛ banɛ benu.
42012009	Nite ke banama gi bianada me ní banima aŋu mɛ ɛ, mɛ kyɛ maanada si mete ba ní Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba aŋu mɛ.
42012010	Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapani liboe zimizi yurɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, biakɔkyɛ yɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi biapani liboe zimizi yurɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛ, bátrakɔ kɔ ɛkyɛ ba a.
42012011	“Xegi bɛtsini mlɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ, loo kesea baʋaŋa ba aloo kesea ʋa bedidi ba aŋu mɛ, si baxwa litsi ni mlɔ ɛ, mlakípè ní kiliɛ gi mlaŋwlɛ isu, nì liboe lɛ gi mlaapani su u.
42012012	Lɛ ese linu si Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ aabasɛ mlɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ eboa la gi mlapani i.”
42012013	Onyime ɔtɔ ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, si mɛ onemi ye tɔ ɔlɛ kaŋasea gi blɔ ɔkaɛ ayurɔ aplɛ aki blɔɛ nì mɛ ɛ.”
42012014	Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Onyime, nyaŋwɛ edu me otsixwa loo ɔdɔlɛ ní mlɔ tiaʋa kusi i?”
42012015	Lɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa aki ba petee si, “Mleze ni aŋu tɔ mledi mumɔ ní kuŋazi kakaa elu su; lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ ligbã limá ní yɛ exo kumɔmɔ mɛ ɛ, xegi ɔwla mɛ ɔlɛ yɛ kura kyɛ ɛ.”
42012016	Lɛ Yesu ebu abee aki ba si, “Oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi kese keze ní yɛ awla a. Bidɔ mɛ bipɛ ní kesea aʋa mɔmɔmɔ.
42012017	Egyo le edi si, ‘Ɔdɔblakɔ ʋidi ɔma ní mɛ awla a gi maabla mɛ ɔnyrɔɔ nɔ mɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ.’
42012018	“Lɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Maayaʋi mɛ idɔblakɔ koko le tɔ maawa ivuvũ gi ikeme sanɔ ɛ. Niklɔ maayasi mɛ idoli le ni kayaa mɛ bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kukpɛ ɛ.
42012019	Kɔ masi isu ya si, “Wɔmɔ ligbã. Bidɔ bilɛ ní wɔ awla ki agɔ glegle gi ɛɛtraba ɛ. Ze mɔni, ŋa, ŋwɛ tɔ mɔ̀ isami.” ’
42012020	“Pɔ̀ Aya asi yɛ si, “Wɔ Kanukpaʋi! Kele kátrati nì wɔ ɔ! Kɔ bidɔ mɛ gi wɔbla aplɛ ki wɔ isu ya ɛ, nyaŋwɛ binɛ bitradzì i?”
42012021	Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Nite litráze ɛki banama gi bexogo kelea mɛ exo la ɛki isu ya a, pɔ̀ xe benu bepiplinete ní Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
42012022	Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si mlakíkpɛ isu kunugu ní mlɔ ligbã́ nɛ su, kidiliɛ gi mlaaŋa loo ní mlɔ isu ya kidiliɛ gi mlaakpɛ su u.
42012023	Ligbã nɛ liziã boo esani kiŋaŋaɛ; lɛ ɔnɔse lo kyɛ ɛzia ɛsani kusa a.
42012024	Mledi akpavia ʋa: Baʋíwa ɔnyrɔɔ ɔ, lɛ baʋíyasi kididɔ ɔ, kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, owle ɔma ní ba awla a. Pɔ̀ Aya yɛ izɛ gani ba a. Lɛ mlɔ pɔ̀ mlɛŋa kedzi i sani kudzɔʋi yɔ ɔ.
42012025	Xegi mlekyi gyi ní mlɔ ligbã mɛ su kyɛ ɛ, mlɔ mɛ woli aatani ɔnyɔsasa tole kukɔpɔni yɛ ligbã nɛ na a?
42012026	Lɛ xe mlaʋítani liboe sisami la ya elu kulɔ ɛ, ege loso mlɛɛkpɛ isu kunugu ní bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ su u?
42012027	“Mlevu aŋu ní otukpomeyaʋi lɔ kitsitsi ye su. Ɔʋíwa lixwɛxwɛ, lɛ ɔʋiyó kusa ki isu u. Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ si Okusi ye Salomo ní yɛ kukusi yo ni yɛ kusudraa petee me kyɛ, yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bitipɔni lɔ kufufu yo ní kupedi me e.
42012028	Xegi nite Aya izɛkpɛ kupedi ni siwa sɛ su gi silɛ omono, kivo pɔ̀ siyrɔ, kɔ sitse kɔ bɛkani sɛ ni kifu i. Kitɛ xe ɔ́trakɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki mlɔ ɛsani siwa sɛ ɛ? Kitɛ xe mlɔ kuziŋaa kulɛ sisami te e?
42012029	Lɛ loso mlakíkpɛ isu kunugu ní kiŋaŋa ni kiŋwɛŋwɛ su u.
42012030	Lɛ ese linu si babubitɛ ba ɛ, bidɔ bɛ ya petee elu su bizeekyigyi. Pɔ̀ mlɔ Ɔkaɛ etè si biziã mlɔ.
42012031	Boŋu i, mleti yɛ kaʋaŋaa tɔ yɛ pɔ̀ ɛ aakɔ̀ bidɔ bɛ ya ʋa ɔki mlɔ ɔ.
42012032	“Mlɔ ɔhá sisami nɔ, lifu likíku mlo o. Lɛ ese linu si liku mlɔ Ɔkaɛ aŋu si ɔkɔ Kaʋaŋaa ɔki mlɔ ɔ.
42012033	Mlada mlɔ isu ya bidɔ mɛ tɔ mlakɔ kibɔɛ aki bepiplinete ba. Xe mlɛbitɛ nite e, bibɔ ikotoku gi itrapu i, iaze mlɔ awla ní lifunu ne. Lɛ niklɔ ʋa ɛ, mlɔ exo la atráŋini i, lɛ ese linu si oze ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́ma ni iklɔ ɔ, lɛ asu na kyɛ atrázizi bidɔ ɔ.
42012034	Lɛ ese linu si niklɔ gi wɔ exo la alɛ ɛ, niklɔ wɔ ɔna nɔ izeze.
42012035	“Mleze kublabla mɛ ki liboe kakaa elu gi liaba lɛ mɛ ɛ, mlanya agbagya la tɔ mledi le aʋa si mlɔ ibia lɛ iisɔ lipoe kakaa,
42012036	tɔ mleze ŋwisi besumubi ba klɔ gi beepe ba ɔkaɛ kubaba dɔnɔ ní ɔdzɛgbanɔ klɔ kinɛ ɛ. Tɔ xegi aba asa opupo lo e tɔ biadra lɔ ɔki yɛ kyɔŋ.
42012037	Biakrira besumubi ba klɔ gi biaze nì aŋu xe ba Ɔkaɛ aadzi i. Mɛɛsi mlɔ si kepea ɔkaɛ aasama yɛ kusaa kɔ aki si yɛ besumubi ba beze kese kɔ yɛ ɔtutɔ esumu ba ɛ.
42012038	Biakrira besumubi ba klɔ gi bɛbla ɛki ba Ɔkaɛ yɛ kubabaa, elesi tetsu loo olezatɔ ɔ.
42012039	Mlete le si, xegi kepea ɔkaɛ etè lipoe lɛ gi oze ye aaba ɛ, ɔ́traki yɛ kudeo onu si ɔyaʋi opupo lo ní yɛ onu tɔ oti oku ní yɛ aʋa.
42012040	Nite ke mlɔ kyɛ ɛ, mlabla aplɛ; lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, aaba ní ɔnyɔsasaa lɔ klɔ aʋa gi mlaʋídi yɛ kudeo onu u.”
42012041	Petro eʋi si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, abee liɛ gi wobu i, blɔ wobu ye ɔkɔ putɔ wobu ye ɔki ɔnɔ kakaa na a?”
42012042	Ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Osumubi woli onu ɔgbã ɛ nì oboete e?” Yɛ onu iliɛ gi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ kepea akpɛ awla akɔ ɔ, gi yɛ aaki besumubi dzedze ba ba kiŋaŋaɛ ní lipoe gbã nɛ aʋa a.
42012043	Biakrira osumubi liɛ klɔ, xegi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aaba klani yɛ onu gi ɛɛwa nite me axwɛ na ɛ.
42012044	Sugba ɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ yɛ exo la petee akɔ kpɛ osumubi liɛ klɔ awla si odi be aʋa.
42012045	Pɔ̀ xegi osumubi liɛ klɔ aasi isu ya si, liadze xe mɛ kepea ɔkaɛ adzi i, xe aakpese besumubi benyime ni badzɛ ba kukusi i, xe ɛɛŋa xe ɛɛŋwɛ emu i;
42012046	Lɛ xe kepea ɔkaɛ aadzi ní lipoɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ gi osumubi ye ógyo odi, ni liwe lɛ aʋa gi ɔ́plɛ aŋu i, Yɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aafli ye kukpe kukpe aakɔ̀ yɛ ɔkpɛ batu gagla benete ba kusi i.
42012047	Lɛ loso e, osumubi liɛ klɔ gi ete yɛkaɛ yɛ kupɛpɛɔ, pɔ̀ xe ɔ́blaa ɔki kɔ aʋa kubitɛ ɛ, biafiaʋi yɛ biseʋi glegle ŋwisi kutuhehe kinɛ.
42012048	Pɔ̀ osumubi liɛ klɔ gi óte yɛkaɛ kupɛpɛɔ xe ata kese e, biahe kutu ki yɛ taʋɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ glegle e, biaʋi bidɔ glegle dɔni yɛ iwla mɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ ɛsanɔ ɛ, biaʋi bidɔ glegle sanɔ dɔni yɛ awla.
42012049	Maba si míkpɛ kifu kesea aʋa, gi nya mapɛ si kikpese kusɔ kooko xe e.
42012050	Pɔ̀ lilɛ si miga baxixa ba mɛ, ŋwisi kuni kpɛkpɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ maxixa isu ya mɛ kɔkpɛ ni lipoe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
42012051	Kigyo mlegyo edi si mɛ kubaba ɛ, kwiamani kusuyɔ ní kelea mɛ lo o? Owo, kútramani kusuyɔ pɔ̀ kulɛlɛ ɛ.
